tika-s0301t:2_1: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
tika-s0301t:2_2: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthanti. Atha vā maṅgalabhāvato, sabbakiriyāsu
tika-s0301t:2_3: pubbakiccabhāvato, paṇḍitehi samācaritabhāvato, āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato
tika-s0301t:2_4: ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyāti. Atha vā ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ pūjanīyapūjāpuññavisesanibbattanatthaṃ,
tika-s0301t:2_5: taṃ attano yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa kammassa balānuppadānatthaṃ, antarā ca
tika-s0301t:2_6: tassa asaṃkocāpanatthaṃ, tadubhayaṃ anantarāyena aṭṭhakathāya parisamāpanatthanti
tika-s0301t:2_7: idameva ca payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “iti me pasannamatino…pe…
tika-s0301t:2_10: pahoti, bhayādiupaddavañca nivāreti. Yathāha “pūjārahe pūjayato”tiādi, tathā “ye,
tika-s0301t:2_11: bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā, agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:4: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa;
tika-s0301t:6_0: Tathā “yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ
tika-s0301t:6_1: samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:6_2: “Araññe rukkhamūle vā…pe… bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso na hessatī”ti ca.
tika-s0301t:7_0: Tattha yassa vatthuttayassa vandanaṃ kattukāmo, tassa guṇātisayayogasandassanatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:7_2: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetaṃ payojanaṃ sādhetīti. Tattha yassā desanāya
tika-s0301t:7_3: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā
tika-s0301t:7_4: viya paññāppadhānā, atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0301t:7_5: thomanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0301t:7_6: kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā,
tika-s0301t:7_7: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ
tika-s0301t:7_8: hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā
tika-s0301t:7_9: hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati
tika-s0301t:7_10: vibandhatīti attho. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ karuṇāsītalaṃ, karuṇāsītalaṃ hadayaṃ assāti
tika-s0301t:8_3: avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato cittassa cittapassaddhi viya sītibhāvanimittanti
tika-s0301t:8_4: vuttaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0301t:9_0: Atha vā chaasādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:9_1: viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvamupagatā karuṇāva bhagavato abhisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti
tika-s0301t:10_0: Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ sātisaye hadayasītibhāvanibandhanatte sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya
tika-s0301t:10_1: tāsampi kāraṇanti karuṇāva bhagavato “hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇa”nti vuttā. Karuṇānidānā
tika-s0301t:10_5: na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti. Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu
tika-s0301t:11_0: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato
tika-s0301t:11_1: pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto. Savāsanappahānato visesena
tika-s0301t:11_2: hataṃ samugghāṭitaṃ vihataṃ. Paññāpajjotena vihataṃ paññāpajjotavihataṃ. Muyhanti
tika-s0301t:11_3: tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, mohanamattameva vā tanti moho, avijjā. Sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanakaraṇato
tika-s0301t:11_4: andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo. Paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo etassāti paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo,
tika-s0301t:11_5: taṃ paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena
tika-s0301t:11_6: avijjandhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhādhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi
tika-s0301t:11_7: ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayena
tika-s0301t:12_0: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
tika-s0301t:12_1: tathā sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena
tika-s0301t:12_2: sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena thometabboti āha
tika-s0301t:12_4: paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0301t:13_2: vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato mohatamavināsoti katvā vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
tika-s0301t:13_3: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sasantāne
tika-s0301t:13_4: mohatamavidhamananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinīhārasampattiyā savāsanappahānameva hi kilesānaṃ
tika-s0301t:13_5: ñeyyāvaraṇapahānanti, parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato phalūpacārena
tika-s0301t:14_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ
tika-s0301t:14_1: gayhati, na pana sātisayaṃ niravasesakilesapahānanti? Tappahānavacaneneva tadekaṭṭhatāya
tika-s0301t:14_2: sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghātassa jotitabhāvato. Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi, yo
tika-s0301t:15_0: Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā
tika-s0301t:15_1: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto
tika-s0301t:16_0: Narā ca amarā ca narāmarā, saha narāmarehīti sanarāmaro, sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti
tika-s0301t:16_1: sanarāmaraloko, tassa garūti sanarāmaralokagaru, taṃ sanarāmaralokagaruṃ. Etena devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0301t:16_2: viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakārataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:16_3: Na cettha padhānāppadhānabhāvo codetabbo. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamo. Edisesu
tika-s0301t:16_4: hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
tika-s0301t:16_5: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārokāsavasena tividho loko, garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā
tika-s0301t:16_6: garukaraṇasamatthasseva sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokīyanti ettha
tika-s0301t:16_7: puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati. Amaraggahaṇena cettha upapattidevā adhippetā.
tika-s0301t:17_0: Atha vā samūhattho loka-saddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti. Saha narehīti
tika-s0301t:17_1: sanarā, sanarā ca te amarā cāti sanarāmarā, tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva
tika-s0301t:17_2: yojetabbaṃ. Amara-saddena cettha visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti. Te hi maraṇābhāvato
tika-s0301t:17_3: paramatthato amarā, narāmarānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
tika-s0301t:17_6: ca sabbasattuttamo bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamaṃ
tika-s0301t:18_0: Sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato. Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena
tika-s0301t:19_0: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalamapi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena
tika-s0301t:19_1: sammā gato avagatoti sugato, tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto
tika-s0301t:19_2: anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato, lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena
tika-s0301t:19_3: sammā gato adhigatoti sugato, lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena
tika-s0301t:19_4: sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato. “Sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti
tika-s0301t:19_5: na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”tiādinā nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabboti.
tika-s0301t:20_0: Atha vā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ, nibbānameva vā gato adhigatoti sugato. Yasmā
tika-s0301t:20_1: vā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0301t:20_2: tasmā sammā gadati vadatīti sugato da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Iti sobhanagamanatādīhi
tika-s0301t:21_0: Puññapāpakehi upapajjanavasena gantabbato gatiyo, upapattibhavavisesā. Tā pana nirayādivasena
tika-s0301t:21_1: pañcavidhā. Tā hi sakalassapi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena
tika-s0301t:21_2: nivattitattā bhagavā pañcahipi gatīhi suṭṭhu mutto visaṃyuttoti āha “gativimutta”nti.
tika-s0301t:21_3: Etena bhagavato katthacipi apariyāpannataṃ dasseti, yato bhagavā “devātidevo”ti vuccati. Tenāha –
tika-s0301t:24: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0301t:25_2: suparimutto. Taṃ gativimuttaṃ. Vandeti namāmi, thomemīti vā attho.
tika-s0301t:26_0: Atha vā gativimuttanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā bhagavantaṃ thometi. Ettha
tika-s0301t:26_1: hi dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito parahitapaṭipattito
tika-s0301t:26_2: ca. Tesu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamato, savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ
tika-s0301t:26_3: accantapahānato, anupādisesanibbānappattito ca veditabbā. Parahitapaṭipatti lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa
tika-s0301t:26_5: ca. Sā panettha āsayato payogato ca duvidhā parahitapaṭipatti, tividhā ca attahitasampatti
tika-s0301t:26_6: pakāsitā hoti, kathaṃ? “Karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti etena āsayato parahitapaṭipatti, sammāgadanatthena
tika-s0301t:26_8: etehi catusaccapaṭivedhatthena ca sugata-saddena tividhāpi attahitasampatti, avasiṭṭhatthena
tika-s0301t:26_9: tena “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etena ca sabbāpi attahitasampatti parahitapaṭipatti pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-s0301t:27_0: Atha vā tīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā – hetuto phalato upakārato ca. Tattha
tika-s0301t:27_1: hetu mahākaruṇā, sā paṭhamapadena dassitā. Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ ñāṇasampadā pahānasampadā
tika-s0301t:27_2: ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tāsu ñāṇapahānasampadā dutiyapadena saccapaṭivedhatthena
tika-s0301t:27_3: ca sugata-saddena pakāsitā honti, ānubhāvasampadā pana tatiyapadena, rūpakāyasampadā
tika-s0301t:27_5: tadabhāvato. Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ karitvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā.
tika-s0301t:27_6: So sammāgadanatthena sugata-saddena pakāsito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:28_0: Tattha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti etena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti. Mahākaruṇāya
tika-s0301t:28_1: sañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro
tika-s0301t:28_2: anupubbena pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0301t:28_4: maggañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sammāsambodhīti vuccatīti. Sammāgamanatthena
tika-s0301t:28_6: karuṇāpaññāpariggahitāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā pakāsanato sugata-saddassa. Itarehi
tika-s0301t:28_7: sammāsambodhiyā padhānāppadhānabhedaṃ payojanaṃ dasseti. Saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇañhettha
tika-s0301t:28_8: padhānaṃ payojanaṃ, tadaññamappadhānaṃ. Tesu padhānena parahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0301t:28_9: itarena attahitasampattiṃ, tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu
tika-s0301t:28_10: bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tena ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ, uttamavandanīyabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0301t:29_0: Ettha ca karuṇāgahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato
tika-s0301t:29_3: vipañcīyatīti. Karuṇāgahaṇena ca upagamanaṃ nirupakkilesaṃ dasseti, paññāgahaṇena
tika-s0301t:29_4: apagamanaṃ. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā
tika-s0301t:29_5: karuṇāya, paññāgahaṇena samaññāya anatidhāvanaṃ. Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ
tika-s0301t:29_6: samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattivihāraṃ
tika-s0301t:29_7: dasseti, paññāgahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ catusaccañāṇaṃ catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:29_9: cha abhiññā aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni dasa balāni cuddasa buddhañāṇāni soḷasa
tika-s0301t:29_10: ñāṇacariyā aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti
tika-s0301t:29_11: evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena
tika-s0301t:29_12: caraṇasampattiṃ, paññāgahaṇena vijjāsampattiṃ. Karuṇāgahaṇena attādhipatitā, paññāgahaṇena
tika-s0301t:29_13: dhammādhipatitā. Karuṇāgahaṇena lokanāthabhāvo, paññāgahaṇena attanāthabhāvo. Tathā
tika-s0301t:29_14: karuṇāgahaṇena pubbakāribhāvo, paññāgahaṇena kataññutā. Karuṇāgahaṇena aparantapatā,
tika-s0301t:29_15: paññāgahaṇena anattantapatā. Karuṇāgahaṇena vā buddhakaradhammasiddhi, paññāgahaṇena
tika-s0301t:29_16: buddhabhāvasiddhi. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ, paññāgahaṇena sayaṃ tāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:29_17: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā, paññāgahaṇena sabbadhammesu virattacittatā dassitā hoti.
tika-s0301t:30_0: Sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi tannidānabhāvato, paññā pariyosānaṃ tato uttari
tika-s0301t:30_1: karaṇīyābhāvato. Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti. Tathā
tika-s0301t:30_2: karuṇāgahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi
tika-s0301t:30_3: sīlaṃ tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito, sā ca jhānattayasampayoginīti. Paññāvacanena
tika-s0301t:30_4: paññākkhandho. Sīlañca sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhe, paññā pariyosānanti
tika-s0301t:30_5: evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato
tika-s0301t:30_6: dassitattā. Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo, yadidaṃ nayaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t:30_7: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ. Tenevāha –
tika-s0301t:35: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenapi buddaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ, bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā “api ca me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:36_0: 2. Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ
tika-s0301t:36_1: thometuṃ “buddhopī”tiādimāha. Tattha buddhoti kattuniddeso. Buddhabhāvanti kammaniddeso.
tika-s0301t:36_2: Bhāvetvā sacchikatvāti ca pubbakālakiriyāniddeso. Yanti aniyamato kammaniddeso. Upagatoti
tika-s0301t:36_3: aparakālakiriyāniddeso. Vandeti kiriyāniddeso. Tanti niyamanaṃ. Dhammanti vandanakiriyāya
tika-s0301t:37_0: Tattha buddhasaddassa tāva – “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā
tika-s0301t:37_1: niddesanayena attho veditabbo. Atha vā savāsanāya aññāṇaniddāya accantavigamato,
tika-s0301t:37_2: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena. Atha vā
tika-s0301t:37_3: kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato
tika-s0301t:37_4: kammavacanicchāya abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti
tika-s0301t:37_5: buddho yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti. Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena
tika-s0301t:37_7: khandhasantāno buddho. Yathāha – “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe
tika-s0301t:37_8: ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi. Tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu
tika-s0301t:37_9: ca vasībhāva”nti. Api-saddo sambhāvane. Tena “evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā”ti
tika-s0301t:37_10: vakkhamānaguṇe dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti. Buddhabhāvanti sammāsambodhiṃ. Bhāvetvāti
tika-s0301t:37_11: uppādetvā vaḍḍhetvā ca. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Upagatoti patto, adhigatoti
tika-s0301t:37_12: attho. Etassa “buddhabhāva”nti etena sambandho. Gatamalanti vigatamalaṃ, niddosanti
tika-s0301t:37_13: attho. Vandeti paṇamāmi, thomemi vā. Anuttaranti uttararahitaṃ, lokuttaranti attho.
tika-s0301t:37_14: Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyato saṃsārato ca apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-s0301t:38_0: Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – evaṃ vividhaguṇagaṇasamannāgato buddhopi bhagavā yaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0301t:38_1: dhammaṃ bhāvetvā phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ pana dhammaṃ sacchikatvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
tika-s0301t:38_2: adhigato, tametaṃ buddhānampi buddhabhāvahetubhūtaṃ sabbadosamalarahitaṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena
tika-s0301t:38_3: anuttaraṃ paṭivedhasaddhammaṃ namāmīti. Pariyattisaddhammassapi tappakāsanattā idha
tika-s0301t:38_4: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā “abhidhammanayasamuddaṃ adhigacchi, tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti
tika-s0301t:38_5: ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pariyattidhammassapi sacchikiriyasammasanapariyāyo labbhatīti
tika-s0301t:39_0: Tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā”ti ca vuttattā buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi pāramitāhi
tika-s0301t:39_1: saha pubbabhāge adhisīlasikkhādayopi idha dhamma-saddena saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:39_2: Tāpi hi malapaṭipakkhatāya gatamalā anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarā cāti. Tathā hi sattānaṃ
tika-s0301t:39_5: kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesānaṃ bhāvanāpaccakkhakaraṇehi
tika-s0301t:39_7: bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pesetvā anuttaraṃ
tika-s0301t:40_0: Ettha ca “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya dhammaṃ thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena
tika-s0301t:40_1: vimuttisampadāya. Tathā paṭhamena jhānasampadāya, dutiyena vimokkhasampadāya. Paṭhamena
tika-s0301t:40_2: vā samādhisampadāya, dutiyena samāpattisampadāya. Atha vā paṭhamena khayeñāṇabhāvena,
tika-s0301t:40_3: dutiyena anuppādeñāṇabhāvena. Purimena vā vijjūpamatāya, dutiyena vajirupamatāya.
tika-s0301t:40_4: Purimena vā virāgasampattiyā, dutiyena nirodhasampattiyā. Tathā paṭhamena niyyānabhāvena,
tika-s0301t:40_5: dutiyena nissaraṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā hetubhāvena, dutiyena asaṅkhatabhāvena. Paṭhamena
tika-s0301t:40_6: vā dassanabhāvena, dutiyena vivekabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā adhipatibhāvena, dutiyena
tika-s0301t:40_7: amatabhāvena dhammaṃ thometi. Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti
tika-s0301t:40_8: etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena sandiṭṭhikatāya. Tathā
tika-s0301t:40_9: purimena akālikatāya, pacchimena ehipassikatāya. Purimena vā opaneyyikatāya, pacchimena
tika-s0301t:40_10: paccattaṃ veditabbatāya dhammaṃ thometi. “Gatamala”nti iminā saṃkilesābhāvadīpanena
tika-s0301t:40_11: dhammassa parisuddhataṃ dasseti. “Anuttara”nti etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena
tika-s0301t:40_12: vipulaparipuṇṇataṃ. Paṭhamena vā pahānasampadaṃ dhammassa dasseti, dutiyena sabhāvasampadaṃ.
tika-s0301t:40_13: Bhāvetabbatāya vā dhammassa gatamalabhāvo yojetabbo. Bhāvanābalena hi so dosānaṃ
tika-s0301t:40_14: samugghātako hotīti. Sacchikātabbabhāvena anuttarabhāvo yojetabbo. Sacchikiriyānibbattito
tika-s0301t:40_15: hi tatuttarikaraṇīyābhāvato anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttaroti. Tathā “bhāvetvā”ti etena
tika-s0301t:40_16: saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā honti. “Sacchikatvā”ti
tika-s0301t:40_17: etena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0301t:41_0: 3. Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ
tika-s0301t:41_2: etena sambandho. Orasānanti puttavisesanaṃ. Mārasenamathanānanti orasaputtabhāve
tika-s0301t:41_3: kāraṇaniddeso. Tena kilesapahānameva bhagavato orasaputtabhāve kāraṇaṃ anujānātīti
tika-s0301t:41_4: dasseti. Aṭṭhannanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Tena ca satipi tesaṃ sattavisesabhāvena
tika-s0301t:41_5: anekasahassasaṅkhābhāve imaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattantīti dasseti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānativattanato.
tika-s0301t:41_7: asatipi ariyapuggalānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyaṃ ariyasaṅghabhāvaṃ dasseti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:42_0: Tattha urasi bhavā jātā saṃbaddhā ca orasā. Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā attajātatāya
tika-s0301t:42_1: pitu santakassa dāyajjassa visesena bhāgino honti, evametepi ariyapuggalā sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0301t:42_2: dhammassavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa ariyadhammaratanassa
tika-s0301t:42_3: ca ekantabhāginoti orasā viya orasā. Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāveneva ariyabhūmiṃ
tika-s0301t:42_4: okkamamānā okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato urena vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya nippariyāyena
tika-s0301t:42_5: orasā puttāti vattabbataṃ arahanti. Sāvakehi pavattiyamānāpi hi dhammadesanā “bhagavato
tika-s0301t:43_0: Yadipi ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:43_1: devaputtamāro, māravāhinī vā na ekantena apasādeti, tehi pana apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe
tika-s0301t:43_2: vimathite tepi vimathitā eva nāma hontīti āha “mārasenamathanāna”nti. Imasmiṃ panatthe
tika-s0301t:43_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassapi guṇamāraṇe
tika-s0301t:43_5: sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo “senā”ti vuccati. Yathāha “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:43_6: Sā ca tehi diyaḍḍhasahassabhedā, anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇapaharaṇehi
tika-s0301t:43_7: odhiso vimathitā vihatā viddhastā cāti mārasenamathanā, ariyasāvakā. Etena tesaṃ
tika-s0301t:44_0: Ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato ariyā niruttinayena. Atha
tika-s0301t:44_1: vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato, upagatānañca tadatthasiddhito
tika-s0301t:44_2: ariyā. Ariyānaṃ saṅghoti ariyasaṅgho. Ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti vā ariyasaṅgho. Bhagavato
tika-s0301t:44_3: aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti assa ariyasaṅghassa
tika-s0301t:44_4: bahūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ idheva “sirasā vande”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:45_0: Ettha ca “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0301t:45_3: pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti sabbasaṅghānaṃ aggabhāvadīpanato. Atha vā sugatassa orasānaṃ
tika-s0301t:45_6: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabhāvaṃ
tika-s0301t:45_7: dīpeti. Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā. “Mārasenamathanāna”nti
tika-s0301t:45_8: etena abhinīhārasampadāya siddhaṃ pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti. Katābhinīhārā
tika-s0301t:45_9: hi sammāpaṭipannā māraṃ māraparisaṃ vā abhivijinanti. “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena
tika-s0301t:45_12: sabbaguṇānaṃ ādi, sapubbabhāgapaṭipadā sekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo majjhe, asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo
tika-s0301t:45_13: pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0301t:46_0: 4. Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ
tika-s0301t:46_1: katvā idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ yathādhippete payojane pariṇāmento “iti me”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:46_2: Tattha ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, buddhadhammasaṅghā. Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā
tika-s0301t:46_3: yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjentassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0301t:47_0: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0301t:47_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0301t:47_2: cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha. Ujugatacitto
tika-s0301t:47_3: kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati
tika-s0301t:51: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhantīti.
tika-s0301t:52_0: Vandanāva vandanāmayaṃ yathā “dānamayaṃ sīlamaya”nti. Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi
tika-s0301t:52_1: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā, thomanā vā. Pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato puññaṃ, attano
tika-s0301t:52_2: santānaṃ punātīti vā. Suvihatantarāyoti. Suṭṭhu vihatantarāyo. Etena attano pasādasampattiyā,
tika-s0301t:52_3: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā taṃ puññaṃ atthappakāsanassa upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ
tika-s0301t:52_4: vihanane samatthanti dasseti. Hutvāti pubbakālakiriyā. Tassa “atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti
tika-s0301t:52_5: etena sambandho. Tassāti yaṃ ratanattayavandanāmayaṃ puññaṃ, tassa. Ānubhāvenāti balena.
tika-s0301t:53_0: 5. Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakāre payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya
tika-s0301t:53_1: atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo, tassā tāva guṇābhitthavanavasena upaññāpanatthaṃ “saṃyuttavaggapaṭimaṇḍitassā”tiādi
tika-s0301t:53_2: vuttaṃ, devatāsaṃyuttādisaṃyuttehi ceva naḷavaggādivaggehi ca vibhūsitassāti attho.
tika-s0301t:53_3: Tattha “saṃyutta”nti “saṃyogo”ti ca atthato ekaṃ. Kesaṃ saṃyuttaṃ? Suttavaggānaṃ.
tika-s0301t:53_4: Yathā hi byañjanasamudāyo padaṃ, evaṃ atthesu ca katāvadhiko padasamudāyo vākyaṃ,
tika-s0301t:53_5: vākyasamudāyo suttaṃ, suttasamudāye vaggoti samaññā, tathā suttavaggasamudāye saṃyuttasamaññā.
tika-s0301t:53_6: Saṃyujjantīti ettha suttavaggāti saṃyuttaṃ. Yadipi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma
tika-s0301t:53_7: paramatthato natthi, avayave eva taṃtaṃsannivesavisiṭṭhe upādāya padādisamaññā viya
tika-s0301t:53_8: suttavaggasamaññā saṃyuttasamaññā āgamasamaññā ca, tathāpi paramatthato avijjamānopi
tika-s0301t:53_9: samudāyo buddhiparikappitarūpena vijjamāno viya gayhamāno avayavānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-s0301t:54_0: Nanu saṃyuttavaggo eva āgamo, tassa pana kehi maṇḍananti? Na codetabbametaṃ. Bhavati
tika-s0301t:54_1: hi abhinnepi vatthusmiṃ yathādhippetavisesāvabodhanato bhedakasamudācāro yathā “silāputtakassa
tika-s0301t:54_2: sarīra”nti. Āgamissanti ettha, etena, etasmā vā attatthaparatthādayoti āgamo, ādikalyāṇādiguṇasampattiyā
tika-s0301t:54_3: uttamaṭṭhena taṃtaṃabhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya paṇḍitehi varitabbato varo, āgamo
tika-s0301t:54_4: ca so varo cāti āgamavaro. Āgamasammatehi vā varoti āgamavaro, saṃyutto ca so āgamavaro
tika-s0301t:54_5: cāti saṃyuttāgamavaro, tassa. Buddhānaṃ anubuddhā buddhānubuddhā, buddhānaṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ
tika-s0301t:54_6: anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā. Tehi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāguṇasaṃvaṇṇanānaṃ
tika-s0301t:55_0: Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca buddhānubuddhāti yojetabbaṃ. Sammāsambuddheneva hi
tika-s0301t:55_1: vinayasuttaabhidhammānaṃ pakiṇṇakadesanādivasena yo paṭhamaṃ attho vibhatto, so eva
tika-s0301t:55_2: pacchā tesaṃ atthavaṇṇanāvasena saṅgītikārehi saṅgahaṃ āropitoti. Ettha ca saṃyuttānaṃ
tika-s0301t:55_3: vaggā samūhāti saṃyuttavaggā, sagāthāvaggādayo. Tappariyāpannatāya saṃyuttesu vaggā
tika-s0301t:55_4: saṃyuttavaggā, naḷavaggādayo. Saṃyuttāva vaggā saṃyuttavaggā. Tividhepi te ekasesanayena
tika-s0301t:56_0: Tattha sagāthāvagge tāva ekādasa saṃyuttāni aṭṭhatiṃsa vaggā. Nidānavagge nava saṃyuttāni
tika-s0301t:56_1: ekūnacattālīsa vaggā. Khandhavagge ekādasa saṃyuttāni ekūnasaṭṭhi vaggā. Saḷāyatanavagge
tika-s0301t:56_2: nava saṃyuttāni aṭṭhatiṃsa vaggā. Mahāvagge dvādasa saṃyuttāni aṭṭhacattālīsa vaggā.
tika-s0301t:57_2: saṃvaṇṇanāsu cāyaṃ ācariyassa pakati, yadidaṃ taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanānaṃ ādito tassa tassa
tika-s0301t:57_3: saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā. Tathā hi sumaṅgalavilāsinīpapañcasūdanīmanorathapūraṇīaṭṭhasālinīādīsu
tika-s0301t:57_5: tassa gambhīrañāṇehi ogāḷhassa abhiṇhaso nānānayavicittassa abhidhammassā”tiādinā thomanā katā.
tika-s0301t:58_0: 6. Attho kathīyati etāyāti atthakathā, atthakathāva aṭṭhakathā ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ
tika-s0301t:58_1: katvā yathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho”ti. Āditoti ādimhi paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ. Chaḷabhiññatāya
tika-s0301t:58_2: paramena cittavasibhāvena samannāgatattā jhānādīsu pañcavidhavasitāsambhāvato ca
tika-s0301t:58_3: vasino, therā mahākassapādayo. Tesaṃ satehi pañcahi. Yāti yā aṭṭhakathā. Saṅgītāti
tika-s0301t:58_4: atthaṃ kathetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayaṃ etassa attho, ayaṃ etassa attho”ti saṅgahetvā vuttā.
tika-s0301t:58_5: Anusaṅgītā ca yasattherādīhi pacchāpi dutiyatatiyasaṅgītīsu. Iminā attano saṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0301t:59_0: 7. Sīhassa lānato gahaṇato sīhaḷo, sīhakumāro, tabbaṃsajātatāya tambapaṇṇidīpe khattiyā,
tika-s0301t:59_1: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassa ca sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo. Ābhatāti jambudīpato
tika-s0301t:59_2: ānītā. Athāti pacchā. Aparabhāge hi nikāyantaraladdhīhi asaṅkaratthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya
tika-s0301t:59_3: aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitāti. Tena mūlaṭṭhakathā sabbasādhāraṇā na hotīti idaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ
tika-s0301t:59_4: ekantena karaṇīyanti dasseti. Tenevāha “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti. Ettha dīpavāsīnanti
tika-s0301t:59_5: jambudīpavāsīnaṃ, sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ vā atthāya sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:60_0: 8. Apanetvāti kañcukasadisaṃ sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā. Tatoti aṭṭhakathāto. Ahanti attānaṃ
tika-s0301t:60_1: niddisati. Manoramaṃ bhāsanti māgadhabhāsaṃ. Sā hi sabhāvaniruttibhūtā paṇḍitamanaṃ
tika-s0301t:61_0: 9. Samayaṃ avilomentoti siddhantaṃ avirodhento. Etena atthadosābhāvamāha. Aviruddhattā
tika-s0301t:61_1: eva hi theravādāpi idha pakāsīyissanti. Theravaṃsadīpānanti thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi
tika-s0301t:61_2: samannāgatattā therā, mahākassapādayo. Tehi āgatā ācariyaparamparā theravaṃso, tappariyāpannā
tika-s0301t:61_3: hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato theravaṃsadīpā,
tika-s0301t:61_4: mahāvihāravāsino, tesaṃ. Vividhehi ākārehi nicchīyatīti vinicchayo, gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu
tika-s0301t:61_5: khilamaddanākārena pavattā vimaticchedanī kathā. Suṭṭhunipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti
tika-s0301t:61_6: sunipuṇavinicchayā. Atha vā vinicchinotīti vinicchayo vuttappakāravisayaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:61_7: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti yojetabbaṃ. Etena mahākassapāditheraparamparāgato,
tika-s0301t:61_8: tato eva ca aviparīto saṇho sukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayo, tassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:62_0: 10. Sujanassa cāti ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena “na kevalaṃ jambudīpavāsīnameva
tika-s0301t:62_1: atthāya, atha kho sādhujanatosanatthañcā”ti dasseti. Tena ca “tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi
tika-s0301t:62_2: atthāyā”ti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahukārattā. Ciraṭṭhitatthanti
tika-s0301t:62_3: ciraṭṭhitiatthaṃ, cirakālappavattanāyāti attho. Idañhi atthappakāsanaṃ aviparītapadabyañjanasunikkhepassa
tika-s0301t:62_4: atthasunayassa ca upāyabhāvato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā pavattati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
tika-s0301t:62_5: “dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0301t:62_6: Katame dve? Sunikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ attho ca sunīto”ti.
tika-s0301t:63_0: 11-12. Yaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, tassā mahattaṃ pariharituṃ “sāvatthipabhūtīna”ntiādi
tika-s0301t:63_1: vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – “na idha bhiyyo vitthārakathaṃ karissāmi, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmī”ti
tika-s0301t:64: 13. “Na idha bhiyyo vitthārakathaṃ karissāmī”ti sāmaññato vuttassa atthassa avassayaṃ dassetuṃ “suttānaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:65_0: 14. Yaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ kattukāmo, tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo gahetabboti kathikānaṃ
tika-s0301t:65_1: upadesaṃ karonto tatta vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dasseti “sīlakathā”tiādinā. Tattha
tika-s0301t:65_2: sīlakathāti cārittavārittādivasena sīlassa vitthārakathā. Dhutadhammāti piṇḍapātikaṅgādayo
tika-s0301t:65_3: terasa kilesadhunanakadhammā. Kammaṭṭhānāni sabbānīti pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni aṭṭhattiṃsa,
tika-s0301t:65_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti niravasesāni yogakammassa bhāvanāya pavattiṭṭhānāni. Cariyāvidhānasahitoti
tika-s0301t:65_5: rāgacariyādīnaṃ sabhāgādividhānena sahito. Jhānāni cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni, samāpattiyo
tika-s0301t:65_6: catasso arūpasamāpattiyo. Aṭṭhapi vā paṭiladdhamattāni jhānāni, samāpajjanavasibhāvappattiyā
tika-s0301t:65_7: samāpattiyo. Jhānāni vā rūpārūpāvacarajjhānāni, samāpattiyo phalasamāpattinirodhasamāpattiyo.
tika-s0301t:66: 15. Lokiyalokuttarabhedā cha abhiññāyo sabbā abhiññāyo. Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṅkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.
tika-s0301t:67_1: tassa desanā paccayākāradesanā, paṭiccasamuppādakathāti attho. Sā pana nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkararahitatāya
tika-s0301t:67_2: suṭṭhuparisuddhā, ghanavinibbhogassa ca sudukkaratāya nipuṇā saṇhasukhumā, ekattanayādisahitā
tika-s0301t:67_3: ca tattha vicāritāti āha “suparisuddhanipuṇanayā”ti. Paṭisambhidādīsu āgatanayaṃ
tika-s0301t:68: 17. Iti pana sabbanti iti-saddo parisamāpane, pana-saddo vacanālaṅkāre, etaṃ sabbanti attho. Idhāti imissā aṭṭhakathāya. Na taṃ vicārayissāmi punaruttibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:69_0: 18. Idāni tasseva avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhārento “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:69_1: Tattha “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhaṭṭhabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnaṃ āgamānaṃ
tika-s0301t:69_2: sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo, na sumaṅgalavilāsiniādayo viya asādhāraṇaṭṭhakathāti
tika-s0301t:69_3: dasseti. “Visesato”ti ca idaṃ vinayābhidhammānampi visuddhimaggo yathārahaṃ atthavaṇṇanā
tika-s0301t:70: 19. Iccevāti iti eva. Tampīti visuddhimaggampi. Etāyāti sāratthappakāsiniyā.
tika-s0301t:71_0: Ettha ca “sīhaḷadīpaṃ ābhatā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathākaraṇassa nimittaṃ dasseti, “dīpavāsīnamatthāya
tika-s0301t:71_1: sujanassa ca tuṭṭhatthaṃ ciraṭṭhitatthañca dhammassā”ti etehi payojanaṃ, “saṃyuttāgamavarassa
tika-s0301t:71_2: atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti etena piṇḍatthaṃ, “apanetvāna tatohaṃ sīhaḷabhāsa”ntiādinā
tika-s0301t:71_4: visuddhimagge ca vicāritānaṃ atthānaṃ avicāraṇampi hi idha karaṇappakāro evāti.
tika-s0301t:74_0: Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanavaseneva hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva saṃyuttavaggasuttādivasena
tika-s0301t:74_1: saṃyuttāgamassa vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha saṃyuttāgamo nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti
tika-s0301t:74_2: yaṃ vuttaṃ – “saṃyuttāgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti, tasmiṃ vacane. Tatthāti
tika-s0301t:74_3: vā “etāya aṭṭhakathāya vijānātha saṃyuttanissitaṃ attha”nti ettha yaṃ saṃyuttaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:74_4: kataṃ, tattha. Pañca vaggā etassāti pañcavaggo. Avayavena viggaho, samudāyo samāsattho.
tika-s0301t:75_0: Idāni taṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇetukāmo attano saṃvaṇṇanāya tassa paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-s0301t:75_1: nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ, “tassa vaggesu sagāthāvaggo ādī”tiādi
tika-s0301t:75_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ
tika-s0301t:75_3: dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti, mahāvisayattā pūjaniyattā ca
tika-s0301t:75_4: mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti. Paṭhamā mahāsaṅgīti paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti, tassā pavattitakālo
tika-s0301t:76_0: Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ. Yo
tika-s0301t:76_1: loke ganthassa upogghātoti vuccati, svāyamettha “evaṃ me suta”nti-ādiko gantho veditabbo,
tika-s0301t:76_2: na pana “sanidānāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemī”tiādīsu viya attajjhāsayādidesanuppattihetu.
tika-s0301t:76_3: Tenevāha – “evaṃ me sutanti-ādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:76_4: nidānamādī”ti. Kāmañcettha yassaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkamena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ
tika-s0301t:76_5: kattukāmo, sā vitthārato vattabbā, sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ pana attanā vitthāritattā
tika-s0301t:76_6: tattheva gahetabbāti imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya mahattaṃ pariharanto “sā panesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:77_0: 1. Evaṃ bāhiranidāne vattabbaṃ atidisitvā idāni abbhantaranidānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya
tika-s0301t:77_1: saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “yaṃ paneta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena saṃvaṇṇetabbe
tika-s0301t:77_2: dhamme padavibhāgaṃ padatthañca dassetvā tato paraṃ piṇḍatthādidassanavasena saṃvaṇṇanā
tika-s0301t:77_3: kātabbā, tasmā padāni tāva dassento “evanti nipātapada”nti-ādimāha. Tattha padavibhāgoti
tika-s0301t:77_4: padānaṃ viseso, na padaviggaho. Atha vā padāni ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgo. Padaviggaho
tika-s0301t:77_5: ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgoti vā ekasesavasena padapadaviggahā padavibhāgasaddena
tika-s0301t:77_6: vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha padaviggaho “jetassa vanaṃ jetavana”ntiādinā samāsapadesu daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t:78_0: Atthatoti padatthato. Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃsaddassa
tika-s0301t:78_1: dassento “evaṃsaddo tāvā”tiādimāha. Avadhāraṇādīti ettha ādi-saddena idamatthapucchāparimāṇādiatthānaṃ
tika-s0301t:78_2: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “evaṃgatāni puthusippāyatanāni, evaṃvidho evamākāro”ti
tika-s0301t:78_3: ca ādīsu idaṃ-saddassa atthe evaṃ-saddo. Gata-saddo hi pakārapariyāyo, tathā vidhākāra-saddo
tika-s0301t:78_4: ca. Tathā hi gatavidhaākārasadde lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti. “Evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā
tika-s0301t:78_5: kappitakesamassū āmuttamālābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā
tika-s0301t:78_6: samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti, seyyathāpi tvaṃ etarahi sācariyakoti. No hidaṃ, bho gotamā”tiādīsu
tika-s0301t:78_7: pucchāyaṃ, “evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, evamāyupariyanto”ti ca ādīsu parimāṇe.
tika-s0301t:79_0: Nanu ca “evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā, evamāyupariyanto”ti ettha evaṃ-saddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ
tika-s0301t:79_1: vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃ-saddoti? Na, visesasabbhāvato. Ākāramattavācako hi evaṃ-saddo,
tika-s0301t:79_2: ākāratthoti adhippeto yathā “evaṃ byākho”tiādīsu, na pana ākāravisesavācako. Evañca
tika-s0301t:79_3: katvā, “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni upamādīsu udāharaṇāni upapannāni honti. Tathā
tika-s0301t:79_6: mālāguḷasadisiyo pahūtā puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena sattena kattabbāti
tika-s0301t:79_7: jotitattā puppharāsimālāguḷāva upamā, tesaṃ upamākāro yathā-saddena aniyamato vuttoti
tika-s0301t:79_8: “evaṃ-saddo upamākāranigamanattho”ti vatthuṃ yuttaṃ, so pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno
tika-s0301t:79_9: atthato upamāva hotīti āha “upamāyaṃ āgato”ti. Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā
tika-s0301t:79_10: upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadisanākāro, so atthato
tika-s0301t:79_11: upadeso evāti vuttaṃ, “evaṃ te…pe… upadese”ti. Tathā “evametaṃ bhagavā, evametaṃ
tika-s0301t:79_12: sugatā”ti ettha ca bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha
tika-s0301t:79_13: saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ pakārehi haṃsanaṃ udaggatākaraṇaṃ sampahaṃsanaṃ. Yo tattha sampahaṃsanākāroti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:80_0: Evamevaṃ panāyanti ettha garahaṇākāroti yojetabbaṃ, so ca garahaṇākāro vasalīti-ādikhuṃsanasaddasannidhānato
tika-s0301t:80_1: idha evaṃ-saddena pakāsitoti viññāyati. Yathā cettha, evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena
tika-s0301t:80_2: vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ, bhanteti pana dhammassa
tika-s0301t:80_3: sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre sanniyojitehi bhikkhūhi attano tattha ṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanavasena
tika-s0301t:80_4: vuttattā ettha evaṃ-saddo “vacanasampaṭicchanattho”ti vutto. Tena evaṃ, bhanteti
tika-s0301t:80_5: sādhu, bhante, suṭṭhu, bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti. Evañca vadehīti yathāhaṃ vadāmi, evaṃ
tika-s0301t:80_6: samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehīti yo evaṃ vadanākāro idāni vattabbo, so evaṃ-saddena nidassīyatīti
tika-s0301t:80_7: “nidassanattho”ti vuttoti. Evaṃ noti etthāpi nesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve
tika-s0301t:80_8: sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatigahaṇavasena “saṃvattanti vā no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha
tika-s0301t:80_9: hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-saddena
tika-s0301t:80_10: vibhāvitanti viññāyati. So pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno
tika-s0301t:80_11: avadhāraṇattho hotīti āha – “evaṃ no ettha hotītiādīsu avadhāraṇe”ti.
tika-s0301t:81_1: vā ādhārādibhedavasena nānāvidhā nayā nānānayā. Nayā vā pāḷigatiyo tā ca paññattianupaññattiādivasena
tika-s0301t:81_4: ca nānappakārāti nānānayā, tehi nipuṇaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumanti nānānayanipuṇaṃ. Āsayova
tika-s0301t:81_5: ajjhāsayo, te ca sassatādibhedena tattha ca apparajakkhatādibhedena aneke, attajjhāsayādayo
tika-s0301t:81_6: eva vā samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu etassāti anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Atthabyañjanasampannanti
tika-s0301t:82_1: pāṭihāriya”nti vadanti. Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi ye haritabbā,
tika-s0301t:82_2: puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ
tika-s0301t:82_3: pavattati, tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ.
tika-s0301t:82_4: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā, tesaṃ haraṇato
tika-s0301t:82_5: “pāṭihāriya”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati yuttametaṃ. Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā
tika-s0301t:82_6: titthiyā, tesaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena
tika-s0301t:82_7: ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti. Paṭīti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti
tika-s0301t:82_8: etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0301t:82_9: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchāharitabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
tika-s0301t:82_10: paṭihāriyaṃ, attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:82_11: paṭihāriyaṃ, iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:82_12: puna pavattetabbā, haritesu ca attano upattilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni
tika-s0301t:82_13: hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti, paṭihāriyameva pāṭihāriyaṃ. Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye
tika-s0301t:82_14: bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati. Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0301t:82_15: tattha jātaṃ, tasmiṃ vā nimittabhūte, tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Tassa pana iddhiādibhedena
tika-s0301t:82_16: visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāyaṃ labbhamānattā āha “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti.
tika-s0301t:83_0: Na aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathāti attho, na pana bhagavato
tika-s0301t:83_1: desitākārato. Acinteyyānubhāvā hi bhagavato desanā. Evañca katvā “sabbappakārena
tika-s0301t:83_2: ko samattho viññātu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati, dhāraṇabaladassanañca na
tika-s0301t:83_3: virujjhati sutākāraavirajjhanassa adhippetattā. Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi
tika-s0301t:83_4: atthānaṃ ekavisayattā. Itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho
tika-s0301t:84_0: “Yo paro na hoti, so attā”ti evaṃ vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya sasantatiyā vattanato
tika-s0301t:84_1: tividhopi me-saddo kiñcāpi ekasmiṃ eva atthe dissati, karaṇasampadānasāminiddesavasena
tika-s0301t:84_2: pana vijjamānaṃ bhedaṃ sandhāyāha, “me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:85_0: Kiñcāpi upasaggo kiriyaṃ viseseti, jotakabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ suta-saddo eva
tika-s0301t:85_1: taṃ taṃ attaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa suta-saddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:85_2: na virujjhatīti dassento “saupasaggo anupasaggo cā”tiādimāha. Assāti suta-saddassa.
tika-s0301t:85_3: Kammabhāvasādhanāni idha sutasadde sambhavantīti vuttaṃ “upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti
tika-s0301t:85_4: vā attho”ti. Mayāti atthe satīti yadā me-saddassa kattuvasena karaṇaniddeso, tadāti
tika-s0301t:85_5: attho. Mamāti atthe satīti yadā sambandhavasena sāminiddeso, tadā.
tika-s0301t:86_0: Suta-saddasannidhāne payuttena evaṃ-saddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:86_2: tadabhinīhaṭānañca manodvārikaviññāṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sabbesampi vākyānaṃ
tika-s0301t:86_3: evakāratthasahitattā “suta”nti etassa sutamevāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0301t:86_4: Etena avadhāraṇena nirāsaṅkataṃ dasseti. Yathā ca sutaṃ sutamevāti niyametabbaṃ,
tika-s0301t:86_5: taṃ sammā sutaṃ hotīti āha “anūnānadhikāviparītaggahaṇanidassana”nti. Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena
tika-s0301t:86_6: saddo atthaṃ vadatīti sutanti asutaṃ na hotīti ayametassa atthoti vuttaṃ “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0301t:87_0: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – na idaṃ mayā diṭṭhaṃ, na sayambhūñāṇena sacchikataṃ, atha kho
tika-s0301t:87_2: Avadhāraṇatthe vā evaṃ-sadde ayamatthayojanā karīyatīti tadapekkhassa suta-saddassa
tika-s0301t:88_0: Evaṃ savanahetusavanavisesavasena padattayassa ekena pakārena atthayojanaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0301t:88_1: idāni pakārantarehi taṃ dassetuṃ “tathā eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tassāti yā sā bhagavato
tika-s0301t:88_2: sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvāraviññāṇavīthi, tassā. Sā hi nānappakārena
tika-s0301t:88_3: ārammaṇe pavattetuṃ samatthā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “sotadvārānusārenā”ti. Nānappakārenāti
tika-s0301t:88_4: vakkhamānānaṃ anekavihitānaṃ byañjanatthaggahaṇānaṃ nānākārena. Etena imissā yojanāya
tika-s0301t:88_5: ākārattho evaṃ-saddo gahitoti dīpeti. Pavattibhāvappakāsananti pavattiyā atthitāpakāsanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:88_6: Sutanti dhammappakāsananti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi nānappakārena
tika-s0301t:88_7: pavattā, tassa dhammattā vuttaṃ, na suta-saddassa dhammatthattā. Vuttassevatthassa
tika-s0301t:88_8: pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ “ayaṃ hetthā”tiādi. Tattha viññāṇavīthiyāti karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, mayāti kattuatthe.
tika-s0301t:89_0: Evanti niddisitabbappakāsananti nidassanatthamevaṃ saddaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ nidassetabbassa
tika-s0301t:89_1: niddisitabbattābhāvābhāvato. Tena evaṃ-saddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:89_3: tattha ca puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ “sutanti puggalakiccappakāsana”nti. Na hi puggalavohārarahite
tika-s0301t:90_0: Yassa cittasantānassātiādipi ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathā
tika-s0301t:90_1: atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ākārapaññattīti upādāpaññatti eva dhammānaṃ
tika-s0301t:90_2: pavattiākārupādānavasena tathā vuttā. Sutanti visayaniddesoti sotabbabhūto dhammo
tika-s0301t:90_3: savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānanti katvā vuttaṃ. Cittasantānavinimuttassa
tika-s0301t:90_4: paramatthato kassaci kattu abhāvepi saddavohārena buddhiparikappitabhedavacanicchāya
tika-s0301t:90_5: cittasantānato aññaṃ viya taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā vuttaṃ “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgīno”ti.
tika-s0301t:90_7: paramatthato kattubhāvato, savanavasena cittappavattiyā eva vā savanakiriyābhāvato
tika-s0301t:90_8: taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti vuttaṃ “taṃsamaṅgīno kattuvisaye”ti. Sutākārassa
tika-s0301t:90_9: ca therassa sammānicchitabhāvato āha “gahaṇasanniṭṭhāna”nti. Etena vā avadhāraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:91_0: Pubbe sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa
tika-s0301t:91_1: nidassanassa, avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanasabhāvo evaṃ-saddoti tadākārādiupadhāraṇassa
tika-s0301t:91_3: Savanakiriyā pana puggalavādinopi viññāṇanirapekkhā natthīti visesato viññāṇabyāpāroti
tika-s0301t:91_4: āha “sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti. Meti saddappavattiyā ekanteneva sattavisayattā
tika-s0301t:91_8: āha – “evanti puggalakiccaniddeso, sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti. Ettha ca karaṇakiriyākattukamma-visesappakāsanavasena
tika-s0301t:91_10: kattukaraṇabyāpāra-kattuniddesavasena ca dutiyādayo catasso atthayojanā dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:92_0: Sabbassapi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca
tika-s0301t:92_1: vijjamānādivasena chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ
tika-s0301t:92_2: sarūpaṃ niddhārento āha “evanti ca meti cā”tiādi. Tattha evanti ca meti ca vuccamānassa
tika-s0301t:92_3: atthassa ākārādino dhammānaṃ asalakkhaṇabhāvato avijjamānapaññattibhāvoti āha “saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena
tika-s0301t:92_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtattho, anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya
tika-s0301t:92_6: anuttamattho ca na hoti, so rūpasaddādisabhāvo, ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvo vā attho
tika-s0301t:92_7: saccikaṭṭho paramattho cāti vuccati, na tathā evaṃ meti padānaṃ atthoti. Etamevatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:92_8: pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “kiñhetthata”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sutanti pana saddāyatanaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0301t:92_9: “vijjamānapaññattī”ti. Teneva hi “yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdha”nti vuttaṃ. Sotadvārānusārena
tika-s0301t:92_10: upaladdhanti pana vutte atthabyañjanādi sabbaṃ labbhatīti. Taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbatoti
tika-s0301t:92_11: sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādino paccāmasanavasena evanti,
tika-s0301t:92_12: sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe upādāya meti vattabbattāti attho. Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite
tika-s0301t:92_13: saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko viya paṭhamādīni diṭṭhamutaviññāte
tika-s0301t:92_14: apekkhitvā pavattoti āha “diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbato”ti. Asutaṃ na hotīti hi
tika-s0301t:93_0: Attanā paṭividdhā suttassa pakāravisesā evanti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti āha “asammohaṃ
tika-s0301t:93_1: dīpetī”ti. Nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho hotīti etena vakkhamānassa suttassa nānappakārataṃ
tika-s0301t:93_2: duppaṭivijjhatañca dasseti. Sutassa asammosaṃ dīpetīti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā
tika-s0301t:93_3: vuttaṃ. Asammohenāti sammohābhāvena, paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya taduttarakālapaññāsiddhi.
tika-s0301t:93_4: Evaṃ asammosenāti etthāpi vattabbaṃ. Byañjanānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro nātigambhīro
tika-s0301t:93_5: yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko, paññā tattha guṇībhūtāti
tika-s0301t:93_6: vuttaṃ “paññāpubbaṅgamāyā”tiādi paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā. Pubbaṅgamatā cettha padhānatā
tika-s0301t:93_7: “manopubbaṅgamā”tiādīsu viya. Pubbaṅgamatāya vā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādīnaṃ viya
tika-s0301t:93_8: appadhānatte paññā pubbaṅgamā etissāti ayampi attho yujjati, evaṃ sati pubbaṅgamāyāti
tika-s0301t:93_9: etthāpi vuttavipariyāyena yathāsambhavaṃ attho veditabbo. Atthabyañjanasampannassāti
tika-s0301t:94_0: Yoniso manasikāraṃ dīpeti evaṃ-saddena vuccamānānaṃ ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthānaṃ
tika-s0301t:94_2: bhāsita”ntiādipucchāvasena pakaraṇappavattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena
tika-s0301t:94_3: na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Vikkhittacittassātiādi tassevatthassa samatthanavasena
tika-s0301t:94_5: viya ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthehi yonisomanasikārassa, saddhammassavanena viya ca
tika-s0301t:94_7: siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato, evaṃ avikkhepeneva phalabhūtena kāraṇabhūtānaṃ saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ
tika-s0301t:94_8: siddhi dassetabbā siyā assutavato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa ca tadabhāvato. “Na
tika-s0301t:94_9: hi vikkhittacitto”tiādinā samatthanavacanena pana avikkhepena kāraṇabhūtena sappurisūpanissayena
tika-s0301t:94_10: ca phalabhūtassa saddhammassavanassa siddhi dassitā. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo yutto
tika-s0301t:94_11: siyā, saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhiraṅgattā.
tika-s0301t:94_12: Avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇanti, evampi
tika-s0301t:94_13: avikkhepena sappurisūpanissayasiddhijotanā na samatthitāva, no na samatthitā vikkhittacittānaṃ
tika-s0301t:94_14: sappurisapayirūpāsanābhāvassa atthasiddhito. Ettha ca purimaṃ phalena kāraṇassa siddhidassanaṃ
tika-s0301t:94_15: nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa. Dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa siddhidassanaṃ
tika-s0301t:95_1: niravasesaparahita-pāripūrikāraṇanti vuttaṃ “evaṃ bhaddako ākāro”ti. Yasmā na hotīti
tika-s0301t:95_3: guṇadvayaṃ. Aparāparavuttiyā cettha cakkabhāvo, caranti etehi sattā, sampattibhavesūti
tika-s0301t:95_4: vā. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0301t:95_5: catucakkaṃ vattatī”tiādi. Purimapacchimabhāvo cettha desanakkamavasena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t:95_7: pubbe ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti tadasuddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvatoti āha
tika-s0301t:95_8: “āsayasuddhi siddhā hotī”ti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ
tika-s0301t:95_9: tato kare”ti “katapuññosi, tvaṃ ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja, khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo”ti
tika-s0301t:95_12: vā kāyavacīpayogassa niddosabhāvena. Parisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato
tika-s0301t:96_1: asammohāsammosadīpanato catupaṭisambhidāvasena atthayojanaṃ dasseti. Tattha sotabbabhedapaṭivedhadīpakenāti
tika-s0301t:96_2: etena ayaṃ suta-saddo evaṃ-saddasannidhānato, vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva sotabbadhammavisesaṃ
tika-s0301t:96_3: āmasatīti dīpeti. Manodiṭṭhīhi pariyattidhammānaṃ anupekkhanasuppaṭivedhā visesato
tika-s0301t:96_4: manasikārapaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena yonisomanasikāradīpakena evaṃ saddena yojetvā,
tika-s0301t:96_6: vuttanayena avikkhepadīpakena suta-saddena yojetvā dassento sāsanasampattiyā dhammassavane
tika-s0301t:96_7: ussāhaṃ janeti. Tattha dhammāti pariyattidhammā. Manasā anupekkhitāti “idha sīlaṃ
tika-s0301t:96_8: kathitaṃ, idha samādhi, idha paññā, ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā nayena manasā
tika-s0301t:96_9: anupekkhitā. Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti nijjhānakkhanti bhūtāya, ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya
tika-s0301t:96_10: vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā suṭṭhu
tika-s0301t:97_0: Sakalena vacanenāti pubbe tīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ yojitattā vuttaṃ. Attano adahantoti
tika-s0301t:97_1: “mameda”nti attani aṭṭhapento. Bhummatthe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Asappurisabhūminti akataññutaṃ.
tika-s0301t:97_2: “Idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī”ti
tika-s0301t:97_3: evaṃ vuttaṃ anariyavohārāvatthaṃ, sā eva anariyavohārāvatthā asaddhammo. Nanu ca
tika-s0301t:97_6: suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho vibhāvitoti dassanato. Keci pana “devatānaṃ parivitakkāpekkhaṃ
tika-s0301t:97_7: tathāvacananti edisī codanā anavakāsā”ti vadanti. Tasmiṃ kira khaṇe ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ
tika-s0301t:97_8: evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bhagavā ca parinibbuto, ayañca āyasmā desanākusalo
tika-s0301t:97_9: idāni dhammaṃ deseti, sakyakulappasuto tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapituputto. Kiṃ nu kho
tika-s0301t:97_10: sayaṃ sacchikataṃ dhammaṃ deseti? Udāhu bhagavato eva vacanaṃ yathāsuta”nti, evaṃ
tika-s0301t:97_12: nidasseti. Diṭṭhadhammika-samparāyika-paramatthesu yathārahaṃ satte netīti netti,
tika-s0301t:98_0: Daḷhataraniviṭṭhā vicikicchā kaṅkhā, nātisaṃsappanā matibhedamattā vimati. Assaddhiyaṃ
tika-s0301t:98_1: vināsetīti bhagavatā bhāsitattā sammukhāvassa paṭiggahitattā khalitaduruttādigahaṇadosābhāvato
tika-s0301t:98_2: ca. Ettha ca paṭhamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-saddaṃ
tika-s0301t:98_3: gahetvā dassitā, tato parā catasso ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā vibhāvitā. Pacchimā
tika-s0301t:98_4: pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ nidassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0301t:99_0: Eka-saddo aññaseṭṭhaasahāyasaṅkhayādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko
tika-s0301t:99_1: ca, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati. “Cetaso
tika-s0301t:99_2: ekodibhāva”ntiādīsu seṭṭhe, “eko vūpakaṭṭho”tiādīsu asahāye, “ekova kho, bhikkhave,
tika-s0301t:99_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhayāyaṃ. Idhāpi saṅkhayāyanti dassento
tika-s0301t:99_4: āha “ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso”ti. Kālañca samayañcāti yuttakālañca paccayasāmaggiñca.
tika-s0301t:99_5: Khaṇoti okāso. Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayassa paṭilābhahetuttā.
tika-s0301t:99_6: Khaṇo eva ca samayo, yo khaṇoti ca samayoti ca vuccati, so eko evāti hi attho. Mahāsamayoti
tika-s0301t:99_7: mahāsamūho. Samayopi khoti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa hetupi. Samayappavādaketi diṭṭhippavādake.
tika-s0301t:99_8: Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano samayaṃ pavadanti. Atthābhisamayāti hitapaṭilābhā.
tika-s0301t:99_9: Abhisametabboti abhisamayo, abhisamayo attho abhisamayatthoti pīḷanādīni abhisametabbabhāvena
tika-s0301t:99_10: ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni. Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayatthoti
tika-s0301t:99_11: tāneva tathā ekattena vuttāni. Tattha pīḷanaṃ dukkhasaccassa taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ
tika-s0301t:100_0: Tattha sahakārikāraṇaṃ sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati
tika-s0301t:100_1: ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo. Sameti ettha, etena
tika-s0301t:100_2: vā saṃgacchati satto, sabhāvadhammo vā sahajātādīhi, uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo.
tika-s0301t:100_3: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:100_4: viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ, saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ
tika-s0301t:100_5: pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho yathā “samudāyo”ti. Avayavasahāvaṭṭhānameva hi
tika-s0301t:100_6: samūhoti. Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-s0301t:100_7: hetu yathā “samudayo”ti. Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-s0301t:100_8: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo,
tika-s0301t:100_9: diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhantīti. Samiti saṃgati samodhānanti
tika-s0301t:100_10: samayo, paṭilābho. Samassa nirodhassa yānaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo apavatti samayo,
tika-s0301t:100_11: pahānaṃ. Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena sammā etabbo adhigantabboti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparīto
tika-s0301t:100_12: sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvāvabodho.
tika-s0301t:100_13: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddappavatti veditabbā. Samayasaddassa atthuddhāre
tika-s0301t:100_14: abhisamayasaddassa udāharaṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Assāti samayasaddassa. Kālo
tika-s0301t:100_15: attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato desadesakaparisānaṃ viya suttassa nidānabhāvena
tika-s0301t:101_0: Kasmā panettha aniyamitavaseneva kālo niddiṭṭho? Na utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamitoti
tika-s0301t:101_1: āha “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi. Utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samayasaddassa vacane
tika-s0301t:101_2: ayampi guṇo laddho hotīti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha. Sāmaññajotanā hi visese
tika-s0301t:101_5: pākaṭā. Yathāvuttappabhedesu eva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0301t:101_6: “yo cāya”ntiādimāha. Tathā hi ñāṇakiccasamayo, attahitapaṭipattisamayo ca abhisambodhisamayo,
tika-s0301t:102_0: Karaṇavacanena niddeso katoti sambandho. Tatthāti abhidhammatadaññasuttapadavinayesu.
tika-s0301t:102_1: Tathāti bhummakaraṇehi. Adhikaraṇattho ādhārattho. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, tāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:102_2: bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ. Tattha yathā kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato
tika-s0301t:102_3: avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato
tika-s0301t:102_4: “pubbaṇhe jāto, sāyanhe gacchatī”ti ca ādīsu, samūho ca avayavavinimutto visuṃ avijjamānopi
tika-s0301t:102_5: kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati yathā “rukkhe sākhā, yavarāsiyaṃ
tika-s0301t:102_6: sambhūto”tiādīsu, evaṃ idhāpīti dassento āha “adhikaraṇañhi…pe… dhammāna”nti. Yasmiṃ
tika-s0301t:102_7: kāle, dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ eva kāle dhammapuñje
tika-s0301t:102_8: ca phassādayopi hontīti ayaṃ hi tattha attho. Yathā ca “gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato,
tika-s0301t:102_9: duddhāsu āgato”ti dohanakiriyāya gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati, evaṃ idhāpi yasmiṃ samaye,
tika-s0301t:102_10: tasmiṃ samayeti ca vutte “satī”ti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvatoti
tika-s0301t:102_11: samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā phassādibhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyati.
tika-s0301t:102_12: Yasmiṃ samayeti yasmiṃ navame khaṇe, yasmiṃ yonisomanasikārādihetumhi, paccayasamavāye
tika-s0301t:102_13: vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe, hetumhi, paccayasamavāye
tika-s0301t:102_14: vā phassādayopi hontīti ubhayattha samayasadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti
tika-s0301t:103_0: Hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati “annena vasati, vijjāya vasati, pharasunā chindati,
tika-s0301t:103_1: kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu viya. Vītikkamañhi sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ
tika-s0301t:103_2: puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuotiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva
tika-s0301t:103_3: kālena sikkhāpadāni paññapento bhagavā viharati sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno
tika-s0301t:104_0: Accantameva ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ. Parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena
tika-s0301t:104_2: kato yathā “māsaṃ sajjhāyatī”ti. Porāṇāti aṭṭhakathācariyā. Abhilāpamattabhedoti
tika-s0301t:104_3: vacanamattena viseso. Tena suttavinayesu vibhattibyattayo katoti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:105_0: Seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ “seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato, tathā
tika-s0301t:105_2: vā gāravayutto. Vuttoyeva, na pana idha vattabbo visuddhimaggassa imissā aṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0301t:106: Aparo nayo – bhāgavāti bhagavā, bhatavāti bhagavā, bhāge vanīti bhagavā, bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhattavāti bhagavā, bhage vamīti bhagavā, bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
tika-s0301t:107: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-s0301t:108: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”.
tika-s0301t:109_0: Tattha kathaṃ bhāgavāti bhagavā? Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā,
tika-s0301t:109_1: te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgate atthi upalabbhanti. Tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi
tika-s0301t:109_2: paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ, hirī ottappaṃ, saddhā vīriyaṃ, sati sampajaññaṃ,
tika-s0301t:109_3: sīlavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi, samatho vipassanā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi sucaritāni,
tika-s0301t:109_4: tayo sammāvitakkā, tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro
tika-s0301t:109_5: sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ariyaphalāni, catasso
tika-s0301t:109_6: paṭisambhidā, catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni, cattāro ariyavaṃsā, cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni,
tika-s0301t:109_7: pañca padhāniyaṅgāni, pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, pañcindriyāni,
tika-s0301t:109_8: pañca balāni, pañca nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni, pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā
tika-s0301t:109_9: saññā, cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, cha gāravā, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, cha satatavihārā,
tika-s0301t:109_10: cha anuttariyāni, cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, cha abhiññā, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni, satta
tika-s0301t:109_11: aparihāniyā dhammā, satta ariyadhammā, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, satta
tika-s0301t:109_12: sappurisadhammā, satta nijjaravatthūni, satta saññā, sattadakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā,
tika-s0301t:109_14: aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni, aṭṭhaakkhaṇadesanā, aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā, aṭṭhaabhibhāyatanadesanā,
tika-s0301t:109_15: aṭṭha vimokkhā, nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā, nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni,
tika-s0301t:109_16: navasattāvāsadesanā, nava āghātapaṭivinayā, nava saññā, navanānattā, nava anupubbavihārā,
tika-s0301t:109_17: dasa nāthakaraṇā dhammā, dasa kasiṇāyatanāni, dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa sammattāni,
tika-s0301t:109_18: dasa ariyavāsā, dasa asekkhadhammā, dasa tathāgatabalāni, ekādasa mettānisaṃsā, dvādasa
tika-s0301t:109_19: dhammācakkākārā, terasa dhutaguṇā, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā
tika-s0301t:109_20: dhammā, soḷasavidhā ānāpānassati, soḷasa aparantapanīyā dhammā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā,
tika-s0301t:109_21: ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni, catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni, paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni,
tika-s0301t:109_24: anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā
tika-s0301t:109_25: niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti, tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā
tika-s0301t:109_26: guṇabhāgā assa atthīti “bhāgavā”ti vattabbe ākārassa rassattaṃ katvā “bhagavā”ti
tika-s0301t:112_0: Kathaṃ bhatavāti bhagavā? Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha
tika-s0301t:112_1: dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūritabbā
tika-s0301t:112_2: dānapāramī, sīla, nekkhamma, paññā, vīriya, khanti, sacca, adhiṭṭhāna, mettā, upekkhāpāramīti
tika-s0301t:112_3: dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo, dānādīni
tika-s0301t:112_4: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, saccādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, aṅgapariccāgo, jīvita, rajja,
tika-s0301t:112_5: putta, dārapariccāgoti pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:112_6: ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā, buddhicariyāti evamādayo, saṅkhepato vā sabbe puññañāṇasambhārā
tika-s0301t:112_7: buddhakaradhammā, te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri
tika-s0301t:112_8: asaṅkhyeyyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti, atha kho
tika-s0301t:112_9: uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva honti, evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā
tika-s0301t:112_10: assa atthīti “bhatavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena ta-kārassa ga-kāraṃ
tika-s0301t:112_11: katvā. Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakaradhamme vuttanayeneva bhari,
tika-s0301t:112_12: sambhari, paripūresīti attho. Evampi bhatavāti bhagavā.
tika-s0301t:114: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato”.
tika-s0301t:115_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vanīti bhagavā? Ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā,
tika-s0301t:115_1: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ vani,
tika-s0301t:115_2: bhaji, sevi, bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu kusalādīsu
tika-s0301t:115_3: khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
tika-s0301t:115_4: vitthārato pana “cakkhu pariññeyyaṃ sotaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādinā aneke
tika-s0301t:115_5: pariññeyyabhāgā, “cakkhussa samudayo pahātabbo…pe… jarāmaraṇassa samudayo pahātabbo”tiādinā
tika-s0301t:115_8: ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā, te sabbe vani, bhaji, yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ
tika-s0301t:115_9: vasena sevi. Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā “ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā
tika-s0301t:115_10: sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā, kinti nu kho te vineyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya”nti
tika-s0301t:115_11: mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi, sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi.
tika-s0301t:117: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato”.
tika-s0301t:118_0: Kathaṃ bhage vanīti bhagavā? Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ
tika-s0301t:118_1: bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo. Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sammāsambodhito
tika-s0301t:118_2: pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate, vani, bhaji, sevi, yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato
tika-s0301t:118_3: buddhakaradhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi, buddhabhūto pana te niravajjesu
tika-s0301t:118_4: upasaṃhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi, vani, bhaji, sevi, vitthārato pana padesarajja-issariyacakkavattisampatti-devarajjasampattiādivasena
tika-s0301t:118_6: ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe, bhage, vani, bhaji, sevi. Evampi bhage vanīti bhagavā.
tika-s0301t:119: “Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthu;
tika-s0301t:120: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato”.
tika-s0301t:121_0: Kathaṃ sattavāti bhagavā? Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā. Tathāgato
tika-s0301t:121_3: niratisayāya payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya accantupakāritāya dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasīti
tika-s0301t:121_5: “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpinā suvipulena suvisuddhena ca
tika-s0301t:121_8: ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno, dhammappamāṇo dhammappasannoti
tika-s0301t:121_9: evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā
tika-s0301t:121_11: Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti, kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ
tika-s0301t:121_12: pasādabhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā. Tathā hi
tika-s0301t:121_13: te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti, tassa vā āṇaṃ daḷhabhattibhāvato.
tika-s0301t:125_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati, evameva kho, bhikkhave,
tika-s0301t:125_1: yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca. –
tika-s0301t:126: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0301t:128: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:129_0: Kathaṃ bhage vamīti bhagavā? Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi aparimāṇāsu jātīsu
tika-s0301t:129_1: pāramiyo paripūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri, kheḷapiṇḍaṃ
tika-s0301t:129_2: viya anapekkho chaḍḍayi, carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṃ cakkavattisiriṃ devalokādhipaccasadisaṃ
tika-s0301t:129_4: amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, tasmā
tika-s0301t:129_5: ime sirīādike bhage vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti
tika-s0301t:129_7: sobhā kappaṭṭhiyabhāvato, tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsisattāvāsasamatikkamato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena
tika-s0301t:132_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vamīti bhagavā? Bhāgā nāma sabhāgadhammakoṭṭhāsā, te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena,
tika-s0301t:132_1: tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena pathaviyādivasena atītādivasena ca anekavidhā, te ca
tika-s0301t:132_2: bhagavā sabbaṃ papañcaṃ sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā
tika-s0301t:132_3: amatadhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri, anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami. Tathā
tika-s0301t:132_4: hesa “sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ, cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ
tika-s0301t:132_5: manaṃ, rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t:132_7: vedanaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ saññaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ saññaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ
tika-s0301t:132_8: cetanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ, rūpataṇhaṃ…pe… dhammataṇhaṃ, rūpavitakkaṃ…pe…
tika-s0301t:132_10: sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri, anapekkhapariccāgena chaḍḍayi. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0301t:132_11: “yaṃ taṃ, ānanda, cattaṃ vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tathāgato puna
tika-s0301t:132_12: paccāvamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti. Evampi bhāge vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāge
tika-s0301t:132_13: vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme
tika-s0301t:132_14: ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri, anapekkho pariccaji pajahi, paresañca tathattāya
tika-s0301t:132_15: dhammaṃ desesi. Vuttampi cetaṃ “dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā.
tika-s0301t:132_16: Kullūpamaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:134: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato”.
tika-s0301t:136: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-s0301t:137: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
tika-s0301t:138_0: Dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karotīti “yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito
tika-s0301t:138_1: paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatīti
tika-s0301t:138_2: katvā vuttaṃ. Vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo parehi abhejjasarīrattā. Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye
tika-s0301t:138_3: kenaci sakkā antarāyaṃ kātunti. Desanāsampattiṃ niddisati vakkhamānassa sakalassa
tika-s0301t:138_4: suttassa “eva”nti nidassanato. Sāvakasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāppattena pañcasu
tika-s0301t:138_5: ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ, tañca kho mayāva sutaṃ,
tika-s0301t:138_6: na anussutaṃ na paraṃparābhatanti imassatthassa dīpanato. Kālasampattiṃ niddisati
tika-s0301t:142_0: Avisesenāti na visesena, vihārabhāvasāmaññenāti attho. Iriyāpatha…pe… vihāresūti
tika-s0301t:142_1: iriyāpathavihāro, dibbavihāro, brahmavihāro, ariyavihāroti etesu catūsu vihāresu.
tika-s0301t:142_2: Samaṅgīparidīpananti samaṅgībhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Etanti “viharatī”ti etaṃ padaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0301t:142_3: hi taṃ “idhekacco gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī”tiādīsu iriyāpathavihāre
tika-s0301t:142_4: āgataṃ. “Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-s0301t:142_5: viharatī”ti ettha dibbavihāre. “So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādīsu
tika-s0301t:142_6: brahmavihāre. “So kho ahaṃ, aggivessana, tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃ eva
tika-s0301t:142_7: purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi
tika-s0301t:142_8: samādahāmi, yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”tiādīsu ariyavihāre.
tika-s0301t:143_0: Tattha iriyanaṃ vattanaṃ iriyā, kāyappayogo. Tassā pavattanupāyabhāvato ṭhānādi iriyāpatho.
tika-s0301t:143_1: Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vā. Atha vā iriyati
tika-s0301t:143_2: pavattati etena attabhāvo kāyakiccaṃ vāti iriyā, tassā pavattiupāyabhāvato iriyā
tika-s0301t:143_3: ca so patho cāti iriyāpatho, ṭhānādi eva. So ca atthato gatinivattiādiākārena pavatto
tika-s0301t:143_4: catusantatirūpapabandho eva. Viharaṇaṃ, viharati etenāti vā vihāro, iriyāpatho eva
tika-s0301t:143_5: vihāro iriyāpathavihāro. Divi bhavo dibbo, tattha bahulappavattiyā brahmapārisajjādidevaloke
tika-s0301t:143_6: bhavoti attho. Tattha yo dibbānubhāvo, tadatthāya saṃvattatīti vā dibbo, abhiññābhinīhāravasena
tika-s0301t:143_7: mahāgatikattā vā dibbo, dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro, catasso rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo.
tika-s0301t:143_8: Āruppasamāpattiyopi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Brahmūnaṃ, brahmāno vā vihārā brahmavihārā,
tika-s0301t:143_9: catasso appamaññāyo. Ariyānaṃ, ariyā vā vihārā ariyavihārā, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni.
tika-s0301t:143_10: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanantiādi yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ
tika-s0301t:143_11: kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti, tathāpi upādinnakasarīrassa nāma ayaṃ sabhāvoti
tika-s0301t:143_12: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto vineyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento,
tika-s0301t:143_13: nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento vasatīti sattānaṃ attano ca vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ
tika-s0301t:143_14: harati upaneti uppādeti, tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:144_0: Paccatthike jinātīti jeto. Jeta-saddo hi sota-saddo viya kattusādhanopi atthīti.
tika-s0301t:144_1: Rañño vā paccatthikānaṃ jitakāle jātattā jeto. Rañño hi attano jayaṃ tattha āropetvā
tika-s0301t:144_2: jitavāti jetoti kumāro vutto. Maṅgalakāmatāya vā jetotissa nāmaṃ kataṃ, tasmā “jeyyo”ti
tika-s0301t:144_3: etasmiṃ atthe “jeto”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tassa jetassa rājakumārassa. Vanetiādito
tika-s0301t:144_4: paṭṭhāyeva taṃ tassa santakanti dassetuṃ “taṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbakāmasamiddhitāya
tika-s0301t:144_5: vigatamalamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya ca niccakālaṃ upaṭṭhapito anāthānaṃ
tika-s0301t:144_6: piṇḍo etassa atthīti anāthapiṇḍiko, tassa anāthapiṇḍikassa. Yadi jetavanaṃ, kathaṃ
tika-s0301t:144_8: āramanti ettha pabbajitāti ārāmo, tasmiṃ ārāme. Yadipi so bhūmibhāgo koṭisantharena
tika-s0301t:144_9: mahāseṭṭhinā kīto, rukkhā pana jetena na vikkītāti taṃ “jetavana”nti vattabbataṃ
tika-s0301t:144_10: labhatīti vadanti. Ubhinnampi vā tattha pariccāgavisesakittanatthaṃ ubhayavacanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:144_11: jetenapi hi bhūmibhāgavikkayena laddhadhanaṃ tattha dvārakoṭṭhakakaraṇavasena viniyuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:144_12: Sāvatthijetavanānaṃ bhūmibhāgavasena bhinnattā vuttaṃ “na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ
tika-s0301t:145_0: Apākaṭāti sakko suyāmotiādinā anabhiññātā. Abhiññātānampi aññatarasaddo dissateva
tika-s0301t:145_1: ekasadisāyattattāti dassetuṃ “abhijānāti no”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ahunā idāneva. Sādhāraṇavacanaṃ
tika-s0301t:145_2: dibbataṃ antonītaṃ katvā. Devo eva devatā purisepi vattanato. Tenevāha “imasmiṃ panatthe”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:145_3: Nanu ca rūpāvacarasattānaṃ purisindriyaṃ natthi, yena te purisāti vucceyyuṃ? Yadipi
tika-s0301t:145_4: purisindriyaṃ natthi, purisasaṇṭhānassa pana purisavesassa ca vasena purisapuggalātveva
tika-s0301t:146_0: Abhikkantāti atikkantā, vigatāti atthoti āha “khaye dissatī”ti. Teneva hi “nikkhanto
tika-s0301t:146_1: paṭhamo yāmo”ti upari vuttaṃ. Abhikkantataroti ativiya kantataro. Tādiso ca sundaro
tika-s0301t:146_2: bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti. Koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko
tika-s0301t:146_3: katamo? Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde. Iddhiyāti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. Yasasāti
tika-s0301t:146_4: iminā edisena parivārena paricchadena ca. Jalanti vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya
tika-s0301t:146_5: kantena kamaniyena abhirūpena. Vaṇṇenāti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. Sabbā obhāsayaṃ
tika-s0301t:146_6: disāti sabbāpi disā pabhāsento cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti
tika-s0301t:147_1: Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare.
tika-s0301t:147_2: Vaṇṇanaṃ kittiyā ugghosananti vaṇṇo, thuti. Vaṇṇīyati asaṅkarato vavatthapīyatīti
tika-s0301t:147_3: vaṇṇo, kulavaggo. Vaṇṇīyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāvīyatīti vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:147_4: Vaṇṇanaṃ dīgharassādivasena saṇṭhahananti vaṇṇo, saṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati aṇumahantādivasena
tika-s0301t:147_5: pamīyatīti vaṇṇo, pamāṇaṃ. Vaṇṇeti vikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti
tika-s0301t:147_6: vaṇṇo, rūpāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ tena tena pavattinimittena vaṇṇasaddassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe
tika-s0301t:147_7: pavatti veditabbā. Iddhiṃ māpetvāti vatthālaṅkārakāyādīhi obhāsamuñcanādivasena dibbaṃ
tika-s0301t:147_8: iddhānubhāvaṃ nimminitvā. Kāmāvacarā anabhisaṅkhatenapi āgantuṃ sakkonti oḷārikarūpattā.
tika-s0301t:147_9: Tathā hi te kabaḷīkārabhakkhā. Rūpāvacarā na sakkonti tato sukhumatararūpattā. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:147_10: “tesaṃ hī”tiādi. Tattha “atisukhumo”ti mūlapaṭisandhirūpaṃ sandhāya vadati. Na tena
tika-s0301t:147_11: iriyāpathakappanaṃ hotīti etena brahmalokepi brahmāno yebhuyyena nimmitarūpeneva
tika-s0301t:147_12: pavattantīti dasseti. Itarañhi ativiya sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ kevalaṃ cittuppādassa nissayādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
tika-s0301t:148_0: Anavasesattaṃ sakalatā. Yebhuyyatā bahulabhāvo. Abyāmissatā vijātiyena asaṅkaro.
tika-s0301t:148_1: Sukhena hi avokiṇṇatā tattha adhippetā. Anatirekatā taṃparamatā visesābhāvo. Kevalakappanti
tika-s0301t:148_2: kevalaṃ daḷhaṃ katvāti attho. Saṅghabhedāyāti saṅghe vivādāya, vivāduppādāyāti attho.
tika-s0301t:148_3: Kevalaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatavivittattā, etassa taṃ atthīti kevalī, sacchikatanirodho
tika-s0301t:149_0: Kappasaddo panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappaniyapade labbhamānaṃ
tika-s0301t:149_1: kappasaddamattaṃ dasseti, aññathā kappapadaṃ anidassanameva siyā. Samaṇakappehīti
tika-s0301t:149_2: vinayasiddhehi samaṇavohārehi. Niccakappanti niccakālaṃ. Paññattīti nāmaṃ. Nāmañhetaṃ
tika-s0301t:149_3: tassa āyasmato, yadidaṃ kappoti. Kappitakesamassūti kattarikāya cheditakesamassu.
tika-s0301t:149_4: Dvaṅgulakappoti majjhanhikavelāya vītikkantāya dvaṅgulatāvikappo. Lesoti apadeso.
tika-s0301t:149_5: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenacipi kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
tika-s0301t:149_6: ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-saddo gahitoti āha “anavasesaṃ
tika-s0301t:149_7: samantato”ti. Īsaṃ asamattaṃ, kevalaṃ vā kevalakappaṃ. Bhagavato ābhāya anobhāsitameva
tika-s0301t:149_8: hi padesaṃ devatā attano pabhāya obhāsenti. Na hi bhagavato pabhā kāyaci pabhāya
tika-s0301t:149_9: abhibhuyyati, sūriyādīnampi pabhaṃ sā abhibhuyya tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-s0301t:150_0: Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Hetuattho hi kiriyāya kāraṇaṃ, na
tika-s0301t:150_1: karaṇaṃ viya kiriyattho, tasmā nānappakāra-guṇavisesādhigamanatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti
tika-s0301t:150_2: “annena vasati, vijjāya vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthameva taṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:150_3: na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”tiādi. Bhagavato satatappavattaniratisaya-sāduvipulamatarasa-saddhammaphalatāya
tika-s0301t:150_5: hi mahākāruṇikassa sāduphalatā gahitāti. Upasaṅkamīti upasaṅkantā. Sampattakāmatāya
tika-s0301t:150_6: hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami, upasaṅkantoti vattabbataṃ
tika-s0301t:150_7: labhati. Tenāha “gatāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti, upagatāti attho. Upasaṅkamitvāti pubbakālakiriyāniddesoti
tika-s0301t:150_8: āha “upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpana”nti. Tatoti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ pattā “upasaṅkamī”ti vuttā,
tika-s0301t:151_0: Gatinivattiatthato sāmaññato āsanampi ṭhānaggahaṇena gayhatīti vuttaṃ “āsanakusalatāya
tika-s0301t:151_1: ekamantaṃ tiṭṭhantī”ti. Nisinnāpi hi gamanato nivattā nāma honti ṭhatvā nisīditabbattā,
tika-s0301t:151_3: nāma gahitaṃ. Taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthasaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:152_0: Kāmaṃ “katha”nti ayamākārapucchā, taraṇākāro idha pucchito. So pana taraṇākāro atthato
tika-s0301t:152_1: kāraṇamevāti āha “kathaṃ nūti kāraṇapucchā”ti? Pākaṭo abhisambodhiyaṃ mahāpathavīkampanādianekacchariyapātubhāvādinā.
tika-s0301t:153_0: Marisanaṭṭhena pāpānaṃ rogādianatthānaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena māriso, dukkharahito. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:153_2: yathā “devānaṃ piyā”ti. Tenevāha “yadi eva”ntiādi. Saṅkunā saṅkūti matthakato samakoṭṭitena
tika-s0301t:153_3: yāva hadayapadesā nibbijjhitvā otiṇṇena saṅkunā pādatalato samakoṭṭito saṅku nibbijjhitvā
tika-s0301t:153_4: ārohanto hadaye hadayassa padese samāgaccheyya, atha nesaṃ saṅkūnaṃ samāgamasamakāle
tika-s0301t:153_5: naṃ yathātikkantasaṅkukaraṇakālaṃ jāneyyāsi. Kiñci nimittaṃ upādāya kismiñci atthe
tika-s0301t:153_6: pavattassa saddassa tannimittarahite pavatti ruḷhī nāma gamanakiriyārahite sāsanādimati
tika-s0301t:154_0: Oghamatarīti yesaṃ oghānaṃ taraṇaṃ pucchitaṃ, te gaṇanaparicchedato sarūpato ca dassetuṃ
tika-s0301t:154_1: “cattāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kasmā panettha cattāro eva oghā vuttā, te ca kāmādayo evāti?
tika-s0301t:154_2: Na codetabbametaṃ, yasmā dhammānaṃ sabhāvakiccavisesaññunā bhagavatā sabbaṃ ñeyyaṃ
tika-s0301t:154_3: yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā ettakāva oghā desitā, ime eva ca desitāti. Vaṭṭasmiṃ ohananti
tika-s0301t:154_4: osīdāpentīti oghā, ohananti heṭṭhā katvā hananti gāmenti, tathābhūtā satte adho gāmenti
