tika-s0301t:154_5: nāma. Ayañca attho “sabbopi cesā”tiādinā parato aṭṭhakathāyameva āgamissati. Kāmanaṭṭhena
tika-s0301t:154_6: kāmo, kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena ogho cāti, kāmesu oghoti vā kāmogho. Bhavogho
tika-s0301t:154_7: nāma bhavarāgoti dassetuṃ “rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:154_8: Sumaṅgalavilāsinīādīsu pana “sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgo cā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamo
tika-s0301t:154_9: upapattibhavesu rāgo, dutiyo kammabhave. Bhavadiṭṭhivinimuttassa diṭṭhigatassa abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:155_0: Idāni tesaṃ oghasaṅkhātānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t:155_1: pavattiṭṭhānaṃ pana kāmaguṇādayo dassitā eva. “Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgo kāmogho”ti
tika-s0301t:155_2: ettha bhavoghaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbo lobho kāmoghoti yuttaṃ siyā. Sassatadiṭṭhisahagato
tika-s0301t:155_3: rāgo bhavadiṭṭhisampayuttattā bhavoghoti aṭṭhakathāsu vutto, bhavogho pana diṭṭhigatavippayuttesu
tika-s0301t:155_4: eva uppajjatīti pāḷiyaṃ vutto. Tenevāha – “bhavogho catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu
tika-s0301t:155_5: uppajjatī”ti. Tasmā diṭṭhisahagatalobhopi kāmoghoti yuttaṃ siyā. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikadukkhānañhi
tika-s0301t:155_6: kāraṇabhūtā kāmāsavādayopi dvidhā vuttā, āsavā eva ca oghā. Kāmāsavaniddese ca kāmesūti
tika-s0301t:155_7: kāmarāgadiṭṭhirāgādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu tebhūmakesu vatthukāmesūti attho sambhavati.
tika-s0301t:155_8: Tattha hi uppajjamānā sāyaṃ taṇhā sabbāpi na kāmacchandādināmaṃ na labhatīti.
tika-s0301t:156_0: Yadi pana pañcakāmaguṇiko ca rāgo kāmoghoti vuttoti katvā brahmānaṃ vimānādīsu rāgassa
tika-s0301t:156_1: diṭṭhirāgassa ca kāmoghabhāvo paṭisedhitabbo siyā, evaṃ sati kāmoghabhavoghavinimuttena
tika-s0301t:156_2: nāma lobhena bhavitabbaṃ. So yadā diṭṭhigatavippayuttesu uppajjati, tadā tena sampayutto
tika-s0301t:156_3: avijjogho oghavippayuttoti domanassavicikicchuddhaccasampayuttassa viya tassapi oghavippayuttatā
tika-s0301t:156_5: moho siyā oghasampayutto siyā oghavippayutto”ti. “Kāmogho aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatesu
tika-s0301t:156_6: cittuppādesu uppajjatī”ti, “kāmoghaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhogho avijjogho”ti ca vacanato diṭṭhisahagato
tika-s0301t:156_7: kāmogho na hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ. Tathā hettha “rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti
tika-s0301t:156_8: ca bhavogho nāmāti ettakameva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo”ti.
tika-s0301t:157_0: Adhogamanaṭṭhenāti heṭṭhāpavattanaṭṭhena. Heṭṭhāpavattanañcettha na kevalaṃ apāyagamaniyabhāvena,
tika-s0301t:157_1: atha kho saṃsāratarakāvarodhanenapīti dassetuṃ “uparibhavañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ
tika-s0301t:157_2: nibbānaṃ arūpibhāvā adesaṃ, na tassa ṭhānavasena uparigahaṇaṃ, sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭattā
tika-s0301t:157_3: pana sabbassapi bhavassa uparīti vattabbataṃ arahatīti katvā vuttaṃ “uparibhavaṃ
tika-s0301t:158_0: Appatiṭṭhahantoti kilesādīnaṃ vasena asantiṭṭhanto, asaṃsīdantoti attho. Anāyūhantoti
tika-s0301t:158_1: abhisaṅkhārādivasena na āyūhanto majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ vilaṅghitvā nibbuyhanto. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:158_2: – “avāyamanto”ti, micchāvāyāmavasena avāyamantoti adhippāyo. Gūḷhanti saṃvutaṃ. Paṭicchannanti
tika-s0301t:158_3: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Atthavasena vā saṃvuttaṃ gūḷhaṃ, saddavasenapi apākaṭaṃ paṭicchannaṃ
tika-s0301t:158_4: antaradīpādike ṭhātabbaṭṭhāne. Āyūhantāti hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyamantā. Etaṃ atthajātaṃ,
tika-s0301t:159_0: Idāni yenādhippāyena bhagavatā tathāgūḷhaṃ katvā pañho kathito, taṃ dassetuṃ “kiṃ
tika-s0301t:159_1: panātiādi vuttaṃ. Niggahamukhenāti veneyyānaṃ vinayaupāyabhūtaniggahavasena. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:159_2: ye paṇḍitamānino”tiādi. Pavayha pavayhāti ophuṇitvā ophuṇitvā.
tika-s0301t:160_0: Soti devaputto nihatamāno ahosi yathāvissajjitassa atthassa ajānanto. Yathāti aniyamavacanaṃ
tika-s0301t:160_1: niyamaniddiṭṭhaṃ hoti, taṃsambandhañca kathanti pucchāvacananti tadubhayassa atthaṃ
tika-s0301t:160_2: dassento “yathāhaṃ jānāmi, evaṃ me kathehī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:161_0: Yadāsvāhanti yadā su ahaṃ, su-kāro nipātamattaṃ “yadidaṃ kathaṃ sū”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t:161_1: Sabbapadesūti “tadāssu saṃsīdāmī”tiādīsu tīsupi padesu. Atarantoti oghānaṃ atikkamanatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:161_2: taraṇappayogaṃ akaronto. Tatthevāti oghaniyaoghesu eva. Osīdāmīti nimujjāmi oghehi
tika-s0301t:161_3: ajjhotthaṭo homi. Nibbuyhāmīti oghehi nibbūḷho homi. Ṭhātuṃ asakkonto asaṃsīdanto.
tika-s0301t:161_4: Ativattāmīti anupayogaṃ atikkamāmi, apanidhānavasena sammāpaṭipattiṃ virādhemīti
tika-s0301t:161_5: attho. Ṭhāne ca vāyāme cāti vakkhamānavibhāge patiṭṭhahane vāyāme ca dosaṃ disvāti
tika-s0301t:161_7: disvāna. Idaṃ bhagavatā bodhimūle attanā pavattita-pubbabhāga-manasikāravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:161_9: anibbuyhanto. Devatāyapi paṭividdho tadattho upanissayasampannatāya vimuttiparipācanīyadhammānaṃ
tika-s0301t:161_10: paripakkattā. Na pana pākaṭo vipañcitaññūādīnaṃ, ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ pana yathā tassā
tika-s0301t:161_11: devatāya, tathā pākaṭo evāti. Satta dukā idāni vuccamānarūpā dassitā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0301t:161_12: Kilesavasena santiṭṭhantoti lobhādīhi abhibhūtatāya saṃsāre patiṭṭhahanto sammā appaṭipajjanena
tika-s0301t:161_13: tattheva saṃsīdati nāma. Abhisaṅkhāravasenāti tatthevābhisaṅkhāracetanāya cetento
tika-s0301t:161_14: sammāpaṭipattiyogyassa khaṇassa ativattanena nibbuyhati nāma. Iminā nayena sesadukesupi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:162_0: Ettha ca vaṭṭamūlakā kilesāti tesaṃ vasena saṃsāre avaṭṭhānaṃ taṃtaṃkammunā tattha
tika-s0301t:162_1: tattha bhave abhinibbatti, kilesā pana tesaṃ paccayamattaṃ. Tattha tattha bhave aparāparaṃ
tika-s0301t:162_2: nibbattento saṃsāre nibbuyhati nāmāti imassa atthassa dassanavasena paṭhamaduko vutto.
tika-s0301t:162_3: Ime sattā saṃsāre paribbhamantā duvidhā taṇhācaritā diṭṭhicaritā cāti tesaṃ saṃsāranāyikabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0301t:162_4: dhammānaṃ vasena santiṭṭhanaṃ, tadaññesaṃ pavattipaccayānaṃ vasena āyūhananti imassa
tika-s0301t:162_5: atthassa dassanavasena dutiyaduko vutto. Saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādadassanasabhāvāya
tika-s0301t:162_6: taṇhāya vasena visesato patiṭṭhānaṃ, amuttimagge muttimaggaparāmāsato tathā āyūhanampi
tika-s0301t:162_7: diṭṭhiyā vasena hotīti dassetuṃ tatiyaduko vutto. Catutthaduke pana adhippāyo aṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0301t:162_8: eva vibhāvito. Yasmā “sassato attā”ti abhinivisanto arūparāgaṃ, asaññūpagaṃ vā avimokkhaṃyeva
tika-s0301t:162_9: vimokkhoti gahetvā saṃsāre eva olīyati. Tenāha “olīyanābhinivesā hi bhavadiṭṭhī”ti.
tika-s0301t:162_10: Yasmā pana kāmabhavādīsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā bhavaṃ patvā attā ucchijjati vinassati, na
tika-s0301t:162_11: hoti paraṃ maraṇāti abhinivisanto bhavavippamokkhāvahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanena
tika-s0301t:163_0: Līnavasena santiṭṭhantoti kosajjādivasena saṃkocāpajjanena sammā appaṭipajjanto.
tika-s0301t:163_1: Uddhaccavasena āyūhantoti sammāsamādhino abhāvena vikkhepavasena pañcamo duko vutto.
tika-s0301t:163_2: Yathā kāmasukhaṃ paviṭṭhassa samādhānaṃ natthi cittassa upakkiliṭṭhattā, evaṃ attaparitāpanamanuyuttassa
tika-s0301t:163_3: kāyassa upakkiliṭṭhattā. Iti cittakāyaparikkilesakarā dve antā taṇhādiṭṭhinissayatāya
tika-s0301t:163_4: saṃsīdananibbuyhananimittā vuttā chaṭṭhaduke. Pubbe sappadesatova saṃkilesadhammā
tika-s0301t:163_5: “saṃsīdananimitta”nti dassitāti idāni nippadesato dassanavasena, pubbe ca sādhāraṇato
tika-s0301t:163_8: saṃsīdananibbuyhanāni vibhajja dassitāni hontīti. Tenevāha “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi.
tika-s0301t:163_9: Adhobhāgaṃ duggatiṃ gamentīti adhobhāgaṅgamanīyā anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā. Tathā uparibhāgaṃ
tika-s0301t:164_0: Ettha ca oghataraṇaṃ pucchitena bhagavatā “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha”nti tassa pahānaṅgameva
tika-s0301t:164_1: dassitaṃ, na sampayogaṅganti? Na evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, yāvatā yena patiṭṭhānaṃ hoti, yena
tika-s0301t:164_2: ca āyūhanaṃ, tadubhayapaṭikkhepamukhena tappaṭipakkhadhammadassanametanti. Na hesa
tika-s0301t:164_3: a-kāro kevalaṃ paṭisedhe, atha kho paṭipakkhe “akusalā dhammā, ahito, adhammo”tiādīsu
tika-s0301t:164_4: viya, tasmā appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena pavattamāno
tika-s0301t:164_5: tathāpavattihetūvāti ayamettha attho. Khoti ca avadhāraṇatthe nipāto “assosi kho”tiādīsu
tika-s0301t:164_6: viya. Tena appatiṭṭhānassa ekaṃsikataṃ dasseti. Soyaṃ kho-saddo “anāyūha”nti etthāpi
tika-s0301t:164_7: ānetvā vattabbo. Anāyūhanampi hi ekaṃsikamevāti tassa paṭipakkho saha vipassanāya
tika-s0301t:164_8: ariyamaggo. Tena hi oghataraṇaṃ hoti, na aññathā. Evamayaṃ yathānusandhidesanā katā,
tika-s0301t:164_9: devatā ca sahavipassanaṃ maggaṃ paṭivijjhīti paṭhamaphale patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:165_0: “Cirassā”ti iminā samānatthaṃ padantarametanti āha “cirassa kālassā”ti yathā “mamaṃ
tika-s0301t:165_1: vā, bhikkhave”ti ettha “mamā”ti iminā samānatthaṃ padantaraṃ mamanti. Na diṭṭhapubbāti
tika-s0301t:165_2: adassāvī. Adassāvitā ca disvā kattabbakiccassa asiddhatāya veditabbā. Aññathā kā
tika-s0301t:165_3: nāma sā devatā, yā bhagavantaṃ na diṭṭhavatī? Tenāha “kiṃ panimāyā”tiādi. Dassanaṃ
tika-s0301t:165_4: upādāya evaṃ vattuṃ vattatīti yadā kadāci kañci piyajātikaṃ disvā taṃ dassanaṃ upādāya
tika-s0301t:165_5: “cirena vata mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ passāmā”ti adiṭṭhapubbaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ vā evaṃ vattuṃ
tika-s0301t:165_6: yujjati, ayaṃ loke niruḷhe samudācāroti dasseti. Brahmaṃ vā vuccati ariyamaggo, tassa
tika-s0301t:165_7: aṇanato jānanato paṭivijjhanato brāhmaṇo. Kilesanibbānenāti kilesānaṃ accantasamucchedasaṅkhātena
tika-s0301t:166_0: “Visatāti visattikā, visaṭāti visattikā, visālāti visattikā, visakkatīti visattikā,
tika-s0301t:166_1: visaṃvādikāti visattikā, visaṃ haratīti visattikā, visamūlāti visattikā, visaphalāti
tika-s0301t:166_2: visattikā, visaparibhogoti visattikā, visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase
tika-s0301t:166_3: phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe visatā vitthatāti visattikā”ti.
tika-s0301t:167_0: Tattha visatāti vitthatā rūpādīsu tebhūmakadhammesu abhibyāpanavasena visaṭāti purimavacanameva
tika-s0301t:167_1: ta-kārassa ṭa-kāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Visālāti vipulā. Visakkatīti parisakkati, sahati
tika-s0301t:167_2: vā. Ratto hi rāgavatthunā pādena tāḷiyamānopi sahatīti. Osakkanaṃ vipphandanaṃ vā
tika-s0301t:167_3: “visakkana”ntipi vadanti. Aniccādiṃ niccādito. Gaṇhātīti visaṃvādikā hoti. Visaṃ
tika-s0301t:167_4: haratīti tathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ passantī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito
tika-s0301t:167_5: cittaṃ saṃharati saṃkhipati, visaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, taṃ harati, vahatīti attho. Dukkhanibbattakakammassa
tika-s0301t:167_6: hetubhāvato visamūlā. Visaṃ vā dukkhābhibhūtā vedanā mūlaṃ etissāti visamūlā. Dukkhasamudayattā
tika-s0301t:167_7: visaṃ phalaṃ etissāti visaphalā. Taṇhāya rūpādikassa dukkhasseva paribhogo hoti,
tika-s0301t:167_8: na amatassāti visaparibhogoti vuttā, sabbattha niruttivasena padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0301t:167_9: Yo panettha padhāno attho, taṃ dassetuṃ puna “visālā vā panā”tiādi vuttanti evamettha
tika-s0301t:167_10: visattikāpadassa attho veditabbo. Tiṇṇaṃ paṭhamadutiyamaggehi. Nittiṇṇaṃ tatiyamaggena.
tika-s0301t:168_0: Samanuññoti sammadeva katānuñño. Tenāha “ekajjhāsayo ahosī”ti. Antaradhāyīti adassanaṃ
tika-s0301t:168_1: agamāsi. Yathā pana antaradhāyi, taṃ dassetuṃ “abhisaṅkhatakāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Mālehīti
tika-s0301t:168_2: liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, “mālāhī”ti keci paṭhanti, “malyehī”ti vattabbe ya-kāralopaṃ
tika-s0301t:168_3: katvā niddeso. Ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathāya līnatthavaṇṇanā.
tika-s0301t:170_0: Idāni pakaraṇanayena pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Sā pana atthavaṇṇanā yasmā desanāya
tika-s0301t:170_1: samuṭṭhānappayojanabhājanesu piṇḍatthesu ca niddhāritesu sukarā hoti suviññeyyā ca,
tika-s0301t:170_2: tasmā suttadesanāya samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamaṃ niddhārayissāma. Tattha samuṭṭhānaṃ tāva
tika-s0301t:170_3: desanānidānaṃ, taṃ sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇampi abbhantarabāhirabhedato
tika-s0301t:170_4: duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ abbhantarasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma lokanāthassa mahākaruṇā. Tāya
tika-s0301t:170_5: hi samussāhitassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi, yaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0301t:170_6: vuttaṃ – “sattesu ca kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi. Ettha
tika-s0301t:170_7: ca hetuavatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saṃsāramahoghato saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi
tika-s0301t:170_8: sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito. Yathā ca mahākaruṇā, evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dasabalañāṇādīni
tika-s0301t:170_9: ca desanāya abbhantarasamuṭṭhānabhāvena vattabbāni. Sabbañhi ñeyyadhammaṃ tesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ
tika-s0301t:170_10: sattānañca āsayānusayādiṃ yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
tika-s0301t:170_11: vicittanayadesanaṃ pavattesīti. Bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ dasasahassamahābrahmaparivāra-sahampatimahābrahmuno
tika-s0301t:170_13: paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi. Asādhāraṇampi abbhantarabāhirabhedato
tika-s0301t:170_14: duvidhameva. Tattha abbhantaraṃ yāya mahākaruṇāya yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0301t:170_15: pavattitaṃ, tadubhayaṃ veditabbaṃ bāhiraṃ pana tassā devatāya pucchā, pucchāvasiko
tika-s0301t:171_0: Payojanampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ anukkamena yāva anupādāparinibbānaṃ
tika-s0301t:171_1: vimuttirasattā bhagavato desanāya. Tenevāha “etadatthā kathā, etadatthā mantanā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:171_2: Asādhāraṇaṃ pana tassā devatāya dassanamaggasamadhigamo, ubhayampetaṃ bāhirameva.
tika-s0301t:171_3: Sace pana veneyyasantānagatampi desanābalasiddhisaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanabhāvato
tika-s0301t:171_4: yathādhippetatthasiddhiyā mahākāruṇikassa bhagavatopi payojanamevāti gaṇheyya, iminā
tika-s0301t:172_0: Apica tassā devatāya oghataraṇākārassa yāthāvato anavabodho imissā desanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:172_1: tadavabodho payojanaṃ. So hi imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ payojeti tannipphādanaparāyaṃ
tika-s0301t:172_2: desanāti katvā. Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ phalaṃ, taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desakaṃ desanāya
tika-s0301t:172_3: payojetīti payojananti vuccati. Tathā devatāya tadaññesañca vineyyānaṃ patiṭṭhānāyūhanavissajjanañcettha
tika-s0301t:173_0: Yathā devatā oghataraṇe saṃsayapakkhandā, tādisā aññe ca saṅkhātadhammānaṃ sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0301t:173_2: saddhammassavana-dhāraṇa-paricayavimukhā ca bhavavimokkhesino vineyyā imissā desanāya bhājanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:175_0: Tattha yesaṃ kilesādīnaṃ vasena patiṭṭhāti saṃsīdati, yesañca abhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ vasena
tika-s0301t:175_1: āyūhati nibbuyhati, ubhayametaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, tappabhāvitā tadubhayanissitā ca
tika-s0301t:175_2: khandhā dukkhasaccaṃ, tadubhayamattho, “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūha”nti adhippetassa atthassa
tika-s0301t:175_3: paṭicchannaṃ katvā desanā upāyo mānaniggaṇhanavasena tassā devatāya saccābhisamayakāraṇabhāvato
tika-s0301t:175_5: majjhimā paṭipatti paṭipajjitabbāti ayamettha bhagavato āṇattīti ayaṃ desanāhāro.
tika-s0301t:176_0: Parasaṃsayapakkhandanatāya ñātukāmatāya ca kathaṃ nūti pucchāvasena vuttaṃ? Abhimukhabhāvato
tika-s0301t:176_1: ekapuggalabhāvato ca “tva”nti vuttaṃ. Paramukkaṃsagatassa garubhāvassa anaññayogyassa
tika-s0301t:176_2: saddhammadhurassa paridīpanato sādhūti marisasīlādiguṇatāya “mārisā”ti vuttaṃ. Avahananato
tika-s0301t:176_3: rāsibhāvato ca “ogha”nti vuttaṃ. Ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa katattā pariyosāpitattā
tika-s0301t:176_4: “itī”ti vuttaṃ. Saṃsīdanalakkhaṇassa patiṭṭhānassa akātabbato sabbaso ca akatattā.
tika-s0301t:176_5: “Appatiṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ akaraṇaṃ ekaṃsikanti khoti avadhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:176_6: Tassa ca appatiṭṭhānassa sasantatigatattā “tva”nti ca pucchitattā “aha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:176_7: Devatāya sambodhanato piyālapanato ca, “āvuso”ti vuttaṃ. Nibbuyhanalakkhaṇassa āyūhanassa
tika-s0301t:176_8: akātabbato sabbaso ca akatattā anāyūhanti vuttaṃ. Tiṇṇākārassa oghānaṃ anicchitabhāvato
tika-s0301t:176_9: eva tattha saṃsayassa anapagatattā oghataraṇassa ca avisesattā “yathā kathaṃ panā”ti
tika-s0301t:176_10: vuttaṃ. Tathā saṃsīdanalakkhaṇaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ saṃsāre ca saṇṭhānanti anatthantarattā
tika-s0301t:176_11: abhinnakālikaṃ. Tathā nibbuyhanalakkhaṇaṃ āyūhanaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ativattananti
tika-s0301t:176_12: anatthantarattā abhinnakālikanti vuttaṃ “yadā svāhaṃ…pe… tadāssu nibbuyhāmī”ti. Tadubhayassa
tika-s0301t:176_13: paṭipakkhabhāvato paṭibāhanato ca oghātiṇṇāti vuttaṃ “evaṃ khvāhaṃ…pe… oghamatari”nti.
tika-s0301t:177_1: vimhayanīyatāya ca “vatā”ti vuttaṃ. Tadā upalabbhamānatāya attapaccakkhatāya ca “passāmī”ti
tika-s0301t:177_2: vuttaṃ. Bāhitapāpato brahmassa ca ariyamaggassa aṇanato paṭivijjhanato “brāhmaṇa”nti
tika-s0301t:177_3: vuttaṃ. Kilesasantāpavūpasamanato dukkhasantāpavūpasamanato ca sabbaso nibbutattā
tika-s0301t:177_4: “parinibbuta”nti vuttaṃ. Taraṇapayogassa nibbattitattā upari taritabbābhāvato ca
tika-s0301t:177_5: “tiṇṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ñāṇacakkhunā oloketabbato lujjanato palujjanato ca “loke”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:177_6: Visayesu sañjanato jātabhāvato “visattika”nti vuttaṃ. Ñāṇassa paccakkhabhāvato nigamanato
tika-s0301t:177_7: ca “ida”nti vuttaṃ. Bhāsitattā parisamattattā ca “avocā”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ gahitattā
tika-s0301t:177_8: paccāmasanato ca “sā devatā”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭikkhepassa abhāvato atthassa anumoditabbato
tika-s0301t:177_9: “samanuñño”ti vuttaṃ. Vineyyānaṃ sāsanato paramatthasampattito ca “satthā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:177_10: Cakkhupathātikkamena tirobhāvūpagamanato “antaradhāyī”ti vuttanti ayaṃ anupadavicayato vicayahāro.
tika-s0301t:178_2: hotīti yujjati kāraṇassa suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato. Abhisaṅkharaṇakicce kilesābhisaṅkhāre
tika-s0301t:178_4: nibbuyhanaṃ hotīti yujjati sammāpaṭipattiyā ativattanato. Brahmassa ariyamaggassa
tika-s0301t:178_5: aṇanato paṭivijjhanato brāhmaṇabhāvo yujjjati bāhitapāpattā. Sammadeva santadhammasamadhigamato
tika-s0301t:178_6: parinibbutabhāvo yujjati sabbaso savāsanapahīnakilesattā. Tathā ca visattikāya tiṇṇabhāvo
tika-s0301t:178_7: yujjati yathā yāya lesopi na dissati, evaṃ aggamaggena tassā samucchinnattāti ayaṃ yuttihāro.
tika-s0301t:179_0: Kilesavaṭṭavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ visesato kammavaṭṭassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Abhisaṅkhāravasena
tika-s0301t:179_1: āyūhanañca vipākavaṭṭassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanāni oghataraṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:179_2: oghataraṇaṃ anupādisesanibbānassa. Taṇhāvasena patiṭṭhānassa assādānupassitā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0301t:179_3: Tenāha bhagavā – “saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:180_3: āyūhanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Iminā nayena yathārahaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhādivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ
tika-s0301t:180_4: padaṭṭhānabhāvo vattabbo. Sesamettha pāḷito eva suniddhāriyaṃ. Ayaṃ padaṭṭhānahāro.
tika-s0301t:181_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepena vissajjentena niyyānāvahā sammāpaṭipatti
tika-s0301t:181_1: gahitā ekantato oghanittharaṇūpāyabhāvato. Taggahaṇena ca sabbepi sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā
tika-s0301t:181_2: gahitā honti niyyānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattāti ayaṃ lakkhaṇahāro.
tika-s0301t:182_0: Nidānamassā devatāya oghataraṇākārassa yāthāvato anavabodhoti vuttovāyamattho. Aññepi
tika-s0301t:182_1: ye imaṃ desanaṃ nissāya oghataraṇūpāyaṃ paṭivijjhanti, tepi imissā desanāya nidānanti
tika-s0301t:182_2: daṭṭhabbā. “Kathaṃ nu kho imaṃ desanaṃ nissāya sammadeva paṭivijjhantā catubbidhampi
tika-s0301t:182_3: oghaṃ tarantā sakalasaṃsāramahoghato nitthareyyuṃ, pare ca tattha patiṭṭhapeyyu”nti
tika-s0301t:182_4: ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo. Padanibbacanaṃ niruttaṃ, taṃ “eva”ntiādinidānapadānaṃ
tika-s0301t:183_1: padantarena sambandho padasandhi. Tathā padatthassa padatthantarena sambandho padatthasandhi,
tika-s0301t:183_3: ekānusandhikassa pana pubbāparasambandho desanāsandhi, yā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pucchānusandhi
tika-s0301t:183_4: ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhī”ti tidhā vibhattā. Ajjhāsayo cettha attajjhāsayo
tika-s0301t:183_5: parajjhāsayoti dvidhā veditabbo. Nikkhepasandhi catunnaṃ suttanikkhepānaṃ vasena
tika-s0301t:183_6: veditabbā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ papañcasūdanīṭīkāyaṃ vuttanayena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:184_0: “Kasmā panettha oghataraṇasuttameva paṭhamaṃ nikkhitta”nti nāyamanuyogo katthaci
tika-s0301t:184_1: na pavattati? Apica “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghamatari”nti patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepavasena
tika-s0301t:184_2: antadvayavivajjanamukhena vā majjhimāya paṭipadāya vibhāvanato sabbapaṭhamamidaṃ
tika-s0301t:184_3: suttaṃ idha nikkhittaṃ. Antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimāya paṭipattiyā saṅkāsanaparañhi
tika-s0301t:184_4: buddhānaṃ sāsananti. Yaṃ pana ekissā desanāya desanantarena saddhiṃ saṃsandanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:184_5: ayampi desanāsandhi. Sā idha evaṃ veditabbā –
tika-s0301t:191: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-s0301t:194: Te pahāya tare oghaṃ, nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragū. ;
tika-s0301t:196: Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. –
tika-s0301t:197: Evamādīhi desanāhi saṃsandatīti ayaṃ catubyūho hāro.
tika-s0301t:198_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha saṃkilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ āyūhanañca. Tena ayonisomanasikāro
tika-s0301t:198_1: dīpito, santakilesavasena anāyūhanena yonisomanasikāro. Tattha ayonisomanasikaroto
tika-s0301t:198_2: taṇhāvijjā pavaḍḍhati. Tesu taṇhāgahaṇena ca taṇhāmūlakā dhammā āvattanti. Avijjāgahaṇena
tika-s0301t:198_3: avijjāmūlakaṃ sabbaṃ bhavacakkaṃ āvattati. Yonisomanasikāraggahaṇena ca yonisomanasikāramūlakā
tika-s0301t:198_4: dhammā āvattanti catubbidhañca sampatticakkaṃ. Patiṭṭhānāyūhanapaṭikkhepena pana
tika-s0301t:198_5: sammāpaṭipatti dīpitā, sā ca saṅkhepato sīlādisaṅgahā. Tattha sīlaggahaṇena ekādasa
tika-s0301t:198_6: sīlānisaṃsā āvattanti, samādhiggahaṇena pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi pañcaññāṇiko sammāsamādhi
tika-s0301t:198_7: samādhiparikkhārā ca āvattanti. Paññāgahaṇena paññā ca sammādiṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhisudassanā
tika-s0301t:198_8: sabbepi ariyamaggadhammā āvattantīti ayaṃ āvatto hāro.
tika-s0301t:199_0: Patiṭṭhānaṃ kilesādivasena sattavidhaṃ. Āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkhārādivasena sattavidhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:199_1: Tathā tappaṭipakkhato appatiṭṭhānaṃ anāyūhanañca. Ayamettha dhammavibhatti. Padaṭṭhānabhūmivibhattiyo
tika-s0301t:199_2: pana heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbā. Ayaṃ vibhattihāro.
tika-s0301t:200_0: Pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ sammadeva sampādetvā samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā bhāvanaṃ
tika-s0301t:200_1: ussakkento kilesādīnaṃ dūrīkaraṇato tesaṃ vasena asaṃsīdanto anibbuyhanto appatiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0301t:200_2: anāyūhaṃ oghaṃ tarati. Kilesādīnaṃ vasena pana saṃsīdanto nibbuyhanto saṃsāre patiṭṭhānato
tika-s0301t:200_3: āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā āyūhanato oghaṃ na taratīti ayaṃ parivatto hāro.
tika-s0301t:201_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ asantiṭṭhanto asaṃsīdanto anibbisaṃ anavinibbisanti pariyāyavacanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:201_1: anāyūhaṃ anibbuyhanto acetento apakappentoti pariyāyavacanaṃ, oghaṃ kilesasamuddanti
tika-s0301t:201_2: pariyāyavacanaṃ, atari atikkami accavāyīti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi
tika-s0301t:202_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhaṃ āyūhanti kilesānaṃ kiccakaraṇapaññatti. Pariyuṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0301t:202_1: vibhāvanapaññatti. Abhisaṅkhārānaṃ viruhanapaññatti. Taṇhāya assādapaññatti. Diṭṭhiyā
tika-s0301t:202_4: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti pana abhiññeyyadhammānaṃ abhiññāpaññatti. Pariññeyyadhammānaṃ
tika-s0301t:202_5: pariññāpaññatti. Oghamatarinti pahātabbadhammānaṃ pahānapaññatti. Maggassa bhāvanāpaññatti.
tika-s0301t:203_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhānāyūhanaggahaṇena oghaggahaṇena ca samudayasaccaṃ
tika-s0301t:203_1: gahitaṃ. Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ atarinti pana padattayena maggasaccaṃ gahitaṃ, hetugahaṇena
tika-s0301t:203_2: ca hetumato gahaṇaṃ siddhamevāti dukkhanirodhasaccāni atthato gahitānevāti ayaṃ saccehi
tika-s0301t:203_3: otaraṇā. Tattha ye lokiyā pañcakkhandhā, yesaṃ vasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanasiddhi. Ye
tika-s0301t:203_4: lokuttarā cattāro khandhā, yesaṃ vasena oghataraṇasiddhi. Ayaṃ khandhamukhena otaraṇā.
tika-s0301t:203_5: Ye eva pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, te cattāro khandhā dvāyatanāni
tika-s0301t:203_6: dve dhātuyoti ayaṃ āyatanamukhena dhātumukhena ca otaraṇā. Tathā appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti
tika-s0301t:203_8: oghā ca saṅkhārakkhandhā dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātu ca, appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanaggahaṇena
tika-s0301t:203_9: oghataraṇavacanena ca saha vipassanāya maggo kathito. Evañca saṅkhārakkhandho dhammāyatanaṃ
tika-s0301t:203_10: dhammadhātu ca gahitāti evampi khandhamukhena āyatanamukhena dhātumukhena otaraṇā.
tika-s0301t:203_11: Vipassanā ce aniccānupassanā, animittamukhena vimokkhamukhaṃ, dukkhānupassanā ce,
tika-s0301t:203_12: appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ, anattānupassanā ce, suññatavimokkhamukhanti evaṃ vimokkhamukhena
tika-s0301t:203_13: otaraṇaṃ. Magge sekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo dhammāyatanadhammadhātū anāsavā ca evampi
tika-s0301t:203_14: kho khandhādimukhena otaraṇāti ayaṃ otaraṇo hāro.
tika-s0301t:204: Appatiṭṭhanti ārambho. Anāyūhanti padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi, tathā oghanti. Atarinti pana padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cāti ayaṃ sodhano hāro.
tika-s0301t:205_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiādivasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanānaṃ
tika-s0301t:205_1: sādhāraṇato paṭikkhepacodanāti katvā oghamatarinti taṃ vikappetvā visesavacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:205_2: Oghataraṇañhi cattāro ariyamaggā. Tattha paṭhamadutiyamaggā avisesena diṭṭhoghataraṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t:205_3: tatiyamaggo kāmoghataraṇaṃ, aggamaggo sesoghataraṇanti ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0301t:206_0: Kilesavasena patiṭṭhānassa ayonisomanasikāro hetu. Abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanassa
tika-s0301t:206_1: kilesā hetū. Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanānaṃ pana yathākkamaṃ yonisomanasikārapahānāni hetū.
tika-s0301t:206_2: Saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassanā taṇhāvasena yathārahaṃ tassa hetū. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:206_3: bhagavā – “saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:206_5: hetū. Tenāha – paṭisambhidāmagge “khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0301t:206_6: Taṇhābhinandanā avasesakilesābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanassa hetū. Iminā nayena yathārahaṃ
tika-s0301t:206_8: appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanānaṃ. Kilesuppādane hi sammadeva ādīnavadassanaṃ appatiṭṭhānassa
tika-s0301t:206_9: hetū, abhisaṅkharaṇe ādīnavadassanaṃ anāyūhanassa hetū, vipassanāya ussukkāpanaṃ
tika-s0301t:207_0: Yathāvuttavibhāgehi patiṭṭhānāyūhanehi catubbidhassapi oghassa parisuddhi. Appatiṭṭhānānāyūhanehi
tika-s0301t:207_1: pana sotānaṃ saṃvaro sabbaso pidhānañcāti catubbidhassapi oghassa visesato pidhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:207_2: appavattikaraṇaṃ. Ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya hi kilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ abhisaṅkhāravasena
tika-s0301t:207_3: āyūhanaṃ upacchinnaṃ, tassa sabbepi oghā tiṇṇā sammatiṇṇā pahīnā hontīti ayaṃ samāropano hāro.
tika-s0301t:208_0: Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhanti ettha patiṭṭhāgahaṇena taṇhāvijjā gahitā. Tāsaṃ hi vasena
tika-s0301t:208_1: satto tattha tattha bhave patiṭṭhāti. Āyūhanaggahaṇena tappaccayā abhisaṅkhāradhammā
tika-s0301t:208_2: gahitā. Tattha taṇhāya visesato rūpadhammā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāya arūpadhammā. Tesaṃ
tika-s0301t:208_3: yathākkamaṃ samatho ca vipassanā ca paṭipakkhā, te “appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghamatari”nti
tika-s0301t:208_4: padehi pakāsitā honti, tesu samathassa cetovimutti phalaṃ, vipassanāya paññāvimutti.
tika-s0301t:208_5: Tathā hi sā “rāgavirāgā avijjāvirāgā”ti visesetvā vuccati. Tattha taṇhāvijjā abhisaṅkhāro
tika-s0301t:208_6: ca samudayasaccaṃ, tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtā rūpārūpadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ, tesaṃ appavatti
tika-s0301t:208_7: nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā oghataraṇapariyāyena vuttā maggasaccaṃ. Taṇhāgahaṇena
tika-s0301t:208_12: vasena vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ nandiyāvattassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0301t:209_0: Tathā vuttanayena gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu taṇhā lobho, avijjā moho,
tika-s0301t:209_1: avijjāya sampayutto lohite sati pubbo viya taṇhāya sati sijjhamāno āghāto doso iti
tika-s0301t:209_2: tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi, tappaṭipakkhato “appatiṭṭha”ntiādivacanehi ca tīṇi akusalamūlāni
tika-s0301t:209_3: tīṇi kusalamūlāni ca siddhāni eva honti. Idhāpi lobho sabbāni sāsavakusalamūlāni
tika-s0301t:209_4: āyūhanadhammā ca samudayasaccaṃ, tannibbattā tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā ca upādānakkhandhā
tika-s0301t:209_5: dukkhasaccantiādinā saccayojanā yojetabbā. Phalaṃ panettha vimokkhattayavasena niddhāretabbaṃ,
tika-s0301t:209_8: vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0301t:210_0: Tathā vuttanayena gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu visesato taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-s0301t:210_1: vasena asubhe “subha”nti, dukkhe “sukha”nti ca vipallāsā, avijjādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena
tika-s0301t:210_2: “anicce nicca”nti anattani “attā”ti vipallāsā veditabbā. Tesaṃ paṭipakkhato “appatiṭṭha”ntiādivacanehi
tika-s0301t:210_3: ca laddhehi sativīriyasamādhipaññindriyehi cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni siddhāneva honti.
tika-s0301t:211_0: Tattha catūhi indriyehi cattāro puggalā niddisitabbā. Kathaṃ? Duvidho hi taṇhācarito
tika-s0301t:211_1: mudindriyo tikkhindriyoti, tathā diṭṭhicarito. Tesu paṭhamo asubhe “subha”nti vipariyesaggāhī
tika-s0301t:211_2: satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ sallakkhento bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ samugghātetvā
tika-s0301t:211_3: sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Dutiyo asukhe “sukha”nti vipariyesaggāhī “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
tika-s0301t:211_4: nādhivāsetī”tiādinā vuttena vīriyasaṃvarabhūtena vīriyabalena paṭipakkhaṃ vinodento
tika-s0301t:211_5: bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ viddhaṃsetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Tatiyo anicce
tika-s0301t:211_7: sallakkhento bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ samugghātetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati.
tika-s0301t:211_10: sāmaññaphalaṃ sacchikaroti. Subhasaññāsukhasaññādīhi catūhi vā vipallāsehi samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0301t:211_12: Phalaṃ panettha cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, catūhi cettha vipallāsehi caturāsavoghayoga-kāyagantha-agati-taṇhuppādupādāna-sattaviññāṇaṭṭhiti-apariññādivasena
tika-s0301t:211_14: vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0301t:212_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayaṃ siddhameva hoti. Tathā
tika-s0301t:212_1: hi atthanayānaṃ disābhūtadhammālocanaṃ disālocanaṃ, tesaṃ samānayanaṃ aṅkusoti pañcapi
tika-s0301t:212_2: nayā idha niyuttāti veditabbā. Idañca suttaṃ soḷasavidhe suttantapaṭṭhāne nibbedhasekkhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0301t:212_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana suttantapaṭṭhāne lokiyalokuttaraṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:212_5: ñāṇañeyyaṃ dassanabhāvanaṃ sakavacanaṃ vissajjanīyaṃ kusalaṃ anuññātanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:215_0: 2. Paṭhamamāgatanti saṃvaṇṇanāvasena paṭhamasuttādīsu paṭhamaṃ āgatapadaṃ. Uttānatthanti
tika-s0301t:215_1: pākaṭatthaṃ. Apubbaṃyeva hi duviññeyyatthañca padaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ. Noti pucchāyaṃ
tika-s0301t:215_2: nu-saddena samānattho nipātoti āha “jānāsi noti jānāsi nū”ti. Vaṭṭato nimuccanti
tika-s0301t:215_3: tena sattāti nimokkho, maggo. So ca pamuccanti tenāti pamokkho, pamuccanante pana
tika-s0301t:215_5: mohakkhayo”ti vuttaṃ. Teti sattā. Viviccatīti visuṃ asammisso hoti, vigacchatīti
tika-s0301t:215_6: attho. Viviccati dukkhaṃ etasmāti viveko. Dutiyavikappe pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhato
tika-s0301t:215_7: sattā nimuccanti ettha pamuccanti viviccanti cāti nimokkho pamokkho viveko, nibbānanti
tika-s0301t:215_8: attho veditabbo. Etthāti ca nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avadhāraṇattho
tika-s0301t:216_0: Nandīmūlako bhavo nandībhavo purimapade uttarapadalopena “sākabhakkho patthavo sākapatthavo”ti
tika-s0301t:216_1: yathā. Paṭhamaṃ kammavaṭṭapadhānaṃ atthaṃ vatvā puna kilesakammānaṃ vasena ubhayappadhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:216_2: atthaṃ vadanto “nandiyā cā”tiādimāha. Purimanayeti nandīmūlako kammabhavo nandībhavoti
tika-s0301t:216_5: vasena. Saṅkhārakkhandho gahito cetanāpadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhassa. Saññāviññāṇehīti
tika-s0301t:216_6: “saññāviññāṇasaṅkhayā”ti evaṃ vuttasaññāviññāṇapadehi. Taṃsampayuttā cāti tena yathāvuttasaṅkhārakkhandhena
tika-s0301t:216_7: samaṃ yuttā eva. Dve khandhāti saññāviññāṇakkhandhā.
tika-s0301t:217_0: Nanu ettha vedanākkhandho na gahitoti? No na gahitoti dassento “tehi panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:217_1: Tīhi khandhehīti saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇakkhandhehi. Gahitāva avinābhāvato. Na hi vedanārahito
tika-s0301t:217_2: koci cittuppādo atthi. Anupādiṇṇakānanti kusalākusalānaṃ. Na hettha kiriyākhandhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:217_4: kammakilesehi upādīyatīti upādi, pañcakkhandhā. Upādino seso upādiseso, saha upādisesenāti
tika-s0301t:217_5: saupādisesaṃ. Nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ sakalakammakilesavūpasamatthassa jotitattā. Heṭṭhā
tika-s0301t:217_6: dvīhi padehi anupādiṇṇakakkhandhā gahitāti “vedanāna”nti ettha upādiṇṇakaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:217_8: nirujjhanena. Upasamenāti accantūpasamena appavattanena. Evañca katvā ca-saddaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:217_9: samatthitaṃ hoti. Tesanti tassā vedanāya taṃsampayuttānañca tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ. Vatthārammaṇavasenāti
tika-s0301t:217_10: vatthubhūtānaṃ channaṃ ārammaṇabhūtānañca sabbesampi upādiṇṇakarūpadhammānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0301t:218_0: Kasmā pana heṭṭhā cattāro arūpakkhandhāyeva vuttā, rūpakkhandho na gahitoti? Visesabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:218_2: appavattiyeva natthi. Dutiyanayeti nandiyā ca bhavassa cāti etamhi pakkhe. Nandiggahaṇena
tika-s0301t:218_3: saṅkhārakkhandho gahito taṃsahacaraṇato. Upapattibhavasaṅkhāto rūpakkhandhoti upādiṇṇakarūpadhammameva
tika-s0301t:218_4: vadati. Taggahaṇeneva ca tannimittakāni utuāhārajāni, viññāṇaggahaṇena cittajānīti
tika-s0301t:218_6: tayo khandhā gahitā, tañca kho upādiṇṇā anupādiṇṇāti vibhāgaṃ akatvā avisesato. Avisesena
tika-s0301t:218_7: hi pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appavatti nibbānaṃ. Tenāha “evaṃ…pe… nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0301t:218_8: “Nibbāna”nti hi idha amatamahānibbānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Imameva ca nayanti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:218_9: dutiyameva. Cattāro mahānikāye dhāretīti catunikāyiko. Bhaṇḍikanāmako thero bhaṇḍikatthero.
tika-s0301t:218_11: anupādisesanibbānassa ca, dutiye pana “amatamahānibbānassā”ti sabbathāpi nibbānasseva
tika-s0301t:221_0: 3. Anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ upasaggavasena atthavisesavācako hotīti āha “upanīyatīti
tika-s0301t:221_1: parikkhīyati nirujjhatī”ti. Vinassatīti attho. Upanīyatīti vā saraseneva jīvitassa
tika-s0301t:221_2: maraṇūpagamanaṃ vuttanti āha – “upagacchati vā, anupubbena maraṇaṃ upetīti attho”ti.
tika-s0301t:221_3: Kāmañcettha “upanīyatī”ti padaṃ apākaṭakammavisesaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā pana “sabbaṃ ārogyaṃ
tika-s0301t:221_4: byādhipariyosānaṃ, sabbaṃ yobbanaṃ jarāpariyosānaṃ, sabbaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇapariyosāna”nti,
tika-s0301t:221_5: “upanīyati jīvita”nti vuttattā “maraṇaṃ upetī”ti vuttaṃ. Kammakattuvasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:222_0: Idāni kammasādhanavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gopālena gogaṇo
tika-s0301t:222_1: nīyati yathicchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Jīvanti tena sattā, sahajātadhammā vāti jīvitaṃ, tadeva
tika-s0301t:222_2: tesaṃ anupālane ādhipaccasabbhāvato indriyanti āha “jīvitanti jīvitindriya”nti parittanti
tika-s0301t:222_3: ittaraṃ. Tenāha “thoka”nti. Pabandhānupacchedassa paccayabhāvo idha jīvitassa maraṇakiccanti
tika-s0301t:222_4: adhippetanti āha “sarasaparittatāya cā”tiādi. Āyūti ca paramāyu idhādhippetaṃ, tañca
tika-s0301t:223_0: Imasmiñhi buddhuppāde ayaṃ kathāti jīvitassa atiittarabhāvadīpanaparā ayaṃ desanā.
tika-s0301t:223_2: cittuppādassa pavattikkhaṇamatto evāti attho. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ
tika-s0301t:223_3: “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pavattamānanti nemirathīsā vattantī ekeneva nemippadesena
tika-s0301t:223_4: pavattati ekasmiṃ khaṇeti adhippāyo. “Ekeneva tiṭṭhatī”ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ekacittakkhaṇikanti
tika-s0301t:223_5: ekacittakkhaṇamattavantaṃ. Tasmiṃ citteti tasmiṃ yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ citte. Niruddhamatteti
tika-s0301t:223_6: niruddhabhāvappattamatte. Niruddhoti vuccatīti matoti vuccati taṃsamaṅgī satto paramatthato.
tika-s0301t:223_7: Avisesaviduno pana aviññāyamānantarena anusandhānassa niruddhanaṃ nirodhaṃ sallakkhenti.
tika-s0301t:223_8: Yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttena vibhāvetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena tīsupi kālesu sattānaṃ
tika-s0301t:224_0: Jīvitanti jīvitindriyaṃ. Attabhāvoti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā
tika-s0301t:224_1: adhippetā. Sukhadukkhāti sukhadukkhā vedanā, upekkhāpi idha sukhadukkhāsveva antogadhā
tika-s0301t:224_2: iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. Kevalāti attanā, niccabhāvena vā avomissā. Ekacittasamāyuttāti
tika-s0301t:224_3: ekakena cittena sahitā. Lahuso vattate khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko
tika-s0301t:225_0: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cutito uddhaṃ niruddhāti vattabbā ye
tika-s0301t:225_1: khandhā. Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhamānassa dharantassa
tika-s0301t:225_2: bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhā khandhā, sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā gatā atthaṅgatā
tika-s0301t:225_3: appaṭisandhiyā puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā. Yathā hi cutikhandhā na nibbattanti,
tika-s0301t:225_4: evaṃ tato pubbepi khandhā. Tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:226_0: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti “anāgate cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha
tika-s0301t:226_1: na jīvati jīvissatī”ti vattabbato. Paccuppannena vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno
tika-s0301t:226_2: nāma hoti, na jīvittha na jīvissati. Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi
tika-s0301t:226_3: tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato mato nāma hoti “atīte
tika-s0301t:226_4: cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissatī”ti vattabbato, niruddhassa appaṭisandhikattā.
tika-s0301t:226_5: Evaṃ santepi paññatti paramatthiyā, yāyaṃ taṃ taṃ pavattaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso
tika-s0301t:226_6: jīvati, phusso jīvatī”ti vacanappavattiyā visayabhūtā santānapaññatti, sā ettha paramatthiyā
tika-s0301t:226_7: paramatthabhūtā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “nāmagottaṃ na jīratī”ti.
tika-s0301t:227_0: Na santi tāṇāti jaraṃ upagatassa tato taṃnimittaṃ yaṃ vā pāpakārino pāpakammānaṃ
tika-s0301t:227_1: upaṭṭhānavasena puññakārino piyavippayogavasena cittadukkhaṃ ubhayesampi bandhanacchedanādivasena
tika-s0301t:227_2: vitujjamānaṃ anappakaṃ sarīradukkhaṃ sammohappatti ca hoti, tato tāyantā na santi.
tika-s0301t:227_3: Tenāha – “tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ bhavituṃ samatthā nāma keci natthī”ti. Bhāyati etasmāti
tika-s0301t:227_4: bhayaṃ, bhayanimittanti āha “bhayavatthū”ti. Taggahaṇena ca cittutrāsalakkhaṇaṃ bhayaṃ
tika-s0301t:227_5: gahitameva, sati nimitte nemittaṃ santamevāti. Pubbacetananti ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ
tika-s0301t:227_7: parato samāpajjanavasena ca pavattaṃ samāpatticetanaṃ. Muñcacetananti vikkhambhanavasena
tika-s0301t:227_8: pavattaṃ paṭhamappanācetanaṃ. Kusalajjhānassa vipākajjhāneva labbhamānaṃ sukhaṃ jhānasukhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:227_9: Iṭṭhapariyāyo cettha sukha-saddo. Jhāne apekkhā jhānanikanti. Jhānassa assādavasena
tika-s0301t:227_10: pavatto lobho jhānassādo. Yena te te brahmāno jhānato vuṭṭhāya “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti
tika-s0301t:227_11: vācaṃ nicchāresunti. Yathā devā sukhabahulā tihetupaṭisandhikāvāti paṭipajjantā jhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:227_12: adhigantuṃ bhabbā, na itareti “kāmāvacaradevesū”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmāvacarā ca uparidevā
tika-s0301t:227_13: ca kāmāvacaradevāti ekadesasarūpekaseso daṭṭhabbo. Tena manussānampi ekaccānaṃ sabbesampi
tika-s0301t:227_14: vā saṅgaho siddho hoti patthanāparikappanāya visayabhāvato. Tenāha “aho vatime ca…pe…
tika-s0301t:227_15: tiṭṭheyyu”nti. Thullāni phusitāni vipphurāni etthāti thullaphusitako, kālo, deso
tika-s0301t:228_0: “Puññāni kayirātha sukhāvahānī”ti vuttattā “aniyyānikaṃ vaṭṭakathaṃ kathetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:228_1: Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko, kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisañcāti lokāmisaṃ. Nippariyāyāmisaṃ
tika-s0301t:228_2: pana loke āmisantipi lokāmisaṃ. Pariyāyeti sabhāvato parivattetvā ñāpeti etenāti
tika-s0301t:228_3: pariyāyo, leso, kāraṇaṃ vāti āha “nippariyāyena cattāro paccayā”ti, vaṭṭassa ekantato
tika-s0301t:228_4: bālalokeheva āmasitabbabhāvato pariyāyāmisatā vuttā. Idha pari..pe… adhippetaṃ vivaṭṭapaṭiyogino
tika-s0301t:228_6: paccayo hotīti “vaṭṭatiyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Vūpasamati ettha sakalavaṭṭadukkhanti
tika-s0301t:231_0: 4. Kālayanti khepentīti kālā. Purebhattādayo hi kālā dhammappavattimattatāya paramatthato
tika-s0301t:231_1: avijjamānāpi lokasaṅketamattasiddhā tassāyeva dhammappavattiyā gatagatāya anivattanato
tika-s0301t:231_2: taṃ taṃ dhammappavattiṃ khepentā vināsayantā viya sayañca tāhi saddhiṃ accentā viya
tika-s0301t:231_3: honti. Tenāha – “kālo ghasati bhūtāni, sabbāneva sahattanā”ti. “Tarayanti rattiyo”ti
tika-s0301t:231_4: etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. “Etaṃ bhayaṃ maraṇe pekkhamāno”ti vuccamānattā
tika-s0301t:231_5: puggalaṃ maraṇūpagamanāya tarayantīti attho vutto. Vayoguṇāti ettha koṭṭhāsā guṇā.
tika-s0301t:231_6: Titthiyānaṃ hi carimacittena sakalacitte vayasamūhe vayasamaññāti āha – “paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavayānaṃ
tika-s0301t:231_7: guṇā, rāsayoti attho”ti. Ānisaṃsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho “vākaciraṃ nivāsesiṃ, dvādasaguṇamupāgata”ntiādīsu
tika-s0301t:231_8: viya. “Tandiguṇāhaṃ karissāmi, diguṇaṃ diguṇaṃ vaddheyyā”ti ca evamādīsu pana tabbhāvavuttiattho guṇaṭṭho.
tika-s0301t:234_0: Ādīsu pasaṃsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo. “Vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti ettha attho
tika-s0301t:234_1: “accenti kālā”ti ettha vuttanayo eva. Paṭhamamajjhimavayāti paṭhamaggahaṇañcettha
tika-s0301t:234_2: vayassa gatassa apunarāvattidassanatthaṃ kataṃ. Tenevāha – “maraṇakkhaṇe pana tayopi vayā jahantevā”ti.
tika-s0301t:235_0: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ “accenti kālā”ti sāmaññato kālassa apagamanaṃ dassitaṃ, puna taṃ
tika-s0301t:235_1: visesatopi dassetuṃ itaradvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mudindriyassa vasena “vayoguṇā
tika-s0301t:235_2: anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti vuttaṃ, majjhimindriyassa vasena “tarayanti rattiyo”ti vuttanti
tika-s0301t:235_3: adhippāyena “kālāti purebhattādayo kālā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tattha ādi-saddena pacchābhattapaṭhamayāma-muhuttakālādi-kālakoṭṭhāso
tika-s0301t:235_4: eva aṇupabhedo kālavibhāgo gahitoti veditabbo. Sesanti idha dvīsu gāthāsu pacchimaddho.
tika-s0301t:235_5: So hi idha atthato adhigatattā anantarasutte ca vuttattā atidisito.
tika-s0301t:238_0: 5. Chindantoti samucchindanto. Kati chindeyyāti kittake pāpadhamme samucchindeyya,
tika-s0301t:238_1: anuppattidhammataṃ pāpeyya. Sesapadesupīti sesesupi dvīsu padesu. Jahanto kati jaheyya,
tika-s0301t:238_2: bhāvento kati uttari bhāveyyāti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati. Catutthapadassa
tika-s0301t:238_3: pana attho sarūpeneva dassito. Atthato ekanti bhāvatthato ekaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kimatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:238_4: pariyāyantaraṃ gahitanti āha “gāthābandhassa panā”tiādi. Atthato ettha punarutti
tika-s0301t:238_5: atthevāti āha “saddapunaruttiṃ vajjayantī”ti. Saṅgaṃ atikkamayatīti saṅgātigoti āha “ayamevattho”ti.
tika-s0301t:239_0: Oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, paṭisandhiyā paccayabhāvena tañca bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni.
tika-s0301t:239_1: Tattha ca kammaṃ tabbipākaṃ satte dukkhaṃ, kammunā vipākaṃ, sattena dukkhaṃ saṃyojentīti
tika-s0301t:239_3: vuccati catasso arūpadhātuyo, vuttanayena taṃ bhajantīti uddhambhāgiyāni, saṃyojanāni
tika-s0301t:239_5: jahe”ti evaṃ kathesi tassā devatāya sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ. Na kevalaṃ tāya devatāya vuttavacanānurūpato
tika-s0301t:239_6: eva, atha kho tesu saṃyojanesu vattabbākāratopīti dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:239_7: Tena orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma garūni ducchedāni gāḷhabandhanabhāvato, tasmā tāni
tika-s0301t:240_0: Uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pana lahūni succhedāni heṭṭhā pavattitānukkamena bhāvanānayena
tika-s0301t:240_1: pahātabbato, tasmā tāni sandhāya “pañca jahe”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “pādesu baddhapāsasakuṇo
tika-s0301t:240_2: viyā”tiādi. Visesanti bhāvanānaṃ visesaṃ vipassanābhāvanaṃ bhāvento uppādento vipaccento
tika-s0301t:240_3: vaḍḍhento ca. Saṃsārapaṅke sañjanaṭṭhena rāgo eva saṅgo “rāgasaṅgo”. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0301t:240_5: atthato oghā eva, itare tadekaṭṭhā, tasmā bhagavā saṃyojanappahānasaṅgātikkamehi
tika-s0301t:240_6: oghataraṇaṃ kathesi. Lokiyalokuttarāni kathitāni “bhāvaye”ti pubbabhāgāya maggabhāvanāya adhippetattā.
tika-s0301t:243_1: panā”ti imassa padassa “ayamattho veditabbo”ti iminā sambandho. Pucchāgāthāya pana
tika-s0301t:243_2: attho imināva nayena viññāyatīti adhippāyo. Pañca jāgarataṃ suttāti ettha “suttā”ti
tika-s0301t:243_3: padaṃ apekkhitvā pañcāti paccattavacanaṃ “jāgarata”nti padaṃ apekkhitvā sāmivasena
tika-s0301t:243_5: jāgarantesu baddhābhāvena sakiccappasutatāya sakiccasamatthatāya cāti attho. Sottaṃva
tika-s0301t:243_6: suttā pamādaniddābhāvato. Tameva suttabhāvaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya dassetuṃ
tika-s0301t:243_7: “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pamajjati, pamādo vā etassa atthīti pamādo, tassa bhāvo pamādatā,
tika-s0301t:244_0: Evaṃ gāthāya paṭhamassa pādassa atthaṃ vatvā dutiyassa vattuṃ “evaṃ suttesū”tiādi
tika-s0301t:244_1: vuttaṃ. Tassattho vuttanayena veditabbo. Yasmā appahīnasupanakiriyāvasena sanīvaraṇassa
tika-s0301t:244_2: puggalassa anuppannarāgarajādayo uppajjanti, uppannā pavaḍḍhanti, tasmā vuttaṃ “nīvaraṇeheva
tika-s0301t:244_3: kilesarajaṃ ādiyatī”ti. Tenevāha “purimā”tiādi. Purimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ aparāparuppattiyā
tika-s0301t:244_4: paccayabhāvo hettha ādiyanaṃ. Pañcahi indriyehi parisujjhatīti maggapariyāpannehi
tika-s0301t:244_5: saddhādīhi pañcahi indriyehi sakalasaṃkilesato visujjhati. Paññindriyameva hi anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīni,
tika-s0301t:247_1: catusaccadhammā”ti. Cattāripi hi ariyasaccāni catusaccantogadhāni. Appaṭividdhāti
tika-s0301t:247_3: Diṭṭhigatehi te pavattitā. Ito paresanti ito sāsanikehi paresaṃ aññesaṃ. Dhammatāyāti
tika-s0301t:247_4: sabhāvena, sayamevāti attho. Gacchantīti pavattanti diṭṭhivādaṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0301t:247_5: Parenāti diṭṭhigatikena. Nīyantīti diṭṭhivādasaṅgaṇhane uyyojīyanti. Tenāha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:247_6: Pabujjhitunti pamādaniddāya paṭibujjhituṃ. Paṭipadā yathādesitassa dhammassa kathitatāya,
tika-s0301t:248_0: Hetunāti ñāyena. Kāraṇenāti catusaccānaṃ sambodhayuttiyā. Hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya
tika-s0301t:248_1: sabbaṃ ñeyyaṃ jānātīti sabbaññū, teneva sabbaññutābhisambodhena buddhoti sabbaññubuddho.
tika-s0301t:248_2: Paccekaṃ parehi asādhāraṇatāya visuṃ sayambhuñāṇena saccāni buddhavāti paccekabuddho.
tika-s0301t:248_3: Paropadesena catusaccaṃ bujjhatīti catusaccabuddho. Tathā hi so sayambhutāya abhāvato
tika-s0301t:248_4: kevalaṃ catusaccabuddhoti vuccati. Sutena sutamayañāṇena khandhādibhedaṃ ñeyyaṃ buddhavāti
tika-s0301t:248_5: sutabuddho. Sabbaññubuddhapaccekabuddhe ṭhapetvā avasesā aggasāvakamahāsāvakāpi pakatisāvakāpi
tika-s0301t:248_6: vītarāgā avasesā khīṇāsavā. Tayopi purimā vaṭṭanti sambuddhātiādivacanato. Sannivasati
tika-s0301t:248_7: etenāti sannivāso, caritaṃ. Lokassa sannivāso lokasannivāso, tasmiṃ. Kāyaduccaritādibhede
tika-s0301t:248_8: visame. Satisammosena visame vā sattanikāye. So hi visamayogato visamo. Rāgavisamādike
tika-s0301t:248_9: visame vā kilesajāte. Taṃ visamaṃ pahāya taṃ visamaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā samaṃ sadisaṃ
tika-s0301t:248_10: yuttarūpaṃ, purimakehi vā sambuddhehi samaṃ sadisaṃ caranti vattanti.
tika-s0301t:251_0: 8. Susammuṭṭhāti suṭṭhu ativiya sammuṭṭhā. Satta sekkhā hi susammusitā vinaṭṭhā.
tika-s0301t:251_1: Kathaṃ pana te anadhigatā naṭṭhā nāma hontīti āha “yathā hī”tiādi. Adhigatassāti
tika-s0301t:251_2: adhigato assa. So vadantoti sambandho. Sesanti “dhammā”tiādi. Purimasadisamevāti
tika-s0301t:254_0: 9. Seyyādibhedaṃ mānaṃ appahāya taṃ paggayha vicaranto kāmento nāma hotīti āha “mānaṃ
tika-s0301t:254_1: kāmentassa icchantassā”ti. Damati cittaṃ etenāti damo, satisambojjhaṅgādiko samādhipakkhiko
tika-s0301t:254_2: damo. Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni dametīti damo, indriyasaṃvaro. Kilese dameti pajahatīti
tika-s0301t:254_3: damo, paññā. Upavasanavasena kāyakammādiṃ dametīti damo, uposathakammaṃ. Kodhūpanāhamakkhamānādike
tika-s0301t:254_4: dameti vinetīti damo, adhivāsanakhanti. Tenevāti “damo”ti samādhipakkhikadhammānaṃ
tika-s0301t:254_5: eva adhippetattā. “Na monaṃ atthī”ti ca pāṭho. Asamāhitassāti samādhipaṭikkhepo jotito.
tika-s0301t:255_0: Maccudheyyassa pārataraṇassa vuccamānattā “monanti catumaggañāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Na hi
tika-s0301t:255_1: tato aññena taṃ sambhavati. Jānāti asammohapaṭivedhavasena paṭivijjhatīti attho.
tika-s0301t:255_2: Maccu dhīyati etthāti maccudheyyaṃ, khandhapañcakaṃ maraṇadhammattā. Tassevāti maccudheyyasseva.
tika-s0301t:255_3: Pāraṃ paratīrabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ. Tareyyāti ettha taraṇaṃ nāma ariyamaggabyāpāroti āha
tika-s0301t:255_4: “paṭivijjheyya pāpuṇeyyā”ti. Tathā hi vakkhati “paṭivedhataraṇaṃ nāma vutta”nti.
tika-s0301t:255_5: “Na tareyya na paṭivijjheyya na pāpuṇeyya vā”ti ayamettha pāṭho yutto. Aññathā “idaṃ
tika-s0301t:255_6: vuttaṃ hotī”tiādivacanaṃ virujjheyya. Eko araññe viharantoti ekākī hutvā araññe viharantoti attho.
tika-s0301t:256_0: Kāmaṃ heṭṭhimamaggehipi ekaccassa mānassa pahānaṃ labbhati. Aggamaggeneva pana tassa
tika-s0301t:256_1: anavasesato pahānanti āha – “arahattamaggena navavidhamānaṃ pajahitvā”ti. Upacārasamādhipubbako
tika-s0301t:256_3: sandhāya paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanassa ayujjanato. Na hi appanaṃ appattaṃ lokuttarajjhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:256_5: Tathā hi vakkhati “sucetasoti ettha cittena paññā dassitā”ti. “Sabbadhi vippamutto”ti
tika-s0301t:256_6: sabbesu bhavādīsu visaṃsaṭṭhacitto sabbaso khandhādīhi visaṃyutto hotīti vuttaṃ “sabbesu
tika-s0301t:256_7: khandhāyatanādīsu vippamutto hutvā”ti. Pariññāpaṭivedho sacchikiriyapaṭivedhena vinā
tika-s0301t:257_0: Mānaṃ nissāya duccaritacaraṇato māno nāmāyaṃ sīlabhedano. Tasmāti mānassa sīlapaṭipakkhabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:257_1: Iminā paṭipakkhappahānakittanena. Adhicittasikkhā kathitā sarūpato evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:257_2: Ettha cittenāti su-saddena visesitacittena. Tasmāti paññāya dassitattā. Imināti “sucetaso”ti
tika-s0301t:257_3: iminā padena. Adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhāti sīlādīnipi visesetvā
tika-s0301t:257_4: vuttāni. Sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanavisesitabbatāti taṃ dassento “adhisīlañca
tika-s0301t:257_5: nāma sīle sati hotī”tiādiṃ vatvā tadubhayaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:257_6: Paṭhamanayo saṅkaravasena pavattoti asaṅkaravasena dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādinā dutiyanayo
tika-s0301t:257_7: vutto. “Samāpannā”ti etthāpi “nibbānaṃ patthayantenā”ti ānetvā sambandho. Vipassanāya
tika-s0301t:257_8: pādakabhāvaṃ anupagatāpi tadatthaṃ nibbattanādivasena samāpannāti ayamattho purimanayato
tika-s0301t:257_9: viseso. Adhipaññāya panettha purimanayato viseso natthīti sā anuddhaṭā. Samodhānetvāti
tika-s0301t:257_10: pariyāyato sarūpato ca saṅgahetvā. Sakalasāsananti tissannaṃ kathitattā eva sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ
tika-s0301t:260_0: 10. Santakilesānanti vūpasantakilesapariḷāhānaṃ. Yasmā sīlādiguṇasambhavaṃ tato eva
tika-s0301t:260_1: bhayasantañca upādāya paṇḍitā “santo”ti vuccanti, tasmā vuttaṃ “paṇḍitānaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0301t:260_2: Tenāha “santo have”tiādi. Seṭṭhacārīnanti seṭṭhacariyaṃ carantānaṃ. Yasmā puthujjanakalyāṇato
tika-s0301t:260_3: paṭṭhāya bhikkhu maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasati nāma, tasmā āha “maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ
tika-s0301t:260_4: vasantāna”nti. Ariyānaṃ pana mukhavaṇṇassa pasīdane vattabbameva natthi. Mūlakammaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0301t:260_6: hi vikkhepabyākulatāya appasannā samāhitacittasantatiyā visabhāgasantati. Okkamatīti
tika-s0301t:260_7: samādhisabhāgā cittasantati samathavīthiṃ anupavisati. Cittaṃ pasīdatīti kammaṭṭhānanirataṃ
tika-s0301t:260_8: bhāvanācittaṃ sandhāyāha, taṃ pasannaṃ hutvā pavattati. Lohitaṃ pasīdatīti cittakālussiyassābhāvato
tika-s0301t:260_9: lohitaṃ anāvilaṃ hoti. Parisuddhāni honti kāraṇassa parisuddhabhāvato. Tālaphalamukhassa
tika-s0301t:260_10: viya mukhassa vaṇṇo hotīti mukha-saddassa ādimhi pamuttapadena yojetabbo. Evañhi
tika-s0301t:260_11: cassa pamuttaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti tālaphalamukhassa vaṇṇasampadāsadisattā. Tibhūmako eva tebhūmako.
tika-s0301t:261_0: Atītaṃ nānusocanti atītaṃ paccayalābhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ katvā na socanti na anutthunanti.
tika-s0301t:261_1: Jappanataṇhāya vasena na parikappantīti āha “na patthentī”ti. Yena kenacīti itarītarena.
tika-s0301t:261_2: Taṅkhaṇe laddhenāti sannidhikāraparibhogābhāvamāha. Tividhenapi kāraṇenāti tippakārena
tika-s0301t:262_0: Vināsanti vināsanahetuṃ. Vinassanti etehīti vināso, lobhadosā tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā.
tika-s0301t:262_1: Arūpakāyassa viya rūpakāyassapi visesato sukkhabhāvakāraṇanti āha “etena kāraṇadvayenā”ti. Lutoti lūno.
tika-s0301t:267_0: 11. “Tatra bhagavā”ti vutte na tathā byañjanānaṃ siliṭṭhatā, yathā “tatra kho bhagavā”ti
tika-s0301t:267_1: vutteti āha “byañjanasiliṭṭhatāvasenā”ti. Parisajeṭṭhaketi parisāya jeṭṭhake, ye
tika-s0301t:267_2: tassā desanāya visesato bhājanabhūtā. Parisajeṭṭhake bhikkhūti catuparisajeṭṭhake
tika-s0301t:267_3: bhikkhū. Catunnaṃ hi parisānaṃ jeṭṭhā bhikkhuparisā paṭhamuppannattā. Āmantesīti
tika-s0301t:267_4: sambodhesi, sambodhanañca jānāpananti āha “jānāpesī”ti. Bhadanteti garugāravasappatissavavacanametaṃ,
tika-s0301t:267_5: atthato pana bhadanteti bhaddaṃ tava hotu attano niṭṭhānapariyosānattā paresañca
tika-s0301t:267_6: santatāvahattā. Bhagavato paccassosunti ettha bhagavatoti sāmivacanaṃ āmantanameva
tika-s0301t:267_8: Bhagavatoti pana idaṃ patissavanasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ yathā “devadattassa
tika-s0301t:267_9: paṭissuṇātī”ti. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ nidānavaggassa ādisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgamissati.
tika-s0301t:268_0: Tāvatiṃsakāyoti tāvatiṃsasaññito devanikāyo. Dutiyadevalokoti chasu kāmalokesu dutiyo
tika-s0301t:268_1: devaloko. Tettiṃsa janā sahapuññakārino tattha uppannā, taṃsahacaritaṭṭhānaṃ tāvatiṃsaṃ,
tika-s0301t:268_2: tannivāsinopi tāvatiṃsanāmakā sahacaraṇañāyenāti āha “maghena māṇavenā”tiādi. Ayaṃ
tika-s0301t:268_3: pana kecivādo byāpanno hotīti taṃ arocentena “vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Byāpannataṃ dassento
tika-s0301t:268_4: “yasmā panā”tiādimāha. Tathā hi vakkhati “evaṃ hi niddosaṃ padaṃ hotī”ti. Nāmapaṇṇattiyevāti
tika-s0301t:269_0: Taṃ vananti taṃ upavanaṃ. Paviṭṭhe paviṭṭhe dukkhappattepi attano sampattiyā nandayati,
tika-s0301t:269_1: pageva adukkhappatteti dassetuṃ “pañcasu hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pavesitānanti pakoṭṭhavārena
tika-s0301t:269_2: pavesitānampīti adhippāyo. Cavanakāleyeva thokaṃ dissamānavikārā hutvā cavanti, te
tika-s0301t:269_3: sandhāya “himapiṇḍo viya vilīyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Ye pana adissamānavikārā sahasā antaradhāyanti,
tika-s0301t:269_4: te sandhāya “dīpasikhā viya vijjhāyantī”ti vuttanti vadanti. Nandayati pakatiyā somanassitaṃ
tika-s0301t:269_5: domanassitañca. Nandaneti evaṃanvatthanāmake uyyāne. Parivutāti “devatā”ti vacanaṃ
tika-s0301t:269_6: upādāya itthiliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Devaputto hi so.
tika-s0301t:270_0: Divi bhavattā dibbāti āha “devaloke nibbattehī”ti. Kāmetabbatāya kāmabandhanehi,
tika-s0301t:270_1: tathā aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇasabhāvatāya kāmakoṭṭhāsehi. Upetāti upagatā samannāgatā.
tika-s0301t:270_2: Paricārayamānāti pariramamānā. Idañhi padaṃ apekkhitvā “kāmaguṇehī”ti kattari karaṇavacanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:270_3: purimāni apekkhitvā sahayoge. Ramamānā carantīti katvā vuttaṃ “ramamānā”ti. Paricārayamānāti
tika-s0301t:270_4: vā parito samantato cārayamānāti atthoti āha “indriyāni sañcārayamānā”ti. Paṭhamanaye
tika-s0301t:270_5: hi anubhavanattho paricaraṇasaddo, dutiyanaye parivattanattho. So panāti “tāyaṃ velāya”nti
tika-s0301t:270_6: vuttakālo. Adhunāti sampati. So vicarīti sambandho. Kāmaguṇehīti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:270_7: Ovutoti yathā taṃ na ñāyati, evaṃ pihitacitto. Nivuto pariyonaddhoti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:270_8: Tenāha “lokābhibhūto”ti. Āsabhinti seṭṭhaṃ “aggohamasmi lokassā”tiādinā bhāsanto bodhisatto viya.
tika-s0301t:271_0: Kevalaṃ dassanaṃ kimatthiyanti āha – “ye…pe… vasenā”ti, tasmiṃ nandanavane avaṭṭhitakāmabhāgānubhavanavasenāti
tika-s0301t:271_1: attho. Naradevānanti purisabhūtadevatānaṃ. Tenāha “devapurisāna”nti. Appakaṃ adhikaṃ
tika-s0301t:271_2: ūnaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ nāma na hotīti “tikkhattuṃ dasanna”nti vuttaṃ. “Tettiṃsāna”nti
tika-s0301t:271_3: hi vattabbe ayaṃ ruḷhī. Parivārasaṅkhātena, na kittisaṅkhātenāti adhippāyo. Sīlācārādiguṇanemittikā
tika-s0301t:271_4: hi kitti. “Tāvatiṃsā devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā”ti evamādivacanena yase
tika-s0301t:272_0: Ariyasāvikāti sotāpannā. “Sakadāgāminī”ti keci. Adhippāyaṃ vivaṭṭetvāti yathā tvaṃ
tika-s0301t:272_1: andhabāle maññasi, dhammasabhāvo evaṃ na hotīti tassā devatāya adhippāyaṃ viparivattetvā.
tika-s0301t:272_2: Ekantato sukhaṃ nāma nibbānameva. Kāmā hi dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammāti iminā adhippāyena
tika-s0301t:272_3: tassā adhippāyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā. Kāmaṃ catutthabhūmakāpi saṅkhārā aniccā eva, te pana
tika-s0301t:272_4: sammasanūpagā na hontīti tebhūmakaggahaṇaṃ sammasanayoggena. Hutvāti pubbe avijjamānā
tika-s0301t:272_5: paccayasamavāyena bhavitvā uppajjitvā. Etena nesaṃ bhāvabhāgo dassito. Abhāvatthenāti
tika-s0301t:273_0: Aniccā addhuvā, tato eva “mayhaṃ ime sukhā”ti vā na iccāti aniccā. Uppādavayasabhāvāti
tika-s0301t:273_1: khaṇe khaṇe uppajjananirujjhanasabhāvā. Tenāha “uppa…pe… vevacana”nti. Purimassa
tika-s0301t:273_2: vā pacchimaṃ kāraṇavevacananti āha “yasmā vā”tiādi. Tadanantarāti tesaṃ uppādavayānaṃ
tika-s0301t:273_3: antare. Vemajjhaṭṭhānanti ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ vadati. Ye pana “saṅkhārānaṃ ṭhiti natthī”ti
tika-s0301t:273_4: vadanti, tesaṃ taṃ micchā. Yathā hi tasseva dhammassa uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgāvatthā
tika-s0301t:273_5: icchitā, aññathā aññaṃ uppajjati, aññaṃ nirujjhatīti āpajjati, evaṃ uppannassa bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthā
tika-s0301t:273_6: icchitabbā, sāva ṭhitikkhaṇo. Na hi uppajjamāno bhijjatīti sakkā viññātunti. Vūpasamasaṅkhātanti
tika-s0301t:273_7: accantaṃ vūpasamasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānameva sukhaṃ, na tayā adhippetā kāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:276_0: 12. Nandatīti ettha nandanaṃ sappītikakāmataṇhākiccanti āha – “tussatī”ti, tasmā
tika-s0301t:276_1: kāmaparitosena haṭṭhatuṭṭho hotīti attho. Puttimāti puttavā. Pahūte cāyaṃ mā-saddoti
tika-s0301t:276_2: āha “bahuputto”ti. Bahuputtatāgahaṇena idaṃ payojananti dassento “tassa hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:276_3: Pūrentīti padaṃ apekkhitvā dhaññassāti sāmivacanaṃ. Iti āhāti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha,
tika-s0301t:276_4: evaṃadhippāyo hutvāti attho. Gosāmikoti gomā. Idhāpi pahūte mā-saddo. Gorasasampattinti
tika-s0301t:276_5: gorasehi nipphajjanasampattiṃ. Upadhīti paccattabahuvacanaṃ. Hīti hetuatthe nipāto.
tika-s0301t:276_6: Nandayanti pītisomanassaṃ janayantīti nandanā. Kāmaṃ dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-s0301t:276_7: nippariyāyato kāmā “upadhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti, tassā pana devatāya adhippāyavasenāha
tika-s0301t:276_9: saṃsāradukkhaṃ kilesahetukaṃ, visesato pana pāpadhammā apāyūpapattiṃ nibbattentīti
tika-s0301t:276_10: āha – “kilesāpi apāyadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato”ti. Upasaṃharamānāti upanentā uppādentā.
tika-s0301t:276_11: Manussajātikopi dullabhaghāsacchādanatāya dukkhabahulo peto viyāti manussapeto. Manussajātikopi
tika-s0301t:276_12: vuttarūpo anatthapātito parehi hiṃsito samāno nerayiko viyāti manussanerayiko.
tika-s0301t:277_0: Phalena rukkhato phalaṃ pātento viya. Tatheva navahākārehīti yathā tīsu kālesu nāsamaraṇabhedanavasena
tika-s0301t:277_1: puttimā puttanimittaṃ, tatheva gomā gonimittaṃ socati navappakārehi. Pañca kāmaguṇopadhīpi
tika-s0301t:277_2: naraṃ socentīti yojanā. Tassāti yo uttari anugijjhati tassa. Kāmayānassāti jātakāmacchandassa.
tika-s0301t:277_3: Jantunoti sattassa. Parihāyanti ce vinassanti ce. Sallaviddhovāti sallena viddho
tika-s0301t:277_4: viya. Ruppatīti vikāraṃ āpajjati, socatīti attho. Narassa socanā sokaghaṭṭanapaccayo.
tika-s0301t:277_5: Upadhayo natthīti kāmaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārūpadhayo tāva khīṇāsavassa nattheva maggādhigamena
tika-s0301t:277_6: nirodhitattā, khandhūpadhayo pana kathanti? Tepi tassa saupādisesakālepi aṭṭhuppattihetubhūtā
tika-s0301t:277_7: na santeva, ayañca anupādisesakāle. Tenāha “so nirupadhi mahākhīṇāsavo”ti.
tika-s0301t:280_1: Gosamitanti gohi samaṃ kataṃ. Tenāha “gohi sama”nti. Sūriyassa samāti sūriyasamā.
tika-s0301t:280_2: Avayavasambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Avayavo cettha ābhā evāti viññāyati “anantaraṃ
tika-s0301t:280_3: ābhā”ti vuccamānattāti āha “sūriyābhāya samā”tiādi. Mahoghabhāvena saranti savantīti
tika-s0301t:280_4: sarā, mahantā jalāsayā. Sabbe te samuddaparamā orimajanehi adiṭṭhaparatīrattā tassa.
tika-s0301t:281_0: Natthi attasamaṃ pemanti gāthāya paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Attapemena
tika-s0301t:281_1: samaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthīti ayamattho. Anudakakantāre ghammasantāpaṃ asahantiyā aṅke
tika-s0301t:281_2: ṭhapitaputtakaṃ kandantaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā tassa upari ṭhatvā mataitthivatthunā
tika-s0301t:281_3: dīpetabbaṃ. Tenāha – “mātāpitādayo hi chaḍḍetvāpi puttadhītādayo”ti. Tathā cāha –
tika-s0301t:286_0: Dhaññena samaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi, yasmā tappaṭibaddhā āhārūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitavutti.
tika-s0301t:286_1: Tathārūpe kāleti dubbhikkhakāle. Ekadesaṃyeva obhāsantīti ekasmiṃ khaṇe catūsu mahādīpesu
tika-s0301t:286_2: obhāsaṃ pharituṃ asamatthattā sūriyassapi, pageva itaresaṃ. Bodhisattassa udayabbayassa
tika-s0301t:286_3: ñāṇānubhāvena sakalajātikhettaṃ ekālokaṃ ahosīti āha “paññā…pe… sakkotī”ti. Tamaṃ
tika-s0301t:286_4: vidhamatīti pubbenivāsañāṇādayo paññā yattha pavattanti, tamanavasesaṃ byāpetvā ekappahārena
tika-s0301t:286_5: pavattanato. “Vuṭṭhiyā pana pavattamānāya yāva ābhassarabhavanā”ti pacuravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:289_0: 14. Khettato vivādā satte tāyatīti khattiyo. Vadati devatā attano ajjhāsayavasena.
tika-s0301t:289_1: Dvipadādīnanti ādi-saddena catuppadabhariyaputtā gahitā. Buddhādayoti ādi-saddena
tika-s0301t:289_2: ājānīyasussūsabhariyassavaputtā. Dvipadānaṃ seṭṭhoti ettha dvipadānaṃ eva seṭṭhoti
tika-s0301t:289_3: nāyaṃ niyamo icchito, seṭṭho evāti pana icchito, tasmā sambuddho dvipadesu aññesu
tika-s0301t:289_4: tattha ca uppajjanato seṭṭho eva sabbesampi uttaritarassa abhāvatoti ayamettha attho.
tika-s0301t:289_5: Tenāha “uppajjamāno panesā”tiādi. Kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ājānātīti ājānīyo. Gaṇhāpethāti yathā
tika-s0301t:289_6: udako na temissati, evaṃ vāḷaṃ gaṇhāpetha. “Asussūsā”ti keci paṭhanti. Āsuṇamānoti
tika-s0301t:292_0: 15. Ṭhite majjhanhiketi pubbaddhaṃ nikkhamitvā aparaddhaṃ appatvā ṭhitamajjhanhe.
tika-s0301t:292_1: Sannisīvesūti parissamavinodanatthaṃ sabbaso sannisīdantesu. Da-kārassa hi va-kāraṃ
tika-s0301t:292_2: katvā niddeso. Tenāha “sannisinnesu vissamamānesū”ti. Sabbasattānanti sabbesañca
tika-s0301t:292_4: asamatthakālo. Saṇati viyāti saddaṃ karoti viya, yathā taṃ aññampi mahāvanaṃ vakkhamānanayena.
tika-s0301t:292_6: Dutiyakaṃ sahāyaṃ alabhantī anabhiratiparitassanāya evamāha. Anappakaṃ sukhanti vipulaṃ
tika-s0301t:293_0: Ekavihāratāya suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa. Tena kāyavivekaṃ dasseti. Aniccānupassanādīhi
tika-s0301t:293_1: niccasaññādippahānena santacittassa. Tena cittavivekaṃ dasseti. Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanato
tika-s0301t:293_2: bhikkhuno ubhayavivekasampannassa, tato eva uttariṃ manussadhammato ratiṃ lābhino.
tika-s0301t:293_3: Amānusī ratīti bhāvanārati. Puratoti purimabhāge. Pacchatoti pacchimabhāge. Aparoti
tika-s0301t:293_4: añño. Puratoti vā anāgate, anāgataṃ ārabbhāti attho. Pacchatoti atīte atītaṃ ārabbha
tika-s0301t:293_5: paṭipattiyā vibādhanato. Paroti kodho cittapaṭidussanatāya. Na paroti aparo, lobho,
tika-s0301t:293_6: so ce na vijjati. Etena anāgatappajappanāya atītānusocanāya ca abhāvaṃ dasseti. Atīva
tika-s0301t:293_7: phāsu bhavatīti nīvaraṇajeṭṭhakassa kāmacchandassa vigamena vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa
tika-s0301t:293_8: jhānassa vasena ativiya phāsuvihāro hoti. Ekassa vasato vaneti taṇhādutiyikābhāvena
tika-s0301t:293_9: ekassa araññe vivekavāsaṃ vasato. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0301t:296_0: 16. Pacchime māse pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā
tika-s0301t:296_1: dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajānoti ettakaṃ pāṭhaṃ saṅkhipitvā “niddaṃ okkamitā”ti
tika-s0301t:296_2: vuttaṃ. Kiriyāmayacittehi avomisso bhavaṅgasoto abyākataniddā. Sā hi khīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-s0301t:296_3: uppajjanārahā, tassā pubbabhāgāparabhāgesu…pe… uppannaṃ thinamiddhaṃ idhādhippetā
tika-s0301t:296_4: niddā, sā akhīṇāsavānaṃ yebhuyyena aniyatakālā, tabbidhuraniyatasabbhāvaṃ dassento
tika-s0301t:296_5: “aticchāta…pe… āgantukaṃ ālasiya”nti āha. Kāyālasiyapaccayā vīriyassa paṭipakkhabhūtā
tika-s0301t:296_6: cattāro akusalakkhandhā tandī nāma. Tandīti sabhāvaniddeso. Tandiyanāti ākāraniṃddeso.
tika-s0301t:296_7: Tandīmanatāti tandībhūtacittatā. Ālasyanti alasabhāvāharaṇaṃ. Ālasyāyitattanti alasabhāvappatti.
tika-s0301t:296_8: Kāyavijambhanāti kāyassa vināmanā. Akusalapakkhā ukkaṇṭhitatāti akusalapakkhiyā anabhirati.
tika-s0301t:296_9: Bhattakilamathoti yathāvuttassa bhattavatthukassa āhārassa vasena sarīre uppajjanakakhedo.
tika-s0301t:296_10: Upakkiliṭṭhoti paññāya dubbalīkaraṇena upakkiliṭṭhacitto. Cittassa asamāhitattā nivāritapātubhāvo.
tika-s0301t:296_11: Ariyamaggassa jotanaṃ nāma uppajjanamevāti āha “na jotati, na pātubhavatīti attho”ti.
tika-s0301t:297_1: adhippeto. Nīharitvāti nīharaṇahetu. Hetuattho hi ayaṃ tvā-saddo “paññāya cassa disvā”tiādīsu
tika-s0301t:297_2: viya. Tena “maggo visujjhatī”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. “Ariyamaggaṃ visujjhatī”ti keci paṭhanti.
tika-s0301t:300_0: 17. Dukkhaṃ titikkhanti duttitikkhaṃ. Tañca dukkhamaṃ dussahanaṃ ārambhavasena dukkaraṃ,
tika-s0301t:300_1: anuyuñjanavasena duttitikkhanti. Abyattenāti sāmaññassa upakārānupakāre dhamme jānanasamatthāya
tika-s0301t:300_2: veyyattiyasaṅkhātāya paññāya abhāvato na byattena. Tenāha “bālenā”ti. Yasmiṃ dhamme
tika-s0301t:300_3: sati samaṇoti vuccati, taṃ sāmaññanti āha “samaṇadhammo”ti. Imināti “dukkaraṃ duttitikkhañca,
tika-s0301t:300_4: abyattena ca sāmañña”nti iminā gāthaddhena idaṃ dassetīti idaṃ idāni vuccamānaṃ atthajātaṃ
tika-s0301t:300_5: dasseti. Abhidantanti abhibhavanadantaṃ, uparidantanti attho. So hi itaraṃ musalaṃ
tika-s0301t:300_6: viya udukkhalaṃ visesato kassaci khādanakāle abhibhuyya vattati. Ādhāyāti nippīḷanavaseneva
tika-s0301t:300_7: ṭhapetvā. Tāluṃ āhaccāti tālupadesamāhanitvā viya. Cetasāti kusalacittena. Cittanti
tika-s0301t:300_8: akusalacittaṃ. Abhiniggaṇhitvāti yathā atisamudācāro na hoti, evaṃ vibādhanavasena
tika-s0301t:300_9: niggahetvā. Āpāṇakoṭikanti pāṇakoṭipariyosānaṃ, parijīvanti attho. Sambādhetīti sambādho,
tika-s0301t:301: Pajjati cittametthāti padaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ. Iriyāpathaṃ eva padaṃ iriyāpathapadaṃ.
tika-s0301t:302_0: Gīvā cattāro pādāti gīvapañcamāni. Samodahanti vā samodhānahetūti ayamettha atthoti
tika-s0301t:302_1: āha – “samodahitvā vā”ti, sammā odhāya anto pavesetvāti attho. Sake ārammaṇakapāleti
tika-s0301t:302_2: gocarajjhattaṃ vadati. Samodahanti samodahanto. Anissitoti tebhūmakadhammesu kañcipi
tika-s0301t:302_3: dhammaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesavasena anissito. Avihiṃsamāno vihiṃsānimittānaṃ pajahanena.
tika-s0301t:305_0: 18. Nisedhetīti nivāreti pavattituṃ na deti. Pucchati devatā. Apaharantoti apanento,
tika-s0301t:305_1: yathā sabbena sabbaṃ akkosavatthu na hoti, evaṃ pariharantoti attho. Bujjhati sārathividhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:305_2: Attani nipātaṃ na deti, ājānīyo hi yuttaṃ pajānāti. Abhūtena abhūtakkosena parimutto
tika-s0301t:305_3: nāma natthi bālānañca janānaṃ parāpavāde yuttapayuttabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā –
tika-s0301t:308: Tanuyāti vā katipayā. Tenāha “appakā”ti. Sadā satāti hirinisedhabhāve kāraṇavacanaṃ. Pappuyyāti patvā adhigantvā. Vānato nikkhantattā nibbānaṃ, asaṅkhatadhātu.
tika-s0301t:311_0: 19. Antoti kucchiabbhantare. Vasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti vasanabhāvena. Kulapaveṇinti kulācāraṃ
tika-s0301t:311_1: kulatantiṃ. Santānakaṭṭhenāti kulasantatiyā bandhanabhāvena. Evaṃ sabbapadehi pucchitatthassa
tika-s0301t:311_2: anujānanavasena “ekaṃsavacane nipāto”ti vuttaṃ. Āpādikā posikā mātucchā mahāpajāpati
tika-s0301t:311_3: mātā evāti katvā “pahāya pabbajitattā”ti avisesato vuttaṃ. Pahāya pabbajitattā natthīti
tika-s0301t:311_4: ānetvā sambandho. Puna mātukucchivāsādīnaṃ abhāvavacaneneva vaṭṭamhi bandhanassa
tika-s0301t:311_5: abhāvo dīpito hotīti na gahito. Ayaṃ kira devatā yathā puthujjanā buddhānaṃ guṇe
tika-s0301t:311_6: na jānanti, evaṃ na jānāti, tasmā “mayā sannāhaṃ bandhitvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:314_0: 20. Tapanabhāvena tapanodakattā tapodāti tassa rahadassa nāmaṃ. Tenāha “tattodakassa
tika-s0301t:314_1: rahadassā”ti. Tatoti nāgabhavane udakarahadato tapodā nāma nadī sandati. Sā hi nadī
tika-s0301t:314_2: bhūmitalaṃ ārohati. “Edisā jātā”ti vacanaseso. Petalokoti lohakumbhinirayā idhādhippetāti
tika-s0301t:314_3: vadanti. Rahadassa pana ādito pabbatapādavanantaresu bahū petā viharanti, svāyamattho
tika-s0301t:314_4: petavatthupāḷiyā lakkhaṇasaṃyuttena ca dīpetabbo. Yatāyanti yato rahadato ayaṃ. Sātodakoti
tika-s0301t:314_5: madhurodako. Setodakoti parisuddhodako, anāvilodakoti attho. Tatoti tapodānadito.
tika-s0301t:315_0: Samiddhoti avayavānaṃ sampuṇṇatāya saṃsiddhiyāva sammā iddho. Tenāha “abhirūpo”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:315_1: Padhāne sammasanadhamme niyutto, taṃ vā ettha atthīti padhāniko. Senāsanaṃ suṭṭhapitadvāravātapānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:316_0: Pubbāpayamānoti nhānato pubbabhāge viya vodakabhāvaṃ āpajjamāno gamento. Avattaṃ
tika-s0301t:316_1: paṭikkhipitvā vattaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha…pe… na otaritabba”nti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbadisāpalokanaṃ
tika-s0301t:316_2: yathā nhāyanaṭṭhānassa manussehi vivittabhāvajānanatthaṃ. Khāṇuādivavatthāpanaṃ cīvarādīnaṃ
tika-s0301t:316_3: ṭhapanatthaṃ udakasamīpeti adhippāyo. Ukkāsanaṃ amanussānaṃ apagamanatthaṃ. Avakujjaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:316_4: taṅkhaṇepi uparimakāyassa ujukaṃ avivaṭakaraṇatthaṃ. Cīvarapiṭṭheyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ
tika-s0301t:316_5: yattha vā tattha vā aṭṭhapetvā. Udakanteti udakasamīpe. Sinnaṭṭhānanti sedagatapadeso.
tika-s0301t:316_6: Pasāretabbaṃ tassa sukkhāpanatthaṃ. Saṃharitvā ṭhapanaṃ puna sukhena gahetvā nivāsanatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:316_7: Nābhippamāṇamattaṃ otaraṇaṃ tāvatā udakapaṭicchādilakkhaṇappattato. Vīciṃ anuṭṭhāpentenātiādi
tika-s0301t:316_8: saṃyatakāritādassanaṃ. Nivāsanaṃ parikkhipitvāti antaravāsakaṃ kaṭippadesassa yathā
tika-s0301t:317_0: Sarīravaṇṇopi vippasīdi sammadeva bhāvanānussatimpi vindantassāti adhippāyo. Samanaṃ
tika-s0301t:317_1: niggahetunti kilesavasaṃ gataṃ attano cittaṃ niggaṇhituṃ. Kāmūpanītāti kāmaṃ upagatacittā.
tika-s0301t:318_0: Aparibhuñjitvāti ananubhotvā. Anubhavitabbanti atthato āpannamevāti āha “pañcakāmaguṇe”ti.
tika-s0301t:318_1: Bhikkhasīti yācasi. Tañca bhikkhācariyavasenāti āha “piṇḍāya carasī”ti. Kāmaparibhogagarugamanakālo
tika-s0301t:318_2: nāma visesato paṭhamayobbanāvatthāti āha “daharayobbanakālo”ti. Obhaggenāti majjhe
tika-s0301t:318_3: saṃbhaggakāyena. Jiṇṇakāle hi sattānaṃ kaṭiyaṃ kāyo obhaggo hoti.
tika-s0301t:319_0: Voti nipātamattaṃ “ye hi vo ariyā”tiādīsu viya. Sattānanti sāmaññavacanaṃ, na manussānaṃ
tika-s0301t:319_1: eva. Dehanikkhepananti kaḷevaraṭṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ. Natthi etesaṃ nimittanti animittā,
tika-s0301t:319_2: “ettakaṃ ayaṃ jīvatī”tiādinā sañjānananimittarahitāti attho. Na nāyareti na ñāyanti.
tika-s0301t:319_3: Ito paranti ettha paranti aññaṃ kālaṃ. Tena orakālassapi saṅgaho siddho hoti. Paramāyuno
tika-s0301t:319_4: orakāle eva cettha paranti adhippetaṃ tato paraṃ sattānaṃ jīvitassa abhāvato. Vavatthānābhāvatoti
tika-s0301t:319_5: kālavasena vavatthānābhāvato. Vavatthānanti cettha paricchedo veditabbo, na asaṅkarato
tika-s0301t:319_6: vavatthānaṃ, nicchayo vā. Abbudapesītiādīsu abbudakālo pesikālotiādinā kāla-saddo
tika-s0301t:319_7: paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Kāloti idha pubbaṇhādivelā adhippetā. Tenāha pubbaṇhepi hītiādi.
tika-s0301t:319_8: Idheva dehena patitabbanti sambandho. Anekappakāratoti nagare jātānaṃ gāme, gāme
tika-s0301t:319_9: jātānaṃ nagare, vane jātānaṃ janapade, janapade jātānaṃ vanetiādinā anekappakārato.
tika-s0301t:319_10: Ito cutenāti ito gatito cutena. Idha imissaṃ gatiyaṃ. Yante yuttagoṇo viyāti yathā
tika-s0301t:319_11: yante yuttagoṇo yantaṃ nātivattati, evaṃ kālo gatipañcakanti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:320_0: Ayaṃ kāloti ayaṃ maraṇakālo. Pacchime kāleti pacchime vaye. Tisso vayosīmāti. Paṭhamādikā
tika-s0301t:320_1: tisso vayassa sīmā atikkantena. Purimānaṃ hi dvinnaṃ vayānaṃ sabbaso sīmā atikkamitvā
tika-s0301t:320_2: pacchimassa ādisīmaṃ atikkanto tathā vutto. “Ayañhi samaṇadhammo…pe… na sakkā kātu”nti
tika-s0301t:320_3: vatvā tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “tadā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gaṇhitunti pāḷito atthato
tika-s0301t:320_4: ca hadaye ṭhapanavasena gaṇhituṃ. Paribhuñjitunti vuttadhammapariharaṇasukhaṃ anubhavituṃ.
tika-s0301t:320_5: Ekassa kathanato paṭhamaṃ gāthaṃ suttaṃ vā ussāreti, tasmiṃ niṭṭhite itaro dhammakathiko
tika-s0301t:320_6: taṃyeva vitthārento dhammaṃ katheti, ayaṃ sarabhāṇadhammakathā. Suttageyyānusārena
tika-s0301t:320_7: yāva pariyosānā ussāraṇaṃ sarabhaññadhammakathā. “Mā maṃ kālo upaccagā”ti vadanto
tika-s0301t:320_8: “samaṇadhammassa karaṇassa ayaṃ me kālo”ti katheti, tato paro “pacchimavayo añño
tika-s0301t:320_9: kālo”ti katheti. “Kālaṃ vohaṃ…pe… tasmā abhutvā bhikkhāmī”ti vadanto attanā kataṃ
tika-s0301t:321_0: Taṃ gāravakāraṇaṃ sandhāya. Etanti “atha kho sā devatā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā”ti
tika-s0301t:321_1: etaṃ vuttaṃ. Daharo tvantiādimāha lobhābhibhūtatāya adhigatattā. Sabbasampattiyuttoti
tika-s0301t:321_2: bhogasampadā parivārasampadāti sabbasampattīhi yutto. Alaṅkāraparihāranti alaṅkārakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:321_3: Anikkīḷitāvīti akīḷitapubbo. Kīḷanañcettha kāmānaṃ paribhogoti āha “abhuttāvī”ti.
tika-s0301t:321_4: Akatakāmakīḷoti akatakāmānubhavanappayogo. Sayaṃ attanā eva dissantīti sandiṭṭhā,
tika-s0301t:321_5: sandiṭṭhā eva sandiṭṭhikā, attapaccakkhato sandiṭṭhikā. Pakaṭṭho kālo patto etesanti kālikā, te kālike.
tika-s0301t:322_3: sambhatesupi. Sampannakāmassāti samiddhakāmassa. Cittakārā rūpalābhena, potthakārā
tika-s0301t:322_5: naṭādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Sesadvāresūti ettha gandhabbamālākārasūpakārādayo vattabbā.
tika-s0301t:323_3: Asukasmiṃ nāma kāle phalaṃ hotīti evaṃ udikkhitabbo nassa kāloti akālo. Etthāti etesu
tika-s0301t:323_4: navasu lokuttaradhammesu. Ehipassavidhinti “ehi passā”ti evaṃ pavattavidhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:323_5: Upanetabboti vā upaneyyo, so eva opaneyyiko. Viññūhīti vidūhi paṭividdhasaccehi.
tika-s0301t:323_6: Te ekaṃsato ugghaṭitaññūādayo hontīti āha “ugghaṭitaññūādīhī”ti. “Paccatta”nti etassa
tika-s0301t:323_7: patiattanīti bhummavasena attho gahetabboti āha “attani attanī”ti.
tika-s0301t:324: Sabbapadehi sambandhoti “kathaṃ ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo, kathaṃ akāliko”tiādinā sabbehi paccekaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:325_0: Navoti taruṇo na ciravasso. Ye bhikkhunovādakalakkhaṇappattā, te sandhāya “vīsativassato
tika-s0301t:325_1: paṭṭhāya thero”ti vuttaṃ. Idha sāsanaṃ nāma sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ piṭakattayanti āha
tika-s0301t:325_2: “dhammena hī”tiādi. Tattha dhammena vinayo ettha vinā daṇḍasatthehīti dhammavinayo.
tika-s0301t:325_3: Dhammāya vinayo ettha na āmisatthanti dhammavinayo. Dhammato vinayo na adhammatoti
tika-s0301t:325_4: dhammavinayo. Dhammo vā bhagavā dhammassāmī dhammakāyattā, tassa dhammasaññitassa
tika-s0301t:325_5: satthu vinayo, na takkikānanti dhammavinayo. Dhamme vinayo na adhamme vinayo. Dhammo
tika-s0301t:325_6: ca so yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne satte apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti, sabbe saṃkilesato
tika-s0301t:325_7: vinetīti vinayo cāti dhammavinayo. Tenāha “ubhayampetaṃ sāsanasseva nāma”nti.
tika-s0301t:326_0: Dhammavinayoti dhammena yutto vinayoti dhammavinayo ājaññaratho viya. Dhammo ca vinayo
tika-s0301t:326_1: cāti vā dhammavinayo, taṃ dhammavinayaṃ. Dhammavinayānañhi satthubhāvavacanato dhammavinayattasaṃsiddhi
tika-s0301t:326_2: dhammavinayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ visesanato. Abhidhammepi vinayavacananti dhammavinayadvayasiddhi,
tika-s0301t:326_4: vinayo catudhā paññatto sīlācārato parājitavasena. Dhammacariyā sakavisayo, vinayapaññatti
tika-s0301t:326_5: buddhavisayo. Pariyāyena desito dhammo, nippariyāyena paññatto vinayo. Dhammadesanā
tika-s0301t:326_7: dhammo, sammutisaccappadhāno vinayo. Āsayasuddhipadhāno dhammo, payogasuddhipadhāno vinayo.
tika-s0301t:327_0: Kiriyadvayasiddhiyā dhammavinayasiddhi. Dhammena hi anusāsanasiddhi, vinayena ovādasiddhi.
tika-s0301t:327_2: dhammavinayasiddhi. Dhammena hi visesato pakatisāvajjapariccāgasiddhi, vinayena paññattisāvajjapariccāgasiddhi.
tika-s0301t:327_6: duvidhaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammo attā ca. Tattha dhammo suciṇṇo saraṇaṃ. “Dhammo have rakkhati
tika-s0301t:327_7: dhammacāri”nti hi vuttaṃ. Sudanto attāpi saraṇaṃ “attā hi attano nātho”ti vacanato.
tika-s0301t:327_8: Tena vuttaṃ “saraṇadvayasiddhiyā dhammavinayasiddhī”ti. Tattha yatassa dhammasiddhi,
tika-s0301t:327_9: yato ca vinayasiddhi, tadubhayaṃ dassento āha – “dhammena hettha dve piṭakāni vuttāni,
tika-s0301t:327_10: vinayena vinayapiṭaka”nti. Adhunā āgato idāneva na cirasseva upagato.
tika-s0301t:328_0: Mahante ṭhāne ṭhapetvāti mahesakkhatādassanatthaṃ attano parivārena mahantaṭṭhāne
tika-s0301t:328_2: Sabbepi kira nisīdantā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvāva nisīdanti. Thirakaraṇavasenāti daḷhīkaraṇavasena.
tika-s0301t:328_3: Ayaṃ kira devatā ñāṇasampannā mānajātikā, tasmā nāyaṃ mānaṃ appahāya mama desanaṃ
tika-s0301t:328_4: paṭivijjhituṃ sakkotīti mānaniggaṇhanatthaṃ ādito duviññeyyaṃ kathento bhagavā “akkheyyasaññino”tiādinā
tika-s0301t:328_5: tāya ñātumicchitakāmānaṃ kālikādibhāvaṃ, dhammassa ca sandiṭṭhikādibhāvaṃ vibhāvento dve gāthā abhāsi.
tika-s0301t:329_0: Akkheyyatoti gihiliṅgapariyāyanāmavisesādivasena tathā tathā akkhātabbato. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:329_1: “kathānaṃ vatthubhūtato”ti. Etesanti sattānaṃ. Patiṭṭhitāti pavattitā āsattā. Pañcannaṃ
tika-s0301t:329_2: kāmasaṅgādīnaṃ vasena āsattā hontu, itaresaṃ pana kathanti? Aniṭṭhaṅgatopi hi “idaṃ
tika-s0301t:329_3: nu kho”tiādinā kaṅkhato tattha āsatto eva nāma avijahanato, tathā vikkhepagato vikkhepavatthusmiṃ,
tika-s0301t:329_4: anusayānaṃ pana āsattabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Maccuno yoganti, maccubandhanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:329_5: maraṇadhammatanti attho. Yasmā apariññātavatthukā anatītamaraṇattā maccunā yathāruci
tika-s0301t:329_6: payojetabbā, tattha tattha uparūpari ca khipitāya āṇāya abbhantare eva honti, tasmā
tika-s0301t:329_7: vuttaṃ “payogaṃ…pe… āgacchantī”ti. Yasmā tebhūmakā dhammā kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā, nesampi
tika-s0301t:329_8: kālassa laddhabbatāya kālikatā idha akkheyyavacanena paveditā. Tenāha – “evamimāya
tika-s0301t:329_9: gāthāya kālikā kāmā kathitā”ti. Sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kamanīyā, yasmā ca kālikānaṃ
tika-s0301t:329_10: kāmānaṃ tathāsabhāvatā kathitā. Ayampi gāthā tadatthameva dīpetīti imāya te kathitā
tika-s0301t:329_11: eva honti. Ye ca sattā pañcasu khandhesu diṭṭhitaṇhādivasena patiṭṭhitā “itthī, puriso,
tika-s0301t:329_12: ahaṃ, mamā”ti ca abhinivisiya kāme paribhuñjanti, te maraṇaṃ nātivattanti. Evampettha
tika-s0301t:329_13: kāmānaṃ kālikattho kathitoti āha “kālikā kāmā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:330_0: Ayaṃ ñātapariññāti rūpārūpadhamme lakkhaṇādito ñāte katvā paricchindanapaññā. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:330_1: “evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā”tiādi. Padaṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva cettha tesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ paccayo
tika-s0301t:330_2: gahitoti paccayapariggahassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tīreti tuleti vīmaṃsati. Dvācattālīsāya
tika-s0301t:330_3: ākārehīti iminā matthakappattaṃ mahāvipassanaṃ dasseti. Te pana ākārā visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0301t:330_5: ekadesena pahānaṃ labbhateva, anavasesato pana pahānavasena pahānapariññaṃ dassento
tika-s0301t:330_6: āha “aggamaggena …pe… ayaṃ pahānapariññā”ti. Tathā ca āha “evaṃ tīhi pariññāhī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:331_0: Akkhātāranti akkhātabbaṃ, na akkheyyakaṃ. Tenāha “kammavasena kāraka”ntiādi. Kārakanti
tika-s0301t:331_1: ca sādhanamāha. Na maññatīti vā maññanaṃ nappavatteti akkhātāranti khīṇāsavaṃ. Atha
tika-s0301t:331_2: vā tañhi tassa na hotīti taṃ kāraṇaṃ tassa khīṇāsavassa na hoti na vijjati, yena
tika-s0301t:331_4: vā “puriso”ti vā abhinivissa vadeyyāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Manussanāgādīhi
tika-s0301t:331_6: Akkheyyanti pahānapariññāya pahānamaggo, tassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānampi gahitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:331_7: Na maññatīti khīṇāsavassa assa phalappattīti āha “navavidho lokuttaradhammo kathito”ti.
tika-s0301t:332_0: Visesīti visesajātiādivasena seyyoti attho. Tesu gahitesūti tesu seyyamānādīsu tīsu
tika-s0301t:332_1: mānesu gahitesu. Tayo seyyamānā, tayo sadisamānā, tayo hīnamānā gahitāva honti. So
tika-s0301t:332_2: puggaloti so appahīnamaññanapuggalo. Teneva mānena hetubhūtena. Upaḍḍhagāthāyāti
tika-s0301t:332_3: purimaddhena pana vatthukāmā vuttāti āha “kālikā kāmā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:333_0: Vidhīyati visadisākārena ṭhapīyatīti vidhā, koṭṭhāso. Kathaṃvidhanti kathaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0301t:333_1: kena pakārena pavattitanti attho. Vidahanato hīnādivasena vividhenākārena dahanato
tika-s0301t:333_2: upadhāraṇato vidhā, māno. Mānesūti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, mānahetūti attho. Na calatīti
tika-s0301t:334_0: Paññā “saṅkhā”ti āgatā, paññāti yoniso paṭisaṅkhānaṃ. Saṅkhāyakoti saṅkalanapaduppādanādi-piṇḍagaṇanāvasena
tika-s0301t:334_1: gaṇako papañcasaṅkhāti mānādipapañcabhāgā. Te te dhammā sammā yāthāvato saṅkhāyanti
tika-s0301t:334_2: upatiṭṭhanti etāyāti saṅkhā, paññā. Ekaṃ dvetiādinā saṅkhānaṃ gaṇanaṃ paricchindananti
tika-s0301t:334_3: saṅkhā, gaṇanā. Saṅkhāyati bhāgaso kathīyatīti saṅkhā, koṭṭhāso. Saṅkhānaṃ satto
