tika-s0301t:596_6: Osīdantānanti paṭipakkhavasena adho sīdantānaṃ, ussādayamānānanti attho. Puññakkhettabhūtoti
tika-s0301t:596_7: idaṃ “padasā caramānāna”nti padassa atthavivaraṇavasena bhūtakathanavisesanaṃ. Yādiso
tika-s0301t:596_8: putto vā hotūti idaṃ purimapade devatāya puttagahaṇassa katattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:599_0: 75. Kiṃ sūdha bhītāti ettha su-idhāti nipātamattanti āha “kiṃ bhītā”ti? Maggo ca
tika-s0301t:599_1: nekāyatanappavuttoti anekakāraṇaṃ nānāvidhādhigamokāsaṃ katvā pavutto kathito. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:599_3: tumhehi paveditattā labbhamāne kheme magge kiṃ bhītāyaṃ janatā uppathabhūtā viparītadiṭṭhito
tika-s0301t:599_4: gaṇhīti attho? Evaṃ devatā yathicchāya purimaddhena attanā yathācintitamatthaṃ satthu
tika-s0301t:599_5: paveditā, pacchimaddhena attano saṃsayaṃ pucchati. Bahupaññāti puthupañña. Ussannapaññāti
tika-s0301t:599_6: adhikapaññā. Ṭhapetvāti saṃyametvā. Saṃvibhāgīti āhāraparibhoge sammadeva vibhajanasīlo.
tika-s0301t:600_0: Manenāti manogahaṇena. Pubbasuddhiaṅganti pubbabhāgasuddhibhūtaṃ aṅgaṃ. Catūsūti
tika-s0301t:600_1: vuttaaṅgapariyāpannaṃ. Yaññaupakkharoti dānassa sādhanaṃ. Etesu dhammesūti etesu
tika-s0301t:600_2: saddhādiguṇesu. Yathā hi saddho paccayaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā vatthupariccāgassa visesapaccayo
tika-s0301t:600_3: kammaphalassa paralokassa ca paccakkhato viya pattiyāyanato, evaṃ muduhadayo. Muduhadayo
tika-s0301t:600_4: hi anudayaṃ patvā yaṃ kiñci attano santakaṃ paresaṃ deti. Yo ca saṃvibhāgasīlo, so
tika-s0301t:600_5: appakasmimpi attano santake parehi sādhāraṇabhogī hoti. Vadaññū vadāniyatāya yāginova
tika-s0301t:600_6: yuttaṃ yuttakālaṃ ñatvā atthikānaṃ manorathaṃ pūretīti vuttaṃ “iti…pe… catūsūti āhā”ti.
tika-s0301t:601_0: Vācantiādīni tīṇi aṅgāni tividhasīlasampattidīpanato. Sampannasīlo hi paralokaṃ na
tika-s0301t:601_1: bhāseyya. Saddho ekaṃ aṅgaṃ payogāsayasuddhidīpanato. Suddhāsayassa sammāpayoge ṭhitassa
tika-s0301t:601_2: kathaṃ paralokato bhayanti. Dukavasena caturaṅgayojanā dukanayo. Etesu catūsu dhammesu
tika-s0301t:601_3: ṭhitoti etesu yathāvuttadukasaṅgahesu catūsu guṇesu patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0301t:604_0: 76. Nāmagottanti tisso kassapo gotamoti evarūpaṃ nāmañca gottañca. Nidassanamattametaṃ,
tika-s0301t:604_1: tasmā sabbassa paññattiyā lakkhaṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na jīratīti asabhāvadhammattā
tika-s0301t:604_2: uppādavayābhāvato jaraṃ na pāpuṇāti. Tenāha “jīraṇasabhāvo na hotī”ti. Yasmā samaññābhāvato
tika-s0301t:604_3: kālantarepi taṃ samaññāyateva, tasmā “atītabuddhānaṃ…pe… na jīratīti vuccatī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:605_0: Ālasiyanti alasabhāvo daḷhakosajjaṃ. Tenāha “yenā”tiādi. Ṭhitinti byāpāraṃ. Niddāvasena
tika-s0301t:605_1: pamajjanaṃ kattabbassa akaraṇaṃ. Kilesavasena pamajjanaṃ akattabbassa karaṇampi.
tika-s0301t:605_2: Kammasamayeti kammaṃ kātuṃ yuttakāle. Kammakaraṇavīriyābhāvoti taṃkammakiriyasamuṭṭhāpakavīriyābhāvo.
tika-s0301t:605_3: So pana atthato vīriyapaṭipakkho akusalacittuppādo, na vīriyassa abhāvamattaṃ. Sīlasaññamābhāvo
tika-s0301t:605_4: dussīlyaṃ. Vissaṭṭhācāratā nāma anācāro. Soppabahulatāti niddālutā. Yato gahaṇahatthopi
tika-s0301t:605_5: na kilāsupi puriso niddāya abhibhuyyati. Tenāha “tāyā”tiādi. Aticchātādīnīti ādi-saddena
tika-s0301t:605_6: abhibhuyyatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Āgantukālasiyaṃ na pubbe vuttaālasyaṃ viya pakatisiddhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:605_7: “Te chidde”ti pāḷiyaṃ liṅgavipallāsena vuttanti āha “tāni cha chiddānī”ti. Kusalacittappavattiyā
tika-s0301t:605_8: anokāsabhāvato chiddāni. Tenāha bhagavā – “yattha vittaṃ na tiṭṭhatī”ti. Sabbākārena
tika-s0301t:608_0: 77. Satthassa malanti satthamalaṃ, yena satthaṃ malīnaṃ hoti, satthamalaggahaṇena
tika-s0301t:608_1: cettha malīnaṃ satthameva gahitanti āha “malaggahitasattha”nti. Āṇāpavattananti appake
tika-s0301t:608_2: vā mahante vā yattha katthaci attano āṇāya pavattanavasena vasanaṃ issariyattamicchanti.
tika-s0301t:608_3: Maṇiratanampi vissajjanīyapakkhikattā uttamaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ nāma na hoti, itthī pana pariccattakulācāritthikāyapi
tika-s0301t:608_4: anissajjanīyatāya uttamabhaṇḍaṃ nāma. Tenāha “itthī bhaṇḍānamuttama”nti. Tesaṃ tesañhi
tika-s0301t:608_5: purisājānīyānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya uttamaratanākarattā itthī bhaṇḍānamuttamaṃ. Malaggahitasatthasadiso
tika-s0301t:608_6: avabodhakiccavibandhanato. Satthamalaṃ viya satthassa paññāsatthassa guṇābhāvakaraṇato
tika-s0301t:608_7: paññāsatthamalaṃ. Abbu vuccati upaddavaṃ, taṃ detīti abbudaṃ, vināsakāraṇaṃ. Nanu
tika-s0301t:608_8: haraṇaṃ samaṇassa ayuttanti? Yuttaṃ. Tassa anvayato byatirekato ca yuttataṃ dassento
tika-s0301t:611_0: 78. “Attakāmo”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā āha “ṭhapetvā sabbabodhisatte”ti. Te hi sabbaso
tika-s0301t:611_1: paratthāya eva paṭipajjamānā mahākāruṇikā paratthakāmā, atthakāmā nāma na honti,
tika-s0301t:611_2: yā ca tesaṃ attatthāvahā paṭipatti, sāpi yāvadeva paratthā evāti. Vuttaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0301t:611_3: Yasmā bodhisattā parahitapaṭipattiyā pāramiyo pūrentā tathārūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ patvā attānaṃ
tika-s0301t:611_4: paresaṃ pariccajanti paññāpāramiyā paripūraṇato, tasmā idhāpi “sabbabodhisatte ṭhapetvāyevāti
tika-s0301t:611_5: vutta”nti āha. Kalyāṇanti bhaddakaṃ. Vācāya adhippetattā āha “saṇhaṃ muduka”nti.
tika-s0301t:611_6: Pāpikanti lāmakaṃ nihīnaṃ. Taṃ pana pharusaṃ vācanti sarūpato dasseti.
tika-s0301t:614_0: 79. Saddhā bandhati pātheyyanti saddhā nāma sattassa maraṇavasena mahāpathaṃ saṃvajato
tika-s0301t:614_1: mahākantāraṃ paṭipajjato mahāviduggaṃ pakkhandato pātheyyapuṭaṃ bandhati sambalaṃ
tika-s0301t:614_2: sajjeti. Kathanti āha “saddhaṃ uppādetvā”tiādi. Etaṃ vuttanti “saddhā bandhati pātheyya”nti
tika-s0301t:614_3: etaṃ gāthāpadaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā. Sirīti katapuññehi sevīyati tehi paṭilabhīyatīti
tika-s0301t:614_4: sirī. Issariyaṃ vibhavo. Āsayitabbato āsayo, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ niketanti attho. Parikaḍḍhatīti
tika-s0301t:617_0: 80. Taṃ taṃ samavisamaṃ pajjotatīti pajjoto. Padīpo andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā paccakkhato
tika-s0301t:617_1: rūpagataṃ dasseti, evaṃ paññāpajjoto avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā dhammānaṃ paramatthabhūtaṃ
tika-s0301t:617_2: rūpaṃ dasseti. Jāgarabrāhmaṇo viyāti jāgarakhīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo viya. So hi satipaññāvepullappattiyā
tika-s0301t:617_3: sabbadāpi jāgaro hoti. Gāvoti gojātiyo. Idaṃ gunnaṃ goṇānañca sāmaññato gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:617_4: Kammeti karaṇatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Jīvanaṃ jīvo, saha jīvenāti sajīvino. Tenāha “kammena
tika-s0301t:617_5: saha jīvantāna”nti, kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ katvā jīvantānanti attho. Gomaṇḍalehi saddhinti
tika-s0301t:617_6: gogaṇena saha. Na tena vinā kasikammādīni uppajjanti, gorasasiddhiyā ceva kasanabhāravahanasiddhiyā
tika-s0301t:617_7: ca kasikammaekaccavāṇijjakammādīni ijjhanti. Sattakāyassāti āhārupajīvino sattakāyassa
tika-s0301t:617_8: kasito aññathā jīvikaṃ kappentassapi kasijīvitavuttiyā mūlakāraṇaṃ phalanipphattinimittattā
tika-s0301t:617_9: tassa. Iriyāpatho ca iriyanakiriyānaṃ pavattanupāyo. “Sītanti naṅgalasītakamma”nti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:620_0: 81. Raṇanti kandanti etehīti raṇā, rāgādayo. Tehi abhibhūtatāya hi sattā nānappakāraṃ
tika-s0301t:620_1: kandanti paridevanti. Te pana sabbaso natthi etesaṃ raṇāti araṇā. Nikkilesā khīṇāsavā.
tika-s0301t:620_4: sekkhā pubbabhāge lokiyapariññāya, paccavekkhaṇe lokiyalokuttarāya pariññāya pariññeyyaṃ
tika-s0301t:620_5: tebhūmakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ parijānanti paricchijjanti. Khīṇāsavā pana pariññātapariññeyyā
tika-s0301t:620_6: honti. Tathā hi te sāmī hutvā paribhuñjanti. Vandanti naṃ patiṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ, vandanīyabhāvo
tika-s0301t:620_7: ca sīlasampannatāyāti āha “patiṭṭhitanti sīle patiṭṭhita”nti. Idhāti imasmiṃ loke.
tika-s0301t:627_0: 82. Devassa putto devaputto. Devānaṃ janakajanetabbasambandhābhāvato kathamayaṃ devaputtoti
tika-s0301t:627_1: vuccatīti āha “devānaṃ hī”tiādi. “Apākaṭo aññataroti vuccatī”ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena
tika-s0301t:627_2: vuttaṃ. Pākaṭopi hi katthaci “aññataro”ti vuccati. Heṭṭhā devatāsaṃyutte “apākaṭā
tika-s0301t:627_3: aññatarā devatā”ti vatvā idha “pākaṭo devaputto”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hissa kassapoti
tika-s0301t:627_4: gottanāmaṃ gahitaṃ, tañca kho purimajātisiddhasamaññāvasena. Anusāsanaṃ anusāso,
tika-s0301t:627_5: taṃ anusāsaṃ. Bhikkhuniddesanti bhikkhusaddassa niddesaṃ. Bhikkhuovādanti bhikkhubhāvāvahaṃ
tika-s0301t:627_6: ovādaṃ. Yadi pana na assosi, kathamayaṃ pañhaṃ kathesīti? Aññato sutaṃ nissāya pañhaṃ
tika-s0301t:627_7: kathesi, na pana bhagavato sammukhā sutabhāvena.
tika-s0301t:628_0: Tesanti yathāvuttānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ. “Kathetukāmo cevā”tiādinā hi catutthaṃ idha
tika-s0301t:628_1: uddhaṭaṃ. Tattha ādito tiṇṇaṃ bhagavā pañhaṃ bhāraṃ na karoti ekekaṅgavekallato ceva
tika-s0301t:628_2: aṅgadvayavekallato ca, catutthassa pana ubhayaṅgapāripūrattā bhāraṃ karotīti āha “ayaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:629_1: Catusaccādinissitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sikkhanto catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ sikkhati nāmāti
tika-s0301t:629_3: Upāsitabbanti āsevitabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ. Aṭṭhatiṃsabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0301t:629_4: idaṃ tassa vipassanāpadaṭṭhānataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dutiyapadena
tika-s0301t:629_5: adhipaññāsikkhā kathitā”ti. Ye pana “dutiyapadena adhicittasikkhā cittavūpasamena
tika-s0301t:629_6: adhipaññāsikkhā”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ padena aṭṭhatiṃsappabhedakammaṭṭhānaṃ suddhasamathakammaṭṭhānasseva
tika-s0301t:629_7: gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “aṭṭhasamāpattivasenā”ti idaṃ kathanti? “Taṃ vipassanādhiṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0301t:629_8: samāpattīnaṃ vasena kathita”nti vadanti. Evañca katvā “dutiyapadena adhipaññāsikkhā”ti
tika-s0301t:629_9: idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Sikkhanaṃ nāma āsevananti āha “bhāveyyāti attho”ti.
tika-s0301t:629_11: “tampī”tiādimāha. Adhisīlasikkhā kathitā lakkhaṇahāranayena. Vacīsucaritassa hi sīlasabhāvattā
tika-s0301t:629_12: taggahaṇeneva tadekalakkhaṇaṃ kāyasucaritampi itarampi gahitamevāti. Ettha ca adhisīlasikkhāya
tika-s0301t:629_13: cittaviveko, adhipaññāsikkhāya upadhiviveko, adhicittasikkhāya kāyaviveko kathito,
tika-s0301t:629_14: kāyaviveko pana sarūpeneva pāḷiyaṃ gahitoti tividhassapi vivekassa pakāsitattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:632_0: 83. Dvīhi jhānehīti ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇehi dvīhi jhānehi. Kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyāti
tika-s0301t:632_1: kammaṭṭhānānuyogaladdhāya vimuttiyā. Tena tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttiyo vadati. Satthusāsanassa
tika-s0301t:632_2: hadayattā abbhantarattā hadayassa mānasassa, anupattiṃ paṭilābhamānasaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-s0301t:632_3: atthato aññā evāti āha “arahatta”nti. Taṃ pattukāmena ekantato vajjetabbataṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-s0301t:632_4: bhāve tassa anijjhanato, tadabhāve ijjhanato ca te uppādanavasena yadaggena nissito,
tika-s0301t:632_5: tadaggena panāyampi tehi nissito nāma hotīti āha “anissito”tiādi. Arahattaṃ ānisaṃsitabbaṭṭhena
tika-s0301t:632_6: ānisaṃsaṃ etassāti arahattānisaṃso. Arahattaṃ pattukāmassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā icchitabbā.
tika-s0301t:632_7: Tattha ca sabbapaṭhamo kammaṭṭhānaattānuyogo, so idha na gahitoti āha “tantidhammo
tika-s0301t:635_0: 84. Maghoti sakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ purimajātianugataṃ. Svevāti sakko eva. Vatenāti mātāpituupaṭṭhānādicārittadhammena.
tika-s0301t:635_1: Aññeti upadhivepakkapāpadhamme abhibhavitvā. Asuranti indasattubhūtaṃ asuraṃ.
tika-s0301t:638: 85. Catutthasuttaṃ vuttatthamevāti devatāsaṃyutte saṃvaṇṇitatthameva, tasmā idha na vattabbo atthoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:641_0: 86. Tena kāraṇenāti tena padhānena kāraṇabhūtena, padhānakaraṇanimittanti attho.
tika-s0301t:641_1: Yaṃ kiñci khuddakampi mahantampi hīnampi paṇītampi bhavaṃ. Āyatapaggahoti dīgharattassa
tika-s0301t:641_2: vīriyārambho. Kiccavosānanti kiccaniṭṭhānaṃ. Tathevāti yathā arahattuppattito pubbe,
tika-s0301t:641_3: tato pacchāpi tatheva “buddhipaggaho”ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ karotūti kuppadhammaṃ viya
tika-s0301t:641_4: maññamāno vadati. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārādiatthaṃ pana vīriyakaraṇaṃ icchitabbameva.
tika-s0301t:642_0: Asaṃkiṇṇāti avomissā evaṃ aññattha anāgatattā. Tenāha “bhagavatā hī”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ
tika-s0301t:642_1: idheva kasmā etaṃ vuttanti āha “idha panā”tiādi. Patiṭṭhanti nadī nāma anavaṭṭhitatīrā,
tika-s0301t:645_0: 87. Pubbayogāvacaroti pubbe yogāvacaro purimattabhāve bhāvanamanuyutto. Ayaṃ kira
tika-s0301t:645_1: kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvāva bahūni vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi,
tika-s0301t:645_2: na pana visesaṃ nibbattesi. Tamatthaṃ kāraṇena saddhiṃ dassetuṃ “bahalakilesatāyā”tiādi
tika-s0301t:645_3: vuttaṃ. Ekantaparisuddhassāti yathā visesāvaho hoti, evaṃ ekantena parisuddhassa
tika-s0301t:645_4: sabbaso anupakkiliṭṭhassa. Sīlena samāhitāti yathā sīlaṃ uparūpari visesāvahaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0301t:645_5: hoti, evaṃ sammadeva āhitacittā suṭṭhu sampannacittā. Tathābhūtā tena samannāgatā
tika-s0301t:645_6: hontīti āha “samupetā”ti. Patiṭṭhitasabhāvāti sekkhattā eva yathādhigatadhammena
tika-s0301t:645_7: niccalabhāvena adhiṭṭhitasabhāvā. Mayā tuṭṭhiyā gahitāya devaputto “dullabhā tuṭṭhī”ti
tika-s0301t:645_8: vakkhatīti bhagavā “tuṭṭhi hoti sukhāvahā”ti avocāti āha “upari pañhasamuṭṭhāpanattha”nti.
tika-s0301t:645_9: Pabbajito rukkhamūliko abbhokāsiko vā anagāriyupeto nāma hoti, senāsane pana vasanto
tika-s0301t:645_11: paccayesu santoso. Tena cittavūpasamena tuṭṭhi laddhāti dasseti. Cittavūpasamabhāvanāyāti
tika-s0301t:645_13: savisesaṃ cittassa vūpasamakarabhāvanāya rato manoti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:646_0: Ettha ca indriyūpasamena cittasamādhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti indriyabhāvanāya cittasamādhānassa
tika-s0301t:646_1: akārakānaṃ dūrīkaraṇato. Adhicittasamādhānena catupaccayasantoso savisesaṃ parisuddho
tika-s0301t:646_2: paripuṇṇo ca hoti paccayānaṃ alābhalābhesu pariccāgasabhāvato. Vuttanayena pana santuṭṭhassa
tika-s0301t:646_3: yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlaṃ visujjhati pāripūriñca upagacchati, tathābhūto catusaccakammaṭṭhāne
tika-s0301t:646_4: yutto maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbaso kilese samucchindanto nibbānadiṭṭho hotīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:646_5: dasseti “ye rattindiva”ntiādinā. Kiṃ na gacchissanti? Gamissantevāti ariyamaggabhāvanaṃ
tika-s0301t:646_6: pahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā dukkarabhāvaṃ sandhāya sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Tenāha “ayaṃ pana
tika-s0301t:647_0: Tattha keci “ayaṃ panāti devaputto. So hi bhagavato ‘ariyā gacchantī’ti vacanaṃ sutvā
tika-s0301t:647_1: ‘duggamo bhagavā’tiādimāhā”ti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Yasmā “saccameta”nti evamādipi
tika-s0301t:647_2: tasseva vevacanaṃ katvā dassitaṃ, tasmā “yena maggena ariyā gacchantī”ti tumhehi
tika-s0301t:647_3: vuttaṃ, ayaṃ pana “duggamo bhagavā visamo maggo”ti āha devaputto. Ariyamaggo kāmaṃ
tika-s0301t:647_4: kadāci atidukkhā paṭipadātipi vuccati, tañca kho pubbabhāgapaṭipadāvasena, ayaṃ pana
tika-s0301t:647_6: ca dūrīkaraṇato na visamo. Tenāha “pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyā”tiādi. Assāti ariyamaggassa.
tika-s0301t:647_7: Ariyamaggassa hi adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ paribundhitabbabhāgena bahū parissayā hontīti.
tika-s0301t:647_8: Evaṃ vuttoti “duggamo visamo”ti ca evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0301t:648_0: Avaṃsirāti anuṭṭhahanena adhobhūtauttamaṅgā. Kusalaṅgesu hi sammādiṭṭhi uttamaṅgā
tika-s0301t:648_1: sabbaseṭṭhattā, tañca anariyā patanti na uṭṭhahanti micchāpaṭipajjanato. Tenāha “ñāṇasirenā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:648_2: Anariyamaggeti micchāmagge. Tenāha “visame magge”ti. Taṃ magganato anariyā ariyānaṃ
tika-s0301t:648_3: maggato apāpuṇanena pariccattā hutvā apāye sakalavaṭṭadukkhe ca patanti. Svevāti
tika-s0301t:648_4: svāyaṃ anariyehi kadācipi gantuṃ asakkuṇeyyo maggo ariyānaṃ visuddhasattānaṃ sabbaso
tika-s0301t:648_5: samadhigamena samo hoti. Kāyavisamādīhi samannāgatattā visame sattakāye tesaṃ sabbasova
tika-s0301t:651_0: 88. Sambādheti sampīḷitataṇhākilesādinā sauppīḷatāya paramasambādhe. Ativiya saṅkāraṭṭhānabhūto
tika-s0301t:651_1: hi nīvaraṇasambādho adhippeto. So hi duggahano tasmiṃ asati kāmaguṇasambādho anavasaro
tika-s0301t:651_2: eva seyyathāpi mahākassapādīnaṃ. Okāsanti jhānassetaṃ nāmaṃ nīvaraṇasambādhābhāvato.
tika-s0301t:651_3: Asambādhabhāvena hi jhānaṃ idha “okāso”ti vuttaṃ, tañca kho accantāsambādhaṭṭhānatāya
tika-s0301t:651_4: vipassanāpādakatāya. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “avindī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha avindīti vindi
tika-s0301t:651_5: paṭilabhi. Bhūrimedhasoti mahāpañño, sapaññoti attho. Abujjhīti bujjhi paṭivijjhi.
tika-s0301t:651_6: Paṭilīno hutvā seṭṭho, paṭilīnānaṃ vā seṭṭhoti paṭilīnaseṭṭho. Mānussayavasena unnatabhāvato
tika-s0301t:651_7: paṭilīno nāma pahīnamāno. Paṭilabhiṃsūti kāmaguṇasambādhepi “ime kāmaguṇā mādisānaṃ
tika-s0301t:651_8: kiṃ karissantī”ti? Te abhibhuyya nibbānappattiyā sammāsatiṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Tena sampayuttena
tika-s0301t:652_0: Ayaṃ kira devaputto ito purimavāre attabhāve paṭhamajjhānalābhī hutvā tato cavitvā
tika-s0301t:652_1: brahmakāyikāsu nibbattitvā tattha jhānasukhaṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto idāni kāmabhave
tika-s0301t:652_2: nibbatto, tasmā taṃ jhānaṃ sambhāvento “tādisassa nāma jhānasukhassa lābhī bhagavā”ti
tika-s0301t:652_3: tena guṇena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto “sambādhe vatā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi. Athassa bhagavā
tika-s0301t:652_5: kiñci hoti, evaṃ anantāparimeyyabuddhaguṇe upādāya rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānaṃ na kiñci
tika-s0301t:652_6: hotīti dassento “ye sati”ntiādinā anuttaraguṇādhigamaṃ pavedesi. Tattha satinti vipassanāsatiyā
tika-s0301t:652_7: saddhiṃ ariyamaggasatiṃ. Susamāhitāti lokiyasamādhinā ceva lokuttarasamādhinā ca
tika-s0301t:652_8: suṭṭhu samāhitā. Te hi accantaṃ susamāhitā, na jhānamattalābhino akuppadhammattā.
tika-s0301t:652_9: Keci “kammante susamāhitā”ti pāṭhaṃ vatvā “maggasamāhitā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0301t:655_0: 89. Atītajātiyaṃ sayaṃkāravasena tāya diṭṭhiyā uppāditattā pubbe titthakaro. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:655_1: “diṭṭhi uppādetvā”ti. Apare āhu “ayaṃ me satthāti gahaṇavasena titthakaro assa atthīti
tika-s0301t:655_2: pubbe titthakaro, atītattabhāve titthakarasāvako”ti. Te “diṭṭhiṃ uppādetvāti tassa
tika-s0301t:655_3: satthuno diṭṭhiṃ ādāya gahetvāti attho”ti vadanti. Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo
tika-s0301t:655_4: tabbinimuttassa micchāvādassa abhāvato. Titthe niyuttāti titthikā, te eva titthiyāti
tika-s0301t:655_5: vuttā ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā. Tassāti yathāvuttassa kalyāṇakammassa. Nissandenāti
tika-s0301t:656_0: Aniyamitaāṇattīti aniyamavidhānaṃ aniyamavasena vidhivacanaṃ. Taṇhāsotanti taṇhāppabandhanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:656_1: Nīharāti samehi pajaha. Ekattanti ekaggaṃ. Tenāha “jhāna”nti. Upapajjatīti na uppajjati
tika-s0301t:656_2: na pāpuṇātīti āha “na paṭilabhatī”ti. Na osakkeyyāti na saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya. Gharāvāsato
tika-s0301t:656_3: paribbajanaṃ parito apagamoti paribbajo. Pabbajitavatasamādānassa adaḷhatāya ca tattha
tika-s0301t:656_4: ca asakkaccakiriyāya sithilagahitā. Atirekanti pabbajjāya purimakālatopi adhikaṃ.
tika-s0301t:656_5: Uparīti uparūpari. Dukkaṭaṃ akatameva seyyoti duccaritaṃ nāma sabbena sabbaṃ akatameva hitāvahaṃ.
tika-s0301t:657_0: Yaṃ kiñcīti yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ. Sithilaṃ katanti asakkaccakāritāya sithilaṃ katvā pavattitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:657_3: parehi saṅkitaṃ. Brahmacariyassa ādi ādibrahmacariyaṃ, tattha niyuttāti ādibrahmacariyikā,
tika-s0301t:660_0: 90. Vimāne gahite taṃnivāsīpi gahito hotīti vuttaṃ “candavimānavāsī devaputto”ti.
tika-s0301t:660_1: Sabbadhīti sabbasmā duggaṭṭhānā vippamuttosi bhagavā tvaṃ, tasmā mayhampi ito sambādhaṭṭhānato
tika-s0301t:660_2: vippamokkhaṃ karohīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tassa me saraṇaṃ bhavā”ti. Lokānukampakāti
tika-s0301t:660_3: sabbassa lokassa anuggahā, tasmā tuyhampi etassapi candassa. Tādisā evāti samānā
tika-s0301t:663_0: 91. Andhabhāvakaraṇeti lokassa andhakaraṇetipi apare. Tenāha “tamasī”ti. Virocatīti
tika-s0301t:663_1: vijjotati. Kāmaṃ devaputtavasena paṭhamaṃ devatā uddhaṭā, rāhuno pana payogo tassa
tika-s0301t:663_2: vimāneti āha “maṇḍalīti maṇḍalasaṇṭhāno”ti. Vadati tadā mukhena gahitattā. Mukhena
tika-s0301t:663_3: gahaṇañcettha “gilī”ti adhippetaṃ, na ca ajjhoharaṇanti āha “gilīti vadatī”ti. Idāni
tika-s0301t:663_4: tassa mukhena gahaṇasamatthataṃ dassetuṃ “rāhussa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sotiādi tassa
tika-s0301t:663_5: candimasūriyānaṃ gahaṇakāraṇadassanaṃ. Adhivatthā devatāti candimasūriyānaṃ paricārakadevatā.
tika-s0301t:663_6: Veganti javaṃ. So hi kenaci abhimukhaṃ atidunnivāro kammaniyāmasiddho. Matthakanti
tika-s0301t:663_7: kaṇṭhassa uparimadesaṃ. Keci “sīsamatthakamevā”ti vadanti. Nikkhameyya vegassa tikkhasīghathāmabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:663_8: Ākaḍḍhitvāti attano gamanadisābhimukhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā. Nanti rāhuṃ. Uddhaṃ ullaṅghetukāmampi
tika-s0301t:663_9: onameyya. Padadvayenapi so mahāsarīro mahābalo, candimasūriyānaṃ pana gamanavego
tika-s0301t:663_10: tena sabbathāpi dunnivāriyovāti dasseti. Vimānenāti candaggahe candavimānena, sūriyaggahe
tika-s0301t:663_11: sūriyavimānena ubhinnampi vimānena saheva. Amāvāsiyañhi dve vimānāni yojanamattantaritāni
tika-s0301t:663_12: hutvā saheva pavattanti. Yadi dvepi devaputtā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā, atha kasmā sūriyasutte
tika-s0301t:663_13: eva “pajaṃ mama”nti vuttaṃ, na candasutteti? “So ca kira na cirasseva tato cavitvā
tika-s0301t:663_14: aññattha nibbatto, aññā eva ca devatā tattha vasi, yasmiṃ candaggahe bhagavā taṃ
tika-s0301t:663_15: gāthaṃ abhāsi, na tathā sūriyo, aparabhāge pana tatthapi kālena kālaṃ rāhuggaho hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:668_0: 92. Pabbatataṭā sandamāno tathārūpo nadīnivattanapadesopi sambādhaṭṭhānatāya kaccho
tika-s0301t:668_1: viyāti āha “pabbatakacchepī”ti. Paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca eko udetīti
tika-s0301t:668_2: ekodi, ekaggatā. Tasmiṃ yogato ekaggacittā idha ekodī. Paṭipakkhato attānaṃ nipayanti
tika-s0301t:668_3: visodhentīti nipakā, paññavanto. Tenāha “ekaggacittā cevā”tiādi. Kāyādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:668_4: sātisayāya satiyā sarantīti satā. Tenāha “satimanto”ti. Sotthiṃ gamissantīti yathāvuttapadese
tika-s0301t:668_5: magā sotthimanupaddavena vattissanti, evaṃ jhānalābhino sotthiṃ kilesehi anupaddutā
tika-s0301t:668_6: vattissanti. Ayaṃ kira devaputto brahmaloke nibbānasaññī, tasmā evamāha. Bhagavā
tika-s0301t:668_7: “ayaṃ devaputto anibbānagāmī samāno nibbānagāmisaññī, handassa nibbānagāmino dassemī”ti
tika-s0301t:668_8: dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Catunnaṃ oghānaṃ, saṃsāramahoghasseva vā paratīrabhāvato paratīranti
tika-s0301t:668_9: nibbānaṃ. Ambuni jāto ambujo, maccho. Suttajālaṃ chinditvā macchā viya kilesajālaṃ
tika-s0301t:671_0: 93. Payirupāsiyāti payirupāsahetu. Sikkhantīti tissopi sikkhā sikkhanti. Siṭṭhipadeti
tika-s0301t:671_1: kilesānaṃ sāsanato vaṭṭadukkhaparittāsanato ca siṭṭhisaññite yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitabbato
tika-s0301t:671_2: pade, saddhammeti attho. Tenāha “anusiṭṭhipade”ti. Tattha anusiṭṭhīti saddhammo.
tika-s0301t:674: 94. Tatheva paññāyīti dīghalaṭṭhitveva paññāyi, tathāsamaññā eva ahosi.
tika-s0301t:677_0: 95. Natthi etassa āvaṭṭaṃ āvaraṇanti anāvaṭaṃ. Rukkho vā pabbato vāti sattānaṃ pakaticakkhussa
tika-s0301t:677_1: āvaraṇabhūto rukkho viya pabbato viya ca abhibhavituṃ samattho ñeyyāvaraṇo natthi.
tika-s0301t:677_2: Kathaṃvidhanti kathaṃsaṇṭhitaṃ, kathaṃpakāraṃ vā. Dukkhanti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:680_0: 96. Heṭṭhāti kāmabhave. Tattha hi paribbhamantassa patiṭṭhā dullabhā yebhuyyena tattha
tika-s0301t:680_1: sattā nimuggā eva honti, tasmā heṭṭhā appatiṭṭho saṃsāro. Uparīti mahaggatabhave.
tika-s0301t:680_2: Tattha hi nibbattassa nibbānaṃ āruhituṃ ālambanā dullabhā, jhānābhiratiyā tattheva
tika-s0301t:680_3: nikanti tesaṃ balavatī hoti, tasmā upari anālambano saṃsāro. Pesitattoti nibbānaṃ
tika-s0301t:680_4: pati pesitacitto. Tayo kammābhisaṅkhārāti puññābhisaṅkhārādayo tayo abhisaṅkhārā.
tika-s0301t:680_5: Tena “nandīpubbako kammabhavo”ti vatvā “nandiṃ janetvā”ti vutto. Kāmasaññāsīsena
tika-s0301t:680_6: kāmacchandassa gahaṇaṃ, kāmacchandapamukhāni ca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni gahitānīti
tika-s0301t:680_8: Rūpabhavaggahaṇena cettha sesabhavassapi gahaṇaṃ. Tassa saṃyojanaggahaṇena pañca
tika-s0301t:680_9: uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni gahitāni. Mahogheti saṃsāramahoghe. Tesanti kāmabhavādīnaṃ
tika-s0301t:680_10: gahaṇena bhavabhāvena tadekalakkhaṇatāya. Arūpabhavo gahito lakkhaṇahāranayena. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0301t:686_0: 98. Subrahmāti tassa devaputtassa nāmaṃ. Tassa satthu santikūpasaṅkamanassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:686_1: dassento “so kirā”tiādimāha. Tadeva sokaṃ tassa devaputtassa aṭṭhuppatti. Accharāsaṅghaparivutoti
tika-s0301t:686_2: sahassamattena accharāsaṅghena parivuto. Nandanakīḷikanti nandanavanakīḷikaṃ. Hatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:686_3: āgacchatīti hatthagayhupago hoti. Ganthentīti ettha mālāveṭhanampi khiḍḍāpasutatāyāti
tika-s0301t:686_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā pupphāniyeva tāya tāya cittassa vasena mālābhāvena hatthaṃ upagacchantīti.
tika-s0301t:686_5: Upacchedakakammavasenāti tasmiṃ devaloke āyusese sati eva tassa pana upaghātakassa
tika-s0301t:686_6: laddhokāsassa pāpakammassa vasena. “Pahāro”ti divasassa tatiyo bhāgo vuccati, tasmā
tika-s0301t:687_0: Piyavatthukasokenāti piyavatthunimittakena sokena. Ruppamānoti pīḷiyamāno. Sattame
tika-s0301t:687_1: divaseti manussagaṇanāya sattame divase. Tatthevāti tasmiṃyeva niraye nibbattitabbaṃ
tika-s0301t:687_2: iminā tāhi ca saheva pubbe tassa pāpakammassa katattā. Ruppīti cittasantāsaṃ āpajji.
tika-s0301t:687_3: Niddhamitunti nīharituṃ apanetuṃ. Satthu santikaṃ gantvāti tāhi pañcasatāhi accharāhi
tika-s0301t:688_0: Idanti attano cittaṃ dasseti āsannapaccakkhabhāvato. Niccanti sadā. Svāyaṃ niccattho
tika-s0301t:688_1: adhippāyavasena gahetabboti tattha pahātabbaṃ gahetabbañca dassento “devaloke”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:688_2: Na gahetabbo hetupavattito pubbe tassa utrāsassa abhāvato. Tesūti dukkhesu. Tāni
tika-s0301t:688_3: hi hetupaccayehi kattabbato gāthāyaṃ “kicchesū”ti vuttāni. Kicchesūti vā kicchanimittaṃ.
tika-s0301t:688_4: Yāsañhi payogavipattīnaṃ vasenassa tāni dukkhāni uppajjeyyuṃ, taṃnimittanti attho.
tika-s0301t:688_5: Tā hi assa payogavipattiyo gativipattiyo satthu santikaṃ upagamanena hāyeyyuṃ. Nibbattānaṃ
tika-s0301t:688_6: diṭṭhānīti nibbattānaṃ vasena diṭṭhāni dukkhāni. Tesu ca dukkhesu. Sabbattha nimittatthe
tika-s0301t:689_0: Cattāripi saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti bodhi, satiādidhammasāmaggī, tasmā bojjhā
tika-s0301t:689_1: bodhito. Sā pana bodhi bhāvanākāreneva pavattati, aññatrasaddayogena ca “bojjhā”ti
tika-s0301t:689_3: āha. Tapoguṇanti dhutadhammamāha. So hi taṇhāloluppassa tapanato tapo, sayaṃ guṇasabhāvattā
tika-s0301t:689_4: guṇasannissayato ca guṇanti. Tenāha “dhutaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ tapoguṇa”nti. Sabbe saṅkhāragatā
tika-s0301t:689_5: nissajjīyanti etthāti sabbanissaggo, asaṅkhatadhātūti āha “sabbanissaggāti nibbānato”ti.
tika-s0301t:690_0: Indriyasaṃvarova paṭhamaṃ veditabbo paṭipattikkamavasena tasseva paṭhamattā. Taṃ
tika-s0301t:690_1: pana paṭipattikkamaṃ dassetuṃ “indriyasaṃvare hī”tiādimāha. Nippariyāyato maggapariyāpannā
tika-s0301t:690_2: eva bojjhaṅgāti āha “sahavipassanāya bojjhaṅge”ti. Tassāti tathābhāvena tassa yogino.
tika-s0301t:690_3: Yasmā devaputtassa satthā taṃ gāthaṃ vatvā upari ca saccāni pakāsesi, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:690_4: “bhagavā catusaccavasena desanaṃ vinivattesī”ti. Devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti
tika-s0301t:690_5: kāmaṃ tasseva visesādhigamo idhāgato, pañcasatamattāhi pana accharāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale
tika-s0301t:690_7: pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ katvā
tika-s0301t:693_0: 99. “Nandāmī”ti vutte nandī nāma pabbajitassa malanti codetukāmo devaputto “nandasī”ti
tika-s0301t:693_1: pucchi. Athassa bhagavā taṃ paṭikkhipanto “kiṃ laddhā”ti? Āha. Tena “tayā mama adhippetanandiyā
tika-s0301t:693_2: idha paccayo eva natthi, kuto sā nandī”ti dasseti. Tenāha “tuṭṭhi nāmā”tiādi. Atha
tika-s0301t:693_3: devaputto nandiyā asati sokena bhavitabbaṃ, soko ca pabbajitassa malanti codento
tika-s0301t:693_4: āha “tena hi, samaṇa, socasī”ti. Bhagavā tampi paṭikkhipanto “kiṃ jīyitthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:694_0: Yadi te nandisokā na santi hāsavatthuno lābhassa jāniyā ca abhāvato, ekavihārino
tika-s0301t:694_1: pana aratiyā bhavitabbanti āha – “kacci taṃ ekamāsīnaṃ, aratī nābhikīratī”ti. Tasmimpi
tika-s0301t:694_2: bhagavatā paṭikkhitte atha nesampi nandisokāratīnaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ pucchanto “kathaṃ
tika-s0301t:694_3: tva”nti gāthamāha? Athassa bhagavā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pavedento “aghajātassā”ti gāthamāha.
tika-s0301t:694_4: Tattha aghajātassāti aghe jātassa. Tenāha “vaṭṭadukkhe ṭhitassā”ti. Jātataṇhassa
tika-s0301t:694_5: appahīnataṇhassa vaṭṭadukkhaṃ āgatameva kāraṇassa appahīnattā. Tasseva hi kāraṇassa
tika-s0301t:694_6: appahīnataṃ dassento “dukkhī sukhaṃ patthayatīti hi vutta”nti āha. Dukkhappavattiyā
tika-s0301t:694_7: sāpi taṇhāppavatti tena dassitā. Itītiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.
tika-s0301t:700_0: 101. Dasame kāmaṃ devatāsaṃyuttepi “idaṃ hi taṃ jetavana”ntiādinā imā eva gāthā āgatā.
tika-s0301t:700_1: Tattha “aññatarā devatā”ti nidānaṃ āropitaṃ. Heṭṭhā āgatanayattā eva hi potthakesu
tika-s0301t:700_2: na likhitaṃ, idha pana devaputtasaṃyutte “anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto”ti nidāne nigame
tika-s0301t:700_3: ca āgataṃ, tattha devaputtena satthu vuttappakāraguṇapavedanavasena vuttaṃ. Satthā
tika-s0301t:700_4: pana bhikkhūnaṃ tamatthaṃ pavedento “aññataro devaputto”ti āha. Tathā pavedane pana
tika-s0301t:700_5: kāraṇaṃ dassento “ānandattherassā”tiādimāha. Anumānabuddhiyāti anumānañāṇassa. Ānubhāvappakāsanatthanti baladīpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:705: 102. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhamanti tatiyavagge paṭhamasuttaṃ. Vuttatthameva heṭṭhā satullapakāyikavagge paṭhamasutte.
tika-s0301t:708_0: 103. Paṭhamaṃyevāti jarāmaraṇādibhāvato pageva. Balavacintanaṃ cintetīti yathā sākaṭiko
tika-s0301t:708_1: ajānitvā visame magge sakaṭaṃ pājento akkhe chinne patikātuṃ avisahanto dukkhī dummano
tika-s0301t:708_2: balavacintanaṃ cinteti, mahantaṃ cittasantāpaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ adhammavādī maccumukhaṃ
tika-s0301t:708_3: patto balavacittasantāpaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā dhammacariyāya nappamajjitabbanti.
tika-s0301t:711_0: 104. Yaṃ dānaṃ demīti yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ parassa demi. Tassa pati hutvāti tabbisayaṃ
tika-s0301t:711_1: lobhaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanto tassa adhipati hutvā demi tena anākaḍḍhanīyattā. “Na dāso
tika-s0301t:711_2: na sahāyo”ti vatvā tadubhayaṃ anvayato byatirekato dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:711_3: Dāso hutvā deti taṇhāya dāsabyassa upagatattā. Sahāyo hutvā deti tassa piyabhāvāvissajjanato.
tika-s0301t:711_4: Sāmī hutvā deti taṇhādāsabyato attānaṃ mocetvā abhibhuyya pavattanato. Sāmiparibhogasadisā
tika-s0301t:712_0: Atha vā yo dānasīlatāya dāyako puggalo, so dāne pavattibhedena dānadāso dānasahāyo
tika-s0301t:712_1: dānapatīti tippakāro hotīti dasseti. Tadassa tippakārataṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yo
tika-s0301t:712_2: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dātabbaṭṭhena dānaṃ, annapānādi. Tattha yaṃ attanā paribhuñjati
tika-s0301t:712_3: taṇhādhipannatāya, tassa vase vattanato dāso viya hoti. Yaṃ paresaṃ dīyati, tatthapi
tika-s0301t:712_4: annapānasāmaññena idaṃ vuttaṃ “dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā detī”ti.
tika-s0301t:712_5: Sahāyo hutvā deti attanā paribhuñjitabbassa paresaṃ dātabbassa ca samasamaṭṭhapanena.
tika-s0301t:712_6: Pati hutvā deti sayaṃ deyyadhammassa vase avattitvā tassa attano vase vattāpanato.
tika-s0301t:713_0: Aparo nayo – yo attanā paṇītaṃ paribhuñjitvā paresaṃ nihīnaṃ deti, so dānadāso nāma
tika-s0301t:713_1: tannimittanihīnabhāvāpattito. Yo yādisaṃ attanā paribhuñjati, tādisameva paresaṃ
tika-s0301t:713_2: deti, so dānasahāyo nāma tannimittanihīnādhikabhāvavissajjanena sadisabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0301t:713_3: Yo attanā nihīnaṃ paribhuñjitvā paresaṃ paṇītaṃ deti, so dānapati nāma tannimittaseṭṭhabhāvappattito.
tika-s0301t:713_4: Kammasarikkhako hi vipāko, tasmā devaputto “dānapatī”ti vadanto “ahaṃ tādiso ahosi”nti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:714_0: “Catūsu dvāresu dānaṃ dīyitthā”ti pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0301t:714_1: “tassa kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dānanti yiṭṭhaṃ, tañca kho sabbasādhāraṇavasena katanti
tika-s0301t:714_2: āha “samaṇa …pe… yācakāna”nti. Pabbajjūpagatāti yaṃ kiñci pabbajjaṃ upagatā. Bhovādinoti
tika-s0301t:714_3: jātimattabrāhmaṇe vadati. Nālattha buddhasuññattā tadā lokassa. Duggatāti dukkhajīvikakappakā
tika-s0301t:714_5: idha “kapaṇā”ti adhippetāti āha “kāṇakuṇiādayo”ti. Pathāvinoti addhikā. Vanibbakāti
tika-s0301t:714_6: dāyakānaṃ guṇakittanakammaphalakittanavasena yācakā seyyathāpi naggādayo. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:714_7: “iṭṭhaṃ dinna”ntiādi. Pasatamattanti vīhitaṇḍulādivasena vuttaṃ. Sarāvamattanti yāgubhattādivasena.
tika-s0301t:714_8: Yathā gāmalābho gāme uppajjanako āyalābho, evaṃ tattha dvāralābhoti āha “tattha uppajjanakasatasahasse”ti.
tika-s0301t:714_9: Mahantataraṃ dānaṃ adaṃsu aññassapi dhanassa viniyogaṃ gatattā. Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ
tika-s0301t:714_10: mahantataraṃ dānaṃ kataṃ sandhāya. Rañño hi tattha dānaṃ itthāgārassa dānena mahatā
tika-s0301t:714_11: abhibhūtaṃ viya paṭinivattaṃ hotīti āha “paṭinivattī”ti. Kocīti bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:720_0: 106. Ye vinaye apakataññuno saṃkilesikesu vodāniyesu dhammesu na kusalā yaṃ kiñci
tika-s0301t:720_1: na kārino vippaṭisārabahulā. Tesaṃ anuppannañca uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, uppannañca bhiyyobhāvaṃ
tika-s0301t:720_2: vepullaṃ āpajjatīti āha “akappiye kappiyasaññitāya…pe… uddhaccapakatikā”ti. Sārābhāvena
tika-s0301t:720_3: tucchattā ca naḷo viyāti naḷo, mānoti āha “unnaḷāti uggatanaḷā”ti. Tenāha “uṭṭhitatucchamānā”ti.
tika-s0301t:720_4: Māno hi seyyassa seyyoti sadisoti ca pavattiyā visesato tuccho. Cāpallenāti capalabhāvena,
tika-s0301t:720_5: taṇhāloluppenāti attho. Mukhakharāti mukhena pharusā, pharusavādinoti attho. Vikiṇṇavācāti
tika-s0301t:720_7: baddhanāvāsadisāti etena anavaṭṭhitakiriyataṃ dasseti. Yena samannāgatā sattā ekasmiṃ
tika-s0301t:720_8: ṭhāne ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā na sakkonti, ito cito ca vicaranti. Anavaṭṭhitacittāti
tika-s0301t:720_9: ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe na avaṭṭhitacittā. Vivaṭaindriyāti asaṃvutacakkhādiindriyā.
tika-s0301t:721_0: Guṇakathāya saddhiṃ kathiyamāno nigguṇassa aguṇo pākaṭo hoti jātimaṇisamīpe ṭhitassa
tika-s0301t:721_1: viya kācamaṇino doso. Sukhajīvinoti sukhe ṭhitā. Yathā dāyakānaṃ subharaṃ hoti, evaṃ
tika-s0301t:722_0: Attano rucivasena gāmakiccaṃ netīti gāmaṇi, te pana hīḷento vadati “gāmaṇikā”ti.
tika-s0301t:722_2: taṇhāmucchāya. Sīlavantānaṃyeva hi duppaṭipattiṃ sandhāya devaputto vadati. Vattabbayuttakeyevāti
tika-s0301t:722_3: ovādena mayā anuggahetabbameva. Chaḍḍitakāti pariccattā ācariyupajjhāyādīhi. Tato
tika-s0301t:722_4: eva anāthā appatiṭṭhā. Petāti vigatajīvitā matā. Yathā petā, tatheva honti attahitāsamatthatāya
tika-s0301t:725_0: 107. Ekokāseti cakkavāḷassa pariyantasaññite ekasmiṃ okāse. Bhummanti “yatthā”ti
tika-s0301t:725_1: idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, sāmaññato vuttampi “so lokassa anto”ti vacanato visiṭṭhavisayameva
tika-s0301t:725_2: hoti. “Na jāyati na mīyatī”ti vatvā puna “na cavati na upapajjatī”ti kasmā vuttanti
tika-s0301t:725_3: āha “idaṃ aparāparaṃ…pe… gahita”nti. Padagamanenāti padasā gamanena. Saṅkhāralokassa
tika-s0301t:725_4: antaṃ sandhāya vadati upari saccāni pakāsetukāmo. Saṅkhāralokassa hi anto nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0301t:726_0: Daḷhaṃ thiraṃ dhanu etassāti daḷhadhanvā. So eva daḷhadhammoti vutto. Tenāha “daḷhadhanū”ti.
tika-s0301t:726_1: Uttamappamāṇenāti sahassathāmappamāṇena. Dhanusippasikkhitatāya dhanuggaho, na dhanuggahamattenāti
tika-s0301t:726_3: sikkhitoti viññāyati, sikkhā ca ettake kāle samatthassa ukkaṃsagato hotīti āha “dasa
tika-s0301t:726_4: dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito”ti. Usabhappamāṇepīti vīsatiyaṭṭhiyo usabhaṃ,
tika-s0301t:726_5: tasmiṃ usabhappamāṇe padese. Vālagganti vāḷakoṭiṃ. Katahatthoti paricitahattho. Katasarakkhepoti
tika-s0301t:726_7: keci. Asanti etenāti asanaṃ, kaṇḍo. Tālacchāyanti tālacchādiṃ, sā pana ratanamattā,
tika-s0301t:727_0: Puratthimasamuddāti ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe puratthimasamuddā. Samuddasīsena puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ
tika-s0301t:727_1: vadati. Pacchimasamuddoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Nippapañcatanti adandhakāritaṃ. Sampatteti
tika-s0301t:727_2: tādisena javena gacchantena sampatte. Anotatteti etthāpi “sampatte”ti padaṃ ānetvā
tika-s0301t:727_3: sambandho, tathā “nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā”ti etthāpi. Tadāti yadā so lokantagavesako
tika-s0301t:727_4: ahosi, tadā. Dīghāyukakāloti anekavassasahassāyukakālo. Cakkavāḷalokassāti sāmaññavasena
tika-s0301t:727_5: ekavacanaṃ, cakkavāḷalokanti attho. Imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbatti pubbaparicariyasiddhāya
tika-s0301t:727_6: nikantiyā. Sasaññimhi samanaketi na rūpadhammamattake, atha kho pañcakkhandhasamudāyeti
tika-s0301t:733_0: 110. Tuyhampi noti tuyhampi nu, nu-saddo pucchāyaṃ, tasmā vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo pucchatīti
tika-s0301t:733_1: adhippāyo. Na vaṭṭatīti na yujjati, kathitoti kathetuṃ āraddho, tenāha “matthakaṃ
tika-s0301t:733_2: na pāpuṇātī”ti. Tameva matthakāpāpuṇanaṃ dassetuṃ “so hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Satisampajaññāyogato
tika-s0301t:733_3: gorūpasīlo, mūḷho khalitapañño, gorūpassa viya sīlaṃ etassāti hi gorūpasīlo. Sabhāgo
tika-s0301t:733_4: ekarūpacittatāya. Ariyānaṃ sabhāgatā nāma guṇavantavasenāti āha “aññamaññassa guṇesu
tika-s0301t:733_5: pasīditvā”ti. Soḷasavidhaṃ paññanti mahāpaññādikā cha, nava anupubbavihārasamāpattipaññā,
tika-s0301t:733_6: āsavakkhayapaññāti imaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ paññaṃ. Tesaṭṭhi sāvakasādhāraṇañāṇānipi ettheva
tika-s0301t:734_0: Ānandāti theraṃ āha. Ācāroti cārittasīlamāha. Gocaroti gocarasampatti. Vihāroti samāpattivihāro.
tika-s0301t:734_1: Abhikkamotiādinā iriyāpathavihāraṃ. Tuyhampīti pi-saddena bhagavatā attānaṃ ādiṃ
tika-s0301t:734_2: katvā tadaññesaṃ viññūnaṃ sabbesaṃ therassa ruccanasabhāvo dīpitoti dassento “mayhaṃ
tika-s0301t:734_3: ruccatī”tiādimāha. Tattha satipi ānandattherassapi asītiyā mahātherānaṃ antogadhabhāve
tika-s0301t:734_4: “asītiyā mahātherānaṃ ruccatī”ti vatvā “tuyhampi ruccatī”ti vacanaṃ tena dhammasenāpatino
tika-s0301t:735_0: Sāṭakantareti nivatthavatthantare. Laddhokāsoti nibbuddhaṃ karonto sāṭakantare laddhaṃ
tika-s0301t:735_1: gahetuṃ laddhāvasaro. Labhissāminoti labhissāmi vata. Dīpadhajabhūtanti satayojanavitthiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:735_2: jambudīpassa dhajabhūtaṃ. Puggalapalāpeti antosārābhāvato palāpabhūte puggale haranto.
tika-s0301t:735_3: Bālatāyāti rucikhantiādiabhāvatāya. Dosatāyāti dussakabhāvena. Mohenāti mahāmūḷhatāya.
tika-s0301t:735_4: Keci pana “bālo bālatāyāti mūḷhatāya pakatibālabhāvena na jānāti. Mūḷho mohenāti
tika-s0301t:735_5: sayaṃ abālo samānopi yadā mohena pariyuṭṭhito hoti, tadā mohena na jānāti, ayaṃ padadvayassa
tika-s0301t:735_6: viseso”ti vadanti. Vipallatthacittoti yakkhummādena pittummādena vā viparītacitto.
tika-s0301t:736_0: “Catūsu kosallesū”ti vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ kosallaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādi
tika-s0301t:736_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha yo aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato
tika-s0301t:736_2: ca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ayaṃ dhātukusalo. Vuttanayena āyatanesu kusalo āyatanakusalo.
tika-s0301t:736_4: phalassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ, idaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇa”nti evaṃ ṭhānañca ṭhānato, aṭṭhānañca
tika-s0301t:736_5: aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānato ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo. Yo pana imesu dhātuādīsu pariññābhisamayādivasena
tika-s0301t:736_6: nissaṅgagatiyā paṇḍāti laddhanāmena ñāṇena ito gato pavatto, ayaṃ paṇḍito nāma.
tika-s0301t:737_0: Mahantānaṃ atthānaṃ pariggaṇhanato mahatī paññā etassāti mahāpañño. Sesapadesupi
tika-s0301t:737_1: eseva nayoti āha “mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho”ti. Nānattanti yāhi mahāpaññādīhi
tika-s0301t:737_2: samannāgatattā thero “mahāpañño”tiādinā kittito, tāsaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ
tika-s0301t:737_3: ayaṃ vemattatā. Yassa kassaci visesato arūpadhammassa mahattaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā
tika-s0301t:737_4: veditabbanti tadassa kiccasiddhiyā dassento “mahante sīlakkhandhe pariggaṇhātī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:737_5: Tattha hetumahantatāya paccayamahantatāya nissayamahantatāya pabhedamahantatāya kiccamahantatāya
tika-s0301t:737_6: phalamahantatāya ānisaṃsamahantatāya ca sīlakkhandhassa mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Tattha
tika-s0301t:737_8: taṃsamaṅgino ca purisavisesā. Pabhedo cārittādivibhāgo. Kiccaṃ tadaṅgādivasena paṭipakkhassa
tika-s0301t:737_9: vidhamanaṃ. Phalaṃ saggasampadā nibbānasampadā ca. Ānisaṃso piyamanāpatādi. Ayamettha
tika-s0301t:737_10: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu ca āgatanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:737_11: Iminā nayena samādhikkhandhādīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā veditabbā. Ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṃ
tika-s0301t:737_12: pana mahantabhāvo mahāvisayatāya veditabbo. Tattha ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ mahāvisayatā bahudhātukasuttādīsu
tika-s0301t:737_13: āgatanayena, vihārasamāpattīnaṃ samādhikkhandhe niddhāritanayena veditabbā. Ariyasaccānaṃ
tika-s0301t:737_15: satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgādīsu taṃsaṃvaṇṇanādīsu ca āgatanayena; sāmaññaphalānaṃ mahato
tika-s0301t:737_16: hitassa mahato sukhassa mahato atthassa mahato yogakkhemassa nipphattibhāvato santapaṇītanipuṇaatakkāvacarapaṇḍitavedanīyabhāvato
tika-s0301t:737_17: ca; abhiññānaṃ mahāsambhārato mahāvisayato mahākiccato mahānubhāvato mahānipphattito
tika-s0301t:737_18: ca; nibbānassa madanimmadanādimahatthasiddhito mahantatā veditabbā. Pariggaṇhātīti
tika-s0301t:737_19: sabhāvādito paricchijja gaṇhāti jānāti paṭivijjhatīti attho. Sā panāti mahāpaññatā.
tika-s0301t:738_0: Puthupaññāti ettha nānākhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti ayaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ
tika-s0301t:738_1: viññāṇakkhandho nāmāti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t:738_2: Tesu ekavidhena rūpakkhandho, ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho, ekavidhena vedanākkhandho,
tika-s0301t:738_3: bahuvidhena vedanākkhandho, ekavidhena saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandhoti
tika-s0301t:738_4: evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa ekavidhādivasena atītādivasenapi nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:738_5: pavattati. Tathā idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe… idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāmaṃ. Tattha dasāyatanā
tika-s0301t:738_6: kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakāti evaṃ āyatanānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t:738_7: Nānādhātūsūti ayaṃ cakkhudhātu nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma. Tattha soḷasa
tika-s0301t:738_8: dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakāti evaṃ dhātunānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0301t:738_9: taṃ upādiṇṇadhātuvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānañca
tika-s0301t:738_10: upādiṇṇadhātūsu eva nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tañca kho ekadesamattato,
tika-s0301t:738_11: na nippadesato, anupādiṇṇakadhātūnaṃ pana nānākaraṇaṃ na jānanti eva. Itarasāvakesu
tika-s0301t:738_12: vattabbameva natthi, sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva pana imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattāva imassa
tika-s0301t:738_13: rukkhassa khandho seto hoti, imassa kāḷo, imassa maṭṭho, imassa bahalattaco, imassa
tika-s0301t:738_14: tanuttaco, imassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ; imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītakaṃ
tika-s0301t:738_15: lohitakaṃ odātaṃ, sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ; phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:738_16: maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ ambilaṃ kaṭukaṃ kasāvaṃ; kaṇṭako tikhiṇo
tika-s0301t:738_17: atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo tambo lohito odāto hotīti dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t:739_0: Atthesūti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu. Nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesūti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato ca
tika-s0301t:739_1: saṇṭhānabhedato ca nānappabhedesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu. Avijjādiaṅgānañhi paccekaṃ
tika-s0301t:739_2: paṭiccasamuppādasaññitāti. Tenāha saṅkhārapiṭake “dvādasa paccayā dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā”ti.
tika-s0301t:739_4: eva itthipurisaattaattaniyādivasena anupalabbhesu sabhāvesu. Ma-kāro hettha padasandhikaro.
tika-s0301t:739_8: visayabhūtesu “imāni idamatthajotakānī”ti tathā tathā paṭibhānato patiṭṭhānato paṭibhānānīti
tika-s0301t:739_9: laddhanāmesu ñāṇesu. Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesūtiādīsu sīlassa puthuttaṃ nānattañca
tika-s0301t:739_10: vuttameva. Itaresaṃ pana vuttanayānusārena suviññeyyattā pākaṭameva. Yaṃ pana abhinnaṃ
tika-s0301t:739_11: ekameva nibbānaṃ, tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha “puthu janasādhāraṇe
tika-s0301t:739_12: dhamme samatikkammā”ti. Tenassa idha madanimmadanādipariyāyena puthuttaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0301t:740_0: Evaṃ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ puthuttañca dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena
tika-s0301t:740_1: hāsabhāvaṃ, pavattiākāravasena javanabhāvaṃ, kiccavasena tikkhādibhāvañca dassetuṃ
tika-s0301t:740_2: “katamā hāsapaññā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hāsabahuloti pītibahulo. Sesapadāni tassa
tika-s0301t:740_3: vevacanāni. Sīlaṃ paripūretīti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā pītisahagatāya paññāya
tika-s0301t:740_4: pātimokkhasīlaṃ ṭhapetvā hāsanīyatarasseva visuṃ gahitattā itaraṃ tividhaṃ sīlaṃ
tika-s0301t:740_5: paripūreti. Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena tadārammaṇe phullitā vikasitā
tika-s0301t:740_6: viya vattati, na upekkhāsahagatā. Sīlakkhandhaṃ samādhikkhandhantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0301t:741_0: Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccalakkhaṇato khippaṃ javatīti rūpakkhandhaṃ aniccanti sīghavegena
tika-s0301t:741_1: pavattiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena visaṭṭhavajiraṃ
tika-s0301t:741_2: viya lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhantī adandhāyantī rūpakkhandhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ vegena paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0301t:741_3: tasmā sā javanapaññā nāmāti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena
tika-s0301t:741_4: javanapaññaṃ dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0301t:741_5: khayaṭṭhenāti yattha yattha uppajjati, tattha tattheva khaṇeneva bhijjanato khayasabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:741_6: Bhayaṭṭhenāti bhayānakato. Asārakaṭṭhenāti attasāravirahato niccasārādivirahato ca.
tika-s0301t:741_7: Tulayitvāti tulābhūtāya vipassanāya tulayitvā. Tīrayitvāti tāya eva tīraṇabhūtāya
tika-s0301t:741_8: tīretvā. Vibhāvayitvāti yāthāvato pakāsetvā pañcakkhandhaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0301t:741_9: katvā. Rūpanirodheti rūpakkhandhassa nirodhabhūte nibbāne ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena.
tika-s0301t:741_10: Idāni sikhāppattavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetuṃ puna “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:742_0: Ñāṇatikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhasamucchindane veditabboti “khippaṃ kilese
tika-s0301t:742_1: chindatīti tikkhapañño”ti vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento “uppannaṃ kāmavitakka”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:742_2: Tikkhapañño khippābhiñño hoti, paṭipadā cassa na calatīti āha “ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro
tika-s0301t:742_3: ca ariyamaggā adhigatā hontī”tiādi. Thero cātiādinā dhammasenāpatino tikkhapaññatā
tika-s0301t:743_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā
tika-s0301t:743_1: vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti yāthāvato dassanena saccasampaṭivedho ijjhati,
tika-s0301t:743_2: na aññathāti kāraṇamukhena nibbedhikapaññaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo
tika-s0301t:743_3: hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ubbegabahuloti vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhāresu abhiṇhappavattasaṃvego.
tika-s0301t:743_4: Uttāsabahuloti ñāṇuttāsavasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bahuso utrastamānaso. Tena ādīnavānupassanamāha.
tika-s0301t:743_5: Ukkaṇṭhanabahuloti iminā pana nibbidānupassanamāha, aratibahulotiādinā tassā eva
tika-s0301t:743_6: aparāparuppattiṃ. Bahimukho sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho,
tika-s0301t:743_7: tathā vā pavattitavimokkhamukho. Nibbijjhanaṃ nibbedho, so etissā atthi, nibbijjhatīti
tika-s0301t:743_8: vā nibbedhā, sā eva paññā nibbedhikā. Yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā
tika-s0301t:744_1: paṭivedhaguṇassa ca niguhanaṃ, paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutāti eteneva pariyesanaparibhogamattaññutāpi
tika-s0301t:744_2: vuttā hoti. Tīhi santosehīti catūsu paccayesu paccekaṃ tīhi santosehi, sabbe pana
tika-s0301t:744_3: dvādasa. Paṭisallīnena vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ na saṅgaṇikārāmānaṃ. Nekkhammābhiratānanti
tika-s0301t:744_5: aṭṭhasamāpattisamadhigamena ativiya vodānaṃ visuddhiṃ pattānaṃ. Kilesupadhiādīnaṃ
tika-s0301t:744_7: nibbānaṃ. Upagatānaṃ, imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ lābhī pavivitto “pakārehi vivitto”ti
tika-s0301t:744_8: katvā. Samāsajjanaṃ parisinehuppādo saṃsaggo, savanavasena uppajjanakasaṃsaggo savanasaṃsaggo.
tika-s0301t:744_9: Esa nayo sesesupi. Samullapanaṃ ālāpasallapanaṃ. Saṃsaggavatthunā iminā tassa paribhogo paribhogasaṃsaggo.
tika-s0301t:745_0: Āraddhavīriyoti ettha vīriyārambho nāma vīriyassa paggaṇhanaṃ paripuṇṇakaraṇaṃ. Taṃ
tika-s0301t:745_1: pana sabbaso kilesānaṃ niggaṇhananti dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Odhunanavattāti
tika-s0301t:745_2: kilesānaṃ yassa kassaci sāvajjassa odhunanavasena vattā. Tenāha “bhikkhūna”ntiādi.
tika-s0301t:745_3: Otiṇṇaṃ nāma vajjaṃ ajjhācaritanti ārocitaṃ. Anotiṇṇaṃ anārocitaṃ. Tantivasenāti
tika-s0301t:745_4: pāḷidhammavasena, yuttasaddassa vasenāti attho. Pāpe lāmake puggale dhamme ca garahati
tika-s0301t:745_5: jigucchatīti pāpagarahī. Tenāha “pāpapuggale”tiādi. Ekadassīti ekabhavadassī, idhalokamattadassī
tika-s0301t:745_6: diṭṭhadhammikasukhamattāpekkhī. Samantāti samantato, parito me katthaci mā ahūti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:746_0: Soḷasahi padehīti soḷasahi koṭṭhāsehi. Akuppanti kenaci akopanīyaṃ. Ayaṃ dhammasenāpatino
tika-s0301t:746_1: guṇakathā satthu vacanānusārena dasasahassacakkavāḷabyāpinī ahosi, taṃ dassetuṃ “eva”ntiādi
tika-s0301t:746_2: vuttaṃ. Catubbidhā vaṇṇanibhā pātubhavi uḷārapītisomanassasamuṭṭhānattā. Suṭṭhu obhāsatīti
tika-s0301t:746_3: subho. Obhāsasampattiyā maṇino bhaddakatāti āha “subhoti sundaro”ti. Jātimā parisuddhaākarasamuṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0301t:746_6: Rattakambalassa vasena sabhāvavaṇṇasiddhiyā veḷuriyamaṇi ativiya sobhatīti āha “paṇḍukambale
tika-s0301t:746_7: nikkhitto”ti. Nikkhanti bhaṇḍamāha. Tañca appakena suvaṇṇena kataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ na sobhati
tika-s0301t:746_9: samaññā, tasmā pañcavīsatisuvaṇṇasāriyā vicittaābharaṇaṃ idha “nikkha”nti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0301t:746_10: Tañhi vipulaṃ na parittakaṃ. Mahājambusākhāya pavattanadiyanti mahājambusākhāya heṭṭhā
tika-s0301t:746_11: sañjātanadiyaṃ. Taṃ kira ratanaṃ rattaṃ. Sukusalena…pe… sampahaṭṭhanti suṭṭhu kusalena
tika-s0301t:746_12: suvaṇṇakārena ukkāya tāpetvā sammā pahaṭṭhaṃ majjanādivasena sukataparikammaṃ. Dhātuvibhaṅgeti
tika-s0301t:747_0: Nātiucco nātinīco taruṇasūriyo nāma. Satthārā ābhatavaṇṇo ubbhataguṇoti attho. Neva
tika-s0301t:747_1: maraṇaṃ abhinandatīti attanopi maraṇaṃ neva abhinandati attavinipātassa sāvajjabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:747_2: Bodhisatto pana paresaṃ atthāya attano attabhāvaṃ pariccajati karuṇāvasena, evaṃ
tika-s0301t:747_3: vosajjanaṃ paramatthapāramīpāripūriṃ gacchatīti sāvakā na tathā kātuṃ sakkā sikkhāpadato.
tika-s0301t:747_4: Na jīvitaṃ pattheti jīvitāsāya samucchinnattā. Divasasaṅkhepanti ajja tvaṃ idaṃ nāma
tika-s0301t:747_5: kammaṃ karohi, idaṃ te vetananti divasabhāgena paricchinnaṃ vetanaṃ. Tādiso hi bhatako
tika-s0301t:747_6: divasakkhayameva udikkhati, na kammaniṭṭhānaṃ. Nibbisaṃ bhatako yathāti vetanaṃ bhatiṃ
tika-s0301t:750_1: chede. Māriteti māraṇe. Na pāpaṃ samanupassatīti kiñci pāpaṃ atthīti na passati,
tika-s0301t:750_2: paresañca tathā pavedeti. Vissāsanti vissatthabhāvaṃ. “Katakammānampi vipāko natthī”ti
tika-s0301t:750_3: vadanto katapāpānaṃ akatapuññānañca vissatthataṃ nirāsaṅkataṃ janeti.
tika-s0301t:751_0: Tapojigucchāyāti tapasā acelavatādinā pāpato jigucchanena, “pāpaṃ virājayāmā”ti acelavatādisamādānenāti
tika-s0301t:751_1: attho. Tasmiñhi samādāne ṭhitena saṃvarena saṃvutacitto samannāgato pihito ca nāma
tika-s0301t:751_2: hotīti “susaṃvutatto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cattāro yāmā bhāgā catuyāmā, catuyāmā eva cātuyāmā.
tika-s0301t:751_3: Bhāgattho hi idha yāma-saddo yathā “rattiyaṃ paṭhamo yāmo”ti. So panettha bhāgo saṃvaralakkhaṇoti
tika-s0301t:751_4: āha “cātuyāmena susaṃvuto”ti, catukoṭṭhāsena saṃvarena suṭṭhu saṃvutoti attho. Paṭikkhittasabbasītodakoti
tika-s0301t:751_5: paṭikkhittasabbasītudakaparibhogo. Sabbena pāpavāraṇena yuttoti sabbappakārena saṃvaralakkhaṇena
tika-s0301t:751_6: pāpavāraṇena samannāgato. Dhutapāpoti sabbena nijjaralakkhaṇena pāpavāraṇenapi dhutapāpo.
tika-s0301t:751_7: Phuṭṭhoti aṭṭhannampi kammānaṃ khepanena vikkhepappattiyā kammakkhayalakkhaṇena sabbena
tika-s0301t:751_8: pāpavāraṇena phuṭṭho, taṃ phusitvā ṭhito. Na niguhantoti na niguhanahetu diṭṭhasute tatheva kathento.
tika-s0301t:752: Nānātitthiyānaṃyeva upaṭṭhākoti paravādīnaṃ sabbesaṃyeva titthiyānaṃ upaṭṭhāko, tesu sādhāraṇavasena abhippasanno. Koṭippattāti mokkhādhigamena samaṇadhamme pattabbamariyādappattā.
tika-s0301t:753_0: Sahacaritamattenāti sīhanādena saha vassakaraṇamattena. Sīhena sīhanādaṃ nadantena
tika-s0301t:753_1: saheva siṅgālena attano siṅgālaravakaraṇamattena. Kotthukoti khuddakakotthu. Āsaṅkitasamācāroti
tika-s0301t:753_2: attanā ca parehi ca āsaṅkitabbasamācāro. Sappurisānanti buddhādīnaṃ.
tika-s0301t:754_0: Tassāti vegabbharissa devaputtassa. Sarīre anuāvisīti sarīre anupavisitvā viya āvisi.
tika-s0301t:754_1: Adhimuccīti yathā gahitassa vasena cittaṃ na vattati, attano eva vase vattati, evaṃ
tika-s0301t:754_2: adhiṭṭhahi. Āyuttāti dassanena saṃyuttā. Pavivekiyanti kappakavatthabhuñjanasenāsanehi
tika-s0301t:754_3: pavivittabhāvaṃ. Tenāha “te kirā”tiādi. Rūpe niviṭṭhāti cakkhurūpadhamme abhiniviṭṭhā.
tika-s0301t:754_5: Maraṇadhammatāya mātiyā. Tenāha “mātiyāti maccā”ti. Paralokatthāyāti parasampattibhāvāya lokassa atthāya.
tika-s0301t:755_0: Pabhāsavaṇṇāti pabhāya samānavaṇṇā. Kesaṃ pabhāyāti āha “candobhāsā”tiādi. Sajjhārāgapabhāsavaṇṇā
tika-s0301t:755_1: indadhanupabhāsavaṇṇāti paccekaṃ yojanā. Āmo āmagandho etassa atthīti āmisaṃ. Vadhāyāti
tika-s0301t:756_1: kelāso”ti. Kenaci na ghaṭṭetīti aghaṃ, antalikkhanti āha “aghagāmīnanti ākāsagāmīna”nti.
tika-s0301t:756_2: Udakaṃ dhīyati etthāti udadhi, mahodadhi. Vipuloti vepullapabbato. Himavantapabbatānanti
tika-s0301t:763_0: 112. Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti bhagavato guṇe ajānanto kosalarājā attano khattiyamānena
tika-s0301t:763_1: kevalaṃ bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. Paṭhamāgate hi satthari tassa sammoditākāraṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0301t:763_2: “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te, mahārāja,
tika-s0301t:763_3: khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā tena raññā saddhiṃ paṭhamaṃ pavattamodo ahosi
tika-s0301t:763_4: pubbabhāsitāya, tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi rājā bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo
tika-s0301t:763_5: ahosīti yojanā. Taṃ pana samappavattamodanaṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi
tika-s0301t:763_6: vuttaṃ. Tattha sammoditanti saṃsanditaṃ ekībhāvanti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ ekarūpataṃ,
tika-s0301t:763_7: khamanīyanti “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato
tika-s0301t:763_8: dussahaṃ, kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyya”nti pucchati. Yāpanīyanti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ
tika-s0301t:763_9: cirapabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena
tika-s0301t:763_10: kacci appābādhaṃ. Dukkhajīvikābhāvena kacci appātaṅkaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya
tika-s0301t:763_11: kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ. Tadanurūpabalayogato kacci balaṃ. Sukhavihārasambhavena kacci
tika-s0301t:763_12: phāsuvihāro atthīti tattha tattha kacci-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Balavappattā
tika-s0301t:763_13: pīti pītiyeva. Taruṇapīti pāmojjaṃ. Sammodanaṃ janeti karotīti sammodanīyaṃ. Sammoditabbato
tika-s0301t:763_14: sammodanīyanti imaṃ pana atthaṃ dassento “sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato”ti āha. Saritabbabhāvatoti
tika-s0301t:764_2: atthaparisuddhatāyāti atthassa nirupakkilesataṃ. Anekehi pariyāyehīti anekehi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0301t:764_3: Adiṭṭhattāti upasaṅkamanavasena adiṭṭhattā. Guṇāguṇavasenāti guṇavasena gambhīrabhāvaṃ
tika-s0301t:764_4: vā aguṇavasena uttānabhāvaṃ vā. Ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvāti ovaṭṭikāya gahetabbasāravatthuṃ
tika-s0301t:764_5: katvā. Lokanissaraṇabhavokkantipañhanti lokato nissaṭabhāvapañhañceva ādito bhavokkamanapañhañca.
tika-s0301t:764_6: Satthu sammāsambuddhataṃ pucchanto hi “kiṃ bhavaṃ gotamo sabbalokato nissaṭo, sabbasattehi
tika-s0301t:764_7: ca jeṭṭho”ti? Pucchati nāma. Yathā hi satthu sammāsambuddhatāya lokato nissaṭatā
tika-s0301t:764_8: viññāyati, evaṃ sabbasattehi jeṭṭhabhāvato seṭṭhabhāvato. Svāyamattho aggapasādasuttādīhi
tika-s0301t:764_9: vibhāvetabbo. Kathaṃ pana sambuddhatā viññāyatīti? Aviparītadhammadesanato. Ayamettha
tika-s0301t:764_10: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanādīsu vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:765_0: Rājā satthu aviparītadhammadesanaṃ ajānanto tato evassa sammāsambodhiṃ asaddahanto
tika-s0301t:765_2: labbheyyā”ti maññamāno “kiṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo”tiādiṃ vakkhati. Rājā attano laddhiyā
tika-s0301t:765_3: na pucchati attano sammukhā tehi asammāsambuddhabhāvasseva paṭiññātattā. Yasmā te
tika-s0301t:765_4: musāvāditāya attano upaṭṭhākādīnaṃ “buddhā maya”nti paṭijāniṃsu, tasmā vuttaṃ “loke
tika-s0301t:765_5: mahājanena gahitapaṭiññāvasena pucchatī”ti. Svāyamattho āgamissati. Buddhasīhanādanti
tika-s0301t:765_6: buddhānaṃ eva āveṇikaṃ sīhanādaṃ. Kāmaṃ maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, sambodhiñāṇe
tika-s0301t:765_7: pana gahite taṃ atthato gahitameva hotīti vuttaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambodhi”nti.
tika-s0301t:766_0: Pabbajjūpagamanenāti yāya kāyaci pabbajjāya upagamanamattena samaṇā, na samitapāpatāya.
tika-s0301t:766_1: Jātivasenāti jātimattena brāhmaṇā, na bāhitapāpatāya. Pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅghoti
tika-s0301t:766_3: adhippāyo. Etesaṃ atthīti etesaṃ sabbaññupaṭiññātānaṃ parivārabhūto atthi. Svevāti
tika-s0301t:766_4: pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto eva. Keci pana “pabbajitasamūhavasena. Saṅghino, gahaṭṭhasamūhavasena
tika-s0301t:766_5: gaṇino”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ gaṇe eva loke saṅghasaddassa niruḷhattā.
tika-s0301t:766_7: pakāsitā. “Appicchā”ti vatvā tattha labbhamānaṃ appicchataṃ dassetuṃ “apicchatāya
tika-s0301t:766_8: vatthampi na nivāsentī”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi tesu sāsanikesu viya santaguṇaniguhanā appicchā
tika-s0301t:766_9: labbhatīti. Yasoti kittisaddo. Taranti etena saṃsāroghanti evaṃ sammatattā titthaṃ
tika-s0301t:766_10: vuccati laddhīti āha “titthakarāti laddhikarā”ti. Sādhusammatāti “sādhū”ti sammatā,
tika-s0301t:767_0: Kappakolāhalanti kappato kolāhalaṃ, “kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti devaputtehi ugghositamahāsaddo.
tika-s0301t:767_1: Imeti pūraṇādayo. Buddhakolāhalanti devatāhi ghositaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ. Payirupāsitvāti
tika-s0301t:767_2: purisasutiparamparāya sutvā. Cintāmaṇivijjā nāma paracittajānāpanavijjā. Sā kevaṭṭasutte
tika-s0301t:767_3: “maṇikā”ti āgatā, ādi-saddena gandhārisambhavavijjādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha gandhāriyā
tika-s0301t:767_4: vikubbanaṃ dasseti. Attabhāveti sarīre. Rājusmāti rājatejo.
tika-s0301t:768_0: Sukkadhammoti anavajjadhammo nikkilesatā. Idaṃ gahetvāti idaṃ parammukhā “mayaṃ buddhā”ti
tika-s0301t:768_1: vatvā attano sammukhā “na mayaṃ buddhā”ti tehi vuttavacanaṃ gahetvā. Evamāhāti “yepi
tika-s0301t:768_2: te, bho gotama…pe… navo ca pabbajjāyā”ti evaṃ avoca. Attano paṭiññaṃ gahetvāti “na
tika-s0301t:768_3: mayaṃ buddhā”ti tesaṃ attano purato pavattitaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā. Īdise ṭhāne kiṃ-saddo
tika-s0301t:768_4: paṭisedhavācako hotīti vuttaṃ “kinti paṭikkhepavacana”nti, kasmā paṭijānātīti attho?
tika-s0301t:769_0: Na uññātabbāti na garahitabbā. Garahattho hi ayaṃ u-saddo. “Daharo”ti adhikatattā
tika-s0301t:769_1: vakkhamānattā ca “khattiyoti rājakumāro”ti vuttaṃ. Urasā gacchatīti urago, yo koci
tika-s0301t:769_2: sappo, idha pana adhippetaṃ dassetuṃ “āsīviso”ti āha. Sīlavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ dasseti
tika-s0301t:769_3: sāmaññato “bhikkhū”ti vadanto. Idha pana yasmā “bhavampi no gotamo”tiādinā bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0301t:769_4: uddissa kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi, tasmā bhagavā attānaṃ abbhantaraṃ akāsi. Yadipi viseso
tika-s0301t:769_5: sāmaññajotanāya vibhāvito hoti, saṃsayuppattidīpakaṃ noti vuttaggahaṇaṃ pana taṃ
tika-s0301t:769_6: paricchijjatīti. Tenāha “desanākusalatāyā”tiādi. Idāni avaññāparibhave payogato vibhāvetuṃ
tika-s0301t:769_7: “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha acittīkatākāravasena avaññāya pākaṭabhāvo, vambhanavasena
tika-s0301t:769_8: paribhavassāti adhippāyena kāyapayogavasena avaññā dassitā, vacīpayogavasena paribhavo,
tika-s0301t:769_9: ubhayaṃ pana ubhayatthāpi pabhedato gahitaṃ, avaññaparibhavānaṃ dvinnampi ubhayattha
tika-s0301t:769_10: pariggaho. Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ avaññādi sabbampi. Catūsupi taṃ na kātabbameva sampati
tika-s0301t:770_0: Tadatthadīpanāti tassa ādito vuttassa atthassa dīpanā. Visesatthadīpanāti tato visiṭṭhatthadīpanā.
tika-s0301t:770_1: Khettānaṃ adhipatīti khattiyoti niruttinayena saddasiddhi veditabbā. Khettato vivādā
tika-s0301t:770_2: satte tāyatīti khattiyoti lokiyā kathayanti. “Mahāsammato, khattiyo, rājā”ti evamāgatesu
tika-s0301t:770_3: imesu dutiyaṃ. Akkharanti samaññā. Sā hi udayabbayābhāvato “na kadāci kharatīti akkhara”nti
tika-s0301t:770_4: vuttā. Tenāha “nāmagottaṃ na jīratī”ti. Jātisampannanti sampannajātiṃ ativisuddhajātiṃ.
tika-s0301t:770_5: Tīṇi kulānīti brāhmaṇavessasuddakulāni. Atikkamitvāti attano jātisampattiyā abhibhavitvā.
tika-s0301t:771_0: Kevalaṃ nāmapadaṃ vuttaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ apekkhatevāti āha “ṭhānaṃ hīti kāraṇaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:771_1: Uddhaṭadaṇḍenāti samantato ubbhatena daṇḍena sāsanena, balavaṃ upakkamaṃ garukaṃ
tika-s0301t:771_2: rājānampi. Taṃ khattiyaṃ parivajjeyyāti khattiyaṃ avaññāparibhavakaraṇato vajjeyya.
tika-s0301t:772_0: Uragassa ca nānāvidhavaṇṇaggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vadati “yena yena hī”tiādinā. Bahubhakkhanti
tika-s0301t:772_1: mahābhakkhaṃ sabbabhakkhakhādakaṃ. Pāvakaṃ sodhanatthena asuddhassapi dahanena. Soti
tika-s0301t:772_2: maggo. Kaṇho vattanī imassāti kaṇhavattanī. Mahanto aggikkhandho hutvā. Yāvabrahmalokappamāṇoti
tika-s0301t:772_3: kappavuṭṭhānakāle araññe agginā gahite kālantare eva kaṭṭhatiṇarukkhādisambhavoti
tika-s0301t:772_4: dassetuṃ “jāyanti tattha pārohā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:773_0: Ḍahituṃ na sakkoti paccakkosanādinā. Vinassanti samaṇatejasā vināsitattā. “Na tassā”ti
tika-s0301t:773_1: ettha na-kāraṃ “vindare”ti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbanti āha “na vindantī”ti. Vatthumattāvasiṭṭhoti
tika-s0301t:773_2: ṭhānameva nesaṃ avasissati, sayaṃ pana sabbaso saha dhanena vinassantīti attho.
tika-s0301t:774_0: “Sammadeva samācare”ti ettha yathā rājādīsu sammā samācareyya, taṃ vibhāgena dassento
tika-s0301t:774_1: “khattiyaṃ tāvā”tiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva. Tisso kulasampattiyoti khattiya-brāhmaṇagahapati-mahāsālakulāni
tika-s0301t:774_2: vadati. Pañca rūpibrahmaloke, cattāro arūpībrahmaloketi evaṃ nava brahmaloke kammabhavavibhāgena,
tika-s0301t:775_0: Abhikkantanti ativiya kamanīyaṃ. Sā panassā kantatā ativiya iṭṭhatāya manavaḍḍhanatāya
tika-s0301t:775_1: sobhanatāyāti āha “atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ atisundaranti attho”ti. “Abhikkanta”nti vacanaṃ
tika-s0301t:775_2: apekkhitvā napuṃsakaniddeso, vacanaṃ pana bhagavato dhammadesanāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:775_3: Atthamattadassanaṃ vā etaṃ, tasmā atthavasena liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmo veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:776_0: Adhomukhaṭhapitanti kenaci adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Heṭṭhāmukhajātanti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhaṃ
tika-s0301t:776_1: jātaṃ. Ugghāṭeyyāti vivaṭaṃ kareyya. Hatthe gahetvāti “puratthābhimukho uttarābhimukho
tika-s0301t:776_2: vā gacchā”tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā nissandehaṃ katvā “esa maggo”ti evaṃ vatvā
tika-s0301t:776_3: “gacchā”ti vadeyya. Kāḷapakkhacātuddasīti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī. Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyāti
tika-s0301t:776_4: ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ tassa ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya. Aññāṇassa
tika-s0301t:776_5: abhimukhattā heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya saddhammavimukhaṃ, tato eva adhomukhabhāvena asaddhamme
tika-s0301t:776_6: patitanti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhayaṃ. Kāmaṃ kāmacchandādayopi
tika-s0301t:776_7: paṭicchādakā, micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikāti āha “micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna”nti.
tika-s0301t:776_8: Tenāha bhagavā – “micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vajjaṃ vadāmī”ti. Sabbāpāyagāmimaggo
tika-s0301t:776_9: kummaggo “kucchito maggo”ti katvā. Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo
tika-s0301t:776_10: aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo. Teneva hi tadubhayapaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya “saggamokkhamaggaṃ
tika-s0301t:776_11: āvikarontenā”ti vuttaṃ. Sappiādisannissayo padīpo na tathā ujjalo, yathā telasannissayoti
tika-s0301t:777_0: Pasannākāranti pasannehi kātabbaṃ sakkāraṃ. Saraṇanti paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ. Ajjatāti
tika-s0301t:777_1: ajjāti padassa vaḍḍhanamattaṃ hettha tā-saddo yathā “devatā”ti. Pāṇehi upetanti pāṇehi
tika-s0301t:777_2: saha saraṇaṃ upetaṃ. “Yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ gatameva maṃ dhāretū”ti
tika-s0301t:777_3: āpāṇakoṭikaṃ attano saraṇagamanaṃ pavedeti. Tenāha “yāva me”tiādi. Yaṃ panettha atthato
tika-s0301t:780_0: 113. Purimasutteti purimasuttadesanāyaṃ. Tattha hi upasaṅkamantavelāya satthu guṇe
tika-s0301t:780_1: ajānanto kevalaṃ sammodanaṃ karoti. Desanaṃ sutvā pana satthu guṇe ñatvā saraṇaṅgatattā
tika-s0301t:780_2: idha imasmiṃ samāgame abhivādesi pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. Attānaṃ adhi ajjhattaṃ,
tika-s0301t:780_3: avijahena attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattadhammā ajjhattaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇavasena,
tika-s0301t:780_5: pavattati. Te panettha na yujjantīti vuttaṃ “niyakajjhatta”nti, niyakasaṅkhātaajjhattadhammesūti
tika-s0301t:780_6: attho. Tenāha “attano santāne”ti. Lubbhanalakkhaṇoti gijjhanalakkhaṇo, ārammaṇe daḷhaggahaṇasabhāvoti
tika-s0301t:780_7: attho. Dussanalakkhaṇoti kujjhanalakkhaṇo, byāpajjanasabhāvoti attho. Muyhanalakkhaṇoti
tika-s0301t:780_8: aññāṇalakkhaṇo, ārammaṇe sabhāvasammohabhāvoti attho. Viheṭhentīti atthanāsanaanatthuppādanehi
tika-s0301t:780_9: vibādhenti. Tato eva yathā saggamaggesu na dissati, evaṃ karontīti āha “nāsenti vināsentī”ti.
tika-s0301t:783_0: 114. Aññatra jarāmaraṇāti jarāmaraṇena vinā. Jarāmaraṇavirahito jāto nāma atthi nu
tika-s0301t:783_1: khoti pucchati. Pāḷiyaṃ jātassāti paccatte sāmivacanaṃ. Mahāsālāti iminā ra-kārassa
tika-s0301t:783_2: la-kāraṃ katvā “mahāsālā”ti vuttanti dasseti yathā “puratthiyoti pulatthiyo”ti. Mahāsārappattāti
tika-s0301t:783_3: mahantaṃ vibhavasāraṃ pattā. Koṭisataṃ dhanaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. “Kumbhaṃ nāma dasa
tika-s0301t:783_4: ambaṇānī”ti vadanti. Issarāti vibhavissariyena issarā. Suvaṇṇarajatabhājanādīnanti
tika-s0301t:784_0: Ārakā kilesehīti niruttinayena saddasiddhimāha. Ārakāti ca sabbaso samucchinnattā
tika-s0301t:784_1: tehi dūreti attho. Rāgādīnaṃ hatattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvato, anuttaradakkhiṇeyyatādipaccayā
tika-s0301t:784_2: ca arahaṃ. Kāmañcāyaṃ saṃyuttavaṇṇanā, abhidhammanayo eva pana nippariyāyoti āha
tika-s0301t:784_4: Catūhi maggehi karaṇīyanti paccekaṃ catūhi maggehi kattabbaṃ pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanābhisamayaṃ.
tika-s0301t:784_5: Evaṃ gataṃ soḷasavidhaṃ hoti. Osīdāpanaṭṭhena bhārā viyāti bhārā. Tenāha “bhārā have
tika-s0301t:784_6: pañcakkhandhā”tiādi. Attapaṭibaddhatāya attano avijahanato paramatthadesanāya ca
tika-s0301t:784_8: sambhavati akuppasabhāvā, aparihānadhammesu pana aggabhūte arahatte sātisayo, na
tika-s0301t:784_10: bhavesu saṃyojanaṃ kilesakammavipākavaṭṭapaccayo hutvā nissarituṃ appadānavasena
tika-s0301t:784_11: bandhatīti bhavasaṃyojanaṃ. Satipi hi aññesaṃ tappakkhiyabhāvena vinā saṃyojanāni
tika-s0301t:784_12: tesaṃ tappaccayabhāvo atthi, bhavaniyāmo orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyasaṅgahitoti taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammaniyāmo
tika-s0301t:784_13: ca hoti, na ca upacchinnasaṃyojanassa katānipi kammāni bhavaṃ nibbattentīti tesaṃyeva
tika-s0301t:784_14: saṃyojanaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo. Sammā kāraṇehi jānitvāti ñāyena dukkhādīsu so yathā jānitabbo;
tika-s0301t:784_15: tathā jānitvā, pubbakālakiriyāvimuttā hi aparakālakiriyā ca yathā sambhavati, taṃ
tika-s0301t:785_0: Bhijjanasabhāvo khaṇāyattattā. Nikkhipitabbasabhāvo maraṇadhammattā. Ayaṃ kāyo usmāyuviññāṇāpagamo
tika-s0301t:785_1: chaḍḍanīyadhammo, yasmiṃ yaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, taṃ tassa santānagatavippayuttanti katvā
tika-s0301t:785_2: vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “khīṇāsavassa hi ajīraṇadhammopi atthī”tiādi. Tenāha bhagavā
tika-s0301t:785_3: “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca
tika-s0301t:785_5: ṭhapetvā jīraṇadhammaṃ dassento “tesaṃpāyaṃ kāyo bhedanadhammo”ti evamāha. Jaraṃ
tika-s0301t:785_6: pattasseva hissa bhedananikkhipitabbatāniyate atthe suttadesanā pavattā. Atthassa
tika-s0301t:785_7: uppatti aṭṭhuppatti, sā etassa atthīti aṭṭhuppattiko. Kira-saddo anussavattho, tena
tika-s0301t:785_8: anussavāgatoyamattho, na aṭṭhakathāgatoti dīpeti. Tenāha “vadantī”ti. Yenāyaṃ attho
tika-s0301t:785_9: hetunā aṭṭhuppattiko, taṃ dassetuṃ “sivikasālāyaṃ nisīditvā kathita”nti vuttaṃ. “Viharati
tika-s0301t:785_10: jetavane”ti nidānavacanena yathā na virujjhati, tathā veditabbaṃ. Nanu imassa suttassa
tika-s0301t:785_11: pucchāvasiko nikkhepoti? Saccametaṃ, suttekadesaṃ pana sandhāya aṭṭhuppattikatāvacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:785_12: Keci pana “yānaṃ āruhitvā rājā āgato, rañño ārohanīyarathaṃ dassetvā vutta”ntipi vadanti.
tika-s0301t:786_0: Sarīre pheṇapiṇḍasame kiṃ vattabbaṃ? Sabbhi saddhinti sādhūhi saha pavedayanti. Na
tika-s0301t:786_1: hi kadāci sādhūnaṃ sādhūhi saha kattabbā honti, tasmā sīdanasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ
tika-s0301t:786_2: bhijjanappattattā nibbānaṃ sabbhīti vuccati. Purimapadassāti “satañca dhammo na jaraṃ
tika-s0301t:786_3: upetī”ti padassa. Kāraṇaṃ dassento byatirekavasena. Sataṃ dhammo nibbānaṃ kilesehi
tika-s0301t:786_4: saṃsīdanabhijjanasabhāvo na hoti, tasmā taṃ āgamma jaraṃ na upeti. Kilesā pana tannimittakā,
tika-s0301t:786_5: evamayaṃ vuttakāraṇato jaraṃ na upetīti. Tenāha “ida”ntiādi. Sundarādhivacanaṃ vā
tika-s0301t:786_6: etaṃ “sabbhī”ti padaṃ apāpatādīpanato, sabbhidhammabhūtanti attho. Tenāha “virāgo
tika-s0301t:786_7: tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, na tena dhammena samatthi kiñcī”ti ca.
tika-s0301t:789_0: 115. Rahasi gatassāti janasambādhato apakkantassa. Nilīnassa teneva janavivekena
tika-s0301t:789_1: ekamantaṃ nisajjāya ekībhāvena paṭisallīnassa viya. Tenāha “ekībhūtassā”ti. Sabbaññubhāsitaṃ
tika-s0301t:789_2: karonto āha tassa vacanaṃ “evameta”nti sampaṭicchitvā tassa vacanaṃ tathāpaccanubhāsanto.
tika-s0301t:789_3: Antakenādhipannattā eva khettavatthuhiraññasuvaṇṇādi mānusaṃ bhavaṃ jahato. Anuganti
tika-s0301t:789_4: anugataṃ, tameva anugāmīti attho. Nicayanti uparūpari vaḍḍhiyā nicitabhūtaṃ. Samparāyikanti samparāya hitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:792_0: 116. Pīdahananti saṃyamanaṃ. Kammapathabhedaṃ appattassāti supinakālo viya pavattimattatāya
tika-s0301t:792_1: kammapathavisesaṃ agatassa. Kammassāti akusalakammassa. Saṃvaranti saṃvarabhāvaṃ
tika-s0301t:792_2: dasseti, itarassa pana saṃvarabhāvo purimehi tīhi padehi dassitovāti. Ottappampi
tika-s0301t:792_3: gahitameva tadavinābhāvato. Na hi pāpajigucchanaṃ pāpautrāsarahitaṃ, utrāso vā pāpajigucchanarahito atthīti.
tika-s0301t:795: 117. Uḷārasaddo seṭṭhe bahuke ca dissatīti āha “paṇīte ca bahuke cā”ti. Mānamajjanenāti mānavasena madappattiyā. Atikkamanti sādhumariyādavītikkamalakkhaṇaṃ dosaṃ. Kūṭo pāso.
tika-s0301t:798_0: 118. Yasmā kāmanimittaṃ satto sampajānamusā bhāsati, tasmā kāmā tassa patiṭṭhā paccayo
tika-s0301t:798_1: kāraṇanti āha “kāmahetū”tiādi. Bhadramukhasīsena viṭaṭubhaṃ bhadropacārena upacaratīti
tika-s0301t:798_2: attho, vinicchayo karīyati etthāti aḍḍakaraṇaṃ, vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ. Khippanti kūṭaṃ,
tika-s0301t:798_3: macchakhippantipi vaṭṭati. Oḍḍitanti oḍḍanavasena phalaṃ pāpitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:801_0: 119. “Kasmā pucchatī”ti? Pucchākāraṇaṃ codetvā samudayato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “ayaṃ
tika-s0301t:801_1: kira mallikā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mālārāmaṃ gantvāti attano pitu mālārāmaṃ rakkhaṇatthañceva
tika-s0301t:801_2: avasesapupphaggahaṇatthañca gantvā. Kāsigāmeti kāsiraṭṭhassa gāme. So kira gāmo mahākosalarājena
tika-s0301t:801_3: attano dhītuyā patigharaṃ gacchantiyā pupphamūlatthāya dinno, taṃnimittaṃ. Bhāgineyyena
tika-s0301t:801_4: ajātasattunā. Tassāti rañño pasenadissa. Sāti mallikā. Nivattitunti tassā dhammatāya
tika-s0301t:801_5: nivattituṃ tassā vacanaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ. Nevajjhagāti vattamānatthe atītavacananti
tika-s0301t:801_6: āha “nādhigacchatī”ti. Puthu attāti tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā.
tika-s0301t:804_0: 120. Thūṇanti yaññūpatthambhaṃ. Upanītāni yaññaṃ yajituṃ ārambhāya. Ettāvatāti “idha,
tika-s0301t:804_1: bhante…pe… rudamānā parikammāni karontī”ti ettakena pāṭhena. Sanniṭṭhānanti “naṃ
tika-s0301t:804_2: itthiṃ labhissāmi nu kho, na nu kho labhissāmī”ti nicchayaṃ avindanto na ñāyanto.
tika-s0301t:804_3: Pheṇuddehakanti yathā yattha kuthite pheṇaṃ uddehati na upadhīyati, evaṃ anekavāraṃ
tika-s0301t:804_4: pheṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. Taṃ divasanti tasmiṃ raññā niddaṃ alabhitvā dukkhaseyyadivase.
tika-s0301t:804_5: Ālokaṃ oloketvāti lohakumbhimukhavaṭṭisīse patte tattha mahantaṃ ālokaṃ oloketvā.
tika-s0301t:804_6: Attāno vacanaṃ rañño pavattiñāpanatthaṃ. Mahāsaddo udapādi “evarūpaṃ yaññaṃ rājā
tika-s0301t:804_7: kārāpetī”ti. Vattukāmo ahosi, vattuñca pana avisahanto “sa” iti vatvā lohakumbhiyaṃ
tika-s0301t:804_8: nimuggo. Imaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmo ahosīti ayaṃ panettha sambandho. Esa nayo sesapadadvayepi.
tika-s0301t:804_9: Dhammabheriṃ carāpesuṃ “koci kañci pāṇaṃ mā hanatū”ti. So itthisāmiko puriso sotāpattiphale
tika-s0301t:804_10: patiṭṭhahi attano upanissayasampattiyā sattu ca desanāvilāsasampattiyā, rājā pana
tika-s0301t:805_0: Saṅgahavatthūnīti lokassa saṅgahakāraṇāni. Nipphannasassato navabhāge kassakassa
tika-s0301t:805_1: datvā raññaṃ ekabhāgaggahaṇaṃ dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ. Evaṃ kassakā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sassāni
tika-s0301t:805_2: sampādentīti āha “sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho”ti. Tato orabhāge kira chabhāgaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0301t:805_3: jātaṃ. Chamāsikanti channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ pahonakaṃ. Pāsetīti pāsagate viya karoti.
tika-s0301t:805_4: Vācāya piyassa piyakarassa kammaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ. Sabbaso raṭṭhassa iddhādibhāvato khemaṃ.
tika-s0301t:805_5: Nirabbudaṃ coriyābhāvato. Idañhi raṭṭhaṃ acoriyaṃ niraggaḷanti vuccati apārutagharabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:806_0: Uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvāti ummūlaṃ katvā. Dvīhi pariyaññehīti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge
tika-s0301t:806_1: pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi. Sattavīsati…pe… nassāti sattavīsādhikānaṃ
tika-s0301t:806_2: tiṇṇaṃ pasusatānaṃ dvāvīsatiyā assādīhi ca saṭṭhiadhikadvisataāraññakapasūhi ca saddhiṃ
tika-s0301t:806_3: sampiṇḍitānaṃ pana navādhikachasatapasūnaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa. Tathā hi vadanti –
tika-s0301t:809_0: Sammanti yugacchidde pakkhipitabbadaṇḍakaṃ. Pāsentīti khipanti. Saṃhārimehīti sakaṭehi
tika-s0301t:809_1: vahitabbehi yūpehi. Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinadītīre pathaviyā
tika-s0301t:809_2: vivare dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi. Andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā “ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo”ti
tika-s0301t:809_3: saññāya tattha sammāpāsayaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti. Tena vuttaṃ “nimuggokāsato pabhutī”ti.
tika-s0301t:809_4: Ayūpo appakadivaso yāgo, sayūpo bahudivasaṃ sādheyyo satrayāgo. Mantapadābhisaṅkhatānaṃ
tika-s0301t:809_6: Sāragabbhakoṭṭhāgārādīsu natthettha aggaḷanti niraggaḷo. Tattha kira yaññe attano
tika-s0301t:809_7: sāpateyyaṃ anavasesato anigūhitvā niyyātīyati. Mahārambhāti bahupasughātakammā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0301t:809_8: pana “vividhā yattha haññare”ti vakkhamānattā “mahākiccā”ti attho vutto, idha “mahārambhāti
tika-s0301t:809_9: papañcavasena ajeḷakā”tiādi vuttanti “bahupasughātakammā”ti attho vutto. Nirārambhāti
tika-s0301t:809_10: etthāpi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Anugataṃ kulanti anukulaṃ, kulānugatanti attho
tika-s0301t:812_0: 121. Idanti “idha, bhante”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Te bhikkhū ārocesunti sambandho. Tesūti
tika-s0301t:812_1: tesu raññā bandhāpitamanussesu. Sukatakāraṇanti sukāraṇakiriyaṃ ārocesuṃ, na kevalaṃ
tika-s0301t:812_2: tesaṃ manussānaṃ bandhāpitabhāvaṃ. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “rañño kirā”tiādi
tika-s0301t:813_0: Ukkaṭṭheti yuddhe. Mantīsūti guttamantīsu. Akutūhalanti saññataṃ. Piyanti piyāyitabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:813_1: Annapānamhi madhure abhutte uppanne. Attheti atthe kicce jāte thiranti na kathenti
tika-s0301t:813_2: kāyabalamattena apanetuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā. Suṭṭhu rattarattāti ativiya rattā eva hutvā
tika-s0301t:813_3: rattā. Sārattenāti sārabhāvena sārabhāvasaññāya. Ohārinanti heṭṭhā haraṇasīlanti
tika-s0301t:813_4: āha “catūsu apāyesu ākaḍḍhanaka”nti. Sithilanti sithilākāraṃ, na pana sithilaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0301t:818_0: 122. Pubbārāmasaṅkhāteti sāvatthinagarassa pubbadisāya katattā pubbārāmeti saṅkhaṃ
tika-s0301t:818_1: gate. Tatrāti “migāramātuyā pāsāde”ti tasmiṃ saṃkhittavacane. Ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā
tika-s0301t:818_2: anupubbikathā ādito paṭṭhāya anukkamakathā. Patthanaṃ akāsi tassa bhagavato aggupaṭṭhāyikaṃ
tika-s0301t:818_3: ekaṃ upāsikaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhantī. Meṇḍakaputtassāti meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa.
tika-s0301t:818_4: Mātiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi tassā upakāraṃ garubhāvañca disvā. Tāya kārite pāsādeti tāya mahāupāsikāya
tika-s0301t:818_5: mahālatāpasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navahi koṭīhi karīsamatte bhūmibhāge kārite sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍite pāsāde.
tika-s0301t:819_1: naggānañceva bhoggānañca nissirikānañca. Te hi anivatthavatthatāya naggā ceva, acelakavatādinā
tika-s0301t:819_2: bhoggasarīratāya bhoggā, sobhārahitatāya nissirikā ca. Attanā diṭṭhasutaṃ paṭicchādetvā
tika-s0301t:819_3: na katheyyunti akāraṇametaṃ tesaṃ raññā payuttacarapurisabhāvato. Evaṃ kate pana
tika-s0301t:819_4: te “aññepi pabbajitā atthīti ayaṃ jānātī”ti maññeyyunti kohaññacitto evaṃ akāsīti
tika-s0301t:819_5: sakkā viññātuṃ. Tathā hi tenatthena aparitosamāno “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:820_0: Kāsikacandananti ujjalacandanaṃ. Taṃ kira vaṇṇavasena samujjalaṃ hoti pabhassaraṃ,
tika-s0301t:820_1: tadatthameva naṃ saṇhataraṃ karonti. Tenāha “kāsikacandananti saṇhacandana”nti. Vaṇṇagandhatthāyāti
tika-s0301t:820_3: sugandhatthāya ca. “Gihinā”tiādīhi padehi evaṃ pamādavihārinā tayā arahanto duviññeyyāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:821_0: Saṃvāso nāma idha kālena upasaṅkamananti dassento “upasaṅkamantenā”ti āha. Kāyavācāhi
tika-s0301t:821_2: vīmaṃsissāmi “parisuddhaṃ nu kho, no”ti. Sappaññenāti sīlapariggaṇhanapaññāya sappaññena.
tika-s0301t:821_3: Jānituṃ na sakkoti sabhāvassa sato sīlassa anupadhāraṇato.
tika-s0301t:822_0: Kathanenāti aparāparaṃ kathanena. Tathā hi vakkhati “ekaccassa hī”tiādi. Ariyavohāroti
tika-s0301t:822_1: diṭṭhādilakkhaṇena voharito “diṭṭhaṃ adiṭṭha”ntiādinā pavuttasaddavohāro. Tassa pana
tika-s0301t:822_2: kāraṇameva gaṇhanto “ettha cetanā”ti āha. Esa nayo anariyavohārepi. Paramatthato
tika-s0301t:822_3: hi saccavācādayo musāvādādayo cetanālakkhaṇāti. Paññattivohāro tathā tathā voharitabbato
tika-s0301t:823_1: niṭṭhāpeti. Saṃkathāyāti atthavīmaṃsanavasena pavattāya sammākathāya. Uppilavati
tika-s0301t:823_2: lahukabhāvato. Heṭṭhācarakāti avacarakā. Ye anupavisitvā paresaṃ rahassavīmaṃsanavasena
tika-s0301t:824_0: Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānenāti vaṇṇena vā saṇṭhānena vā vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā saṇṭhānasampattiyā
tika-s0301t:824_1: vā. Sujāno pesalo vissaseti yojanā. Lahukadassanenāti parittadassanena vijjukena
tika-s0301t:827_0: 123. Rūpāti rūpasaṅkhātā kāmaguṇā. Te pana nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnāpi rūpāyatanattā
tika-s0301t:827_2: dā-saddo viya kālattho hotīti āha “yatoti yadā”ti. Manaṃ āpayati vaḍḍhetīti manāpaṃ,
tika-s0301t:827_3: manoramaṃ. Manāpanipphattitanti tassa puggalassa manasā piyāyitaṃ, tassa aggabhāvena
tika-s0301t:827_4: pariyantaṃ paramaṃ koṭiṃ katvā pavattitanti attho. Puggalamanāpanti ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ
tika-s0301t:827_5: acintetvā puggalassa vasena manāpabhāveneva iṭṭhatāya iṭṭhanti. Sammutīti samaññā.
tika-s0301t:827_6: Puggalamanāpaṃ nāma saññāvipallāsavasena viparītampi gaṇhāti itarasabhāvatoti āha
tika-s0301t:827_7: “yaṃ ekassa…pe… iṭṭhaṃ kanta”nti. Idāni taṃ jivhāviññeyyavasena yojetvā dassento
tika-s0301t:827_9: viya aññampi evaṃjātikaṃ tena tena puggalena manāpanti gahetabbārammaṇaṃ puggalamanāpaṃ nāma.
tika-s0301t:828_0: Loke paṭivibhattaṃ natthi, vibhajitvā dassanena lokena madhurajātenapi paṭivibhattaṃ
tika-s0301t:828_1: katvā gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “vibhajitvā pana dassetabba”nti.
tika-s0301t:828_3: Majjhimānaṃ pana…pe… vibhajitabbaṃ tesaṃ manāpassa manāpato, amanāpassa amanāpato
tika-s0301t:828_4: upaṭṭhānato. Tatthapi iṭṭhāniṭṭhaparicchedo nippariyāyato evaṃ veditabboti dassento
tika-s0301t:828_5: āha “tañca paneta”ntiādi. Tañca panetaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacarajavanesu
tika-s0301t:828_6: akusalassa vasena yebhuyyena pavattatīti katvā tattha “rajjati dussatī”ti akusalasseva
tika-s0301t:828_7: pavatti dassitā. Sesakāmāvacarassapi vasena pavatti labbhateva. Tathā hi taṃ appaṭikūlepi
tika-s0301t:828_8: paṭikūlākārato, paṭikūlepi appaṭikūlākārato pavattatīti. Vipākacittaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0301t:828_9: paricchindati, na sakkā vipākaṃ vañcetunti. Kusalakammaṃ hi ekantato iṭṭhameva, akusalakammañca
tika-s0301t:828_10: aniṭṭhameva, tasmā tattha uppajjamānaṃ vipākacittaṃ yathāsabhāvato pavattatīti.
tika-s0301t:829_0: Yaṃ pana sammohavinodaniyaṃ “kusalakammajaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t:829_1: taṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena sobhanaṃ akusalakammajampi ekaccānaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-s0301t:829_2: iṭṭhanti anuññātaṃ siyā. Kusalakammajaṃ pana sabbesaṃ iṭṭhamevāti vadanti. Tiracchānagatānaṃ
tika-s0301t:829_3: kesañci manussarūpaṃ amanāpaṃ, yato te disvāva palāyanti. Manussā ca devatānaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-s0301t:829_4: disvā bhāyanti, tesampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha kusalavipākameva uppajjati,
tika-s0301t:829_5: tādisassa pana puññassa abhāvā na tesaṃ tattha abhirati hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kusalakammajassa
