tika-s0301t:1572_5: dhammo. Saññā cittacetasikānaṃ dhāraṇaṃ, avicchedato sandhāraṇato kusalasantānaṃ
tika-s0301t:1572_6: dhāretīti dhiti, vīriyaṃ. Cajati etenāti cāgo, dānaṃ. Paccayavekallato phaluppādanasamatthatāvasena santi.
tika-s0301t:1573_0: Aññepīti ito yathāvuttadhammasamudāyato aññepi dhammā yadi santi, te dhamme pucchassūti.
tika-s0301t:1573_1: Kilese, kāyavācādike vā dametīti damo, paññā. Uṭṭhahati ussahati etenāti uṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1573_2: vīriyaṃ. Etthāti etissā pucchāya. Saddhinti saṅkhepato bhāvatthapadānaṃ bandhanena
tika-s0301t:1573_3: saha. Ekamekaṃ padanti paññādikamekekaṃ padaṃ. “Paññā imasmiṃ ṭhāne paññāti dhammoti
tika-s0301t:1573_4: ca āgatā”tiādinā paññādiatthassa uddharaṇaṃ atthuddhāro. Tassa tassa atthassa “paññā
tika-s0301t:1573_5: pajānanā”tiādinā vevacanapadānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ paduddhāro. Pajānātīti paññā, dhāretīti
tika-s0301t:1573_6: dhammo, dametīti damoti evaṃ padassa kathanaṃ padavaṇṇanā.
tika-s0301t:1574_0: Ajjāti vā etarahi. Yathāvuttena pakārenāti “saddahāno arahata”ntiādinā vuttappakārena.
tika-s0301t:1574_1: Saccasampaṭivedhāvagahaṇaṃ vā yathāvuttena pakārena diṭṭhasaccatāya idhalokaparalokatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:1574_2: yāthāvato jānanto. Evañca yakkho satthu desanānubhāvasiddhaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanena attano
tika-s0301t:1574_3: paṭilābhasampattiṃ vibhāvento “kathaṃsu labhate pañña”ntiādimāhāti ācariyā. Samparāyikoti
tika-s0301t:1574_4: ettha ca-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho, tena “diṭṭhadhammiko cā”ti ayamattho vutto evāti dassento
tika-s0301t:1574_5: “yo attho…pe… dassetī”ti āha. Arīyati phalaṃ etasmāti attho, kāraṇaṃ. Vicakkhaṇe sapayojanatāya.
tika-s0301t:1575: Tassa ñāṇassāti tassa atthassa āvibhāvanassa ñāṇassa. Guṇavisesehi ca sadisassapi aññassa abhāvato aggadakkhiṇeyyo buddho bhagavā. Tenāha –
tika-s0301t:1580_0: Sahitapaṭipattinti paññāsaṅgāhikaṃ attano paṭipattiṃ. Sundarā bodhi subodhi, buddhassa
tika-s0301t:1580_1: subodhi buddhasubodhi, sā eva buddhasubodhitā. Dhammassavanatthaṃ sannipatitadevatāhi
tika-s0301t:1581_0: Satapuññalakkhaṇanti satasahassakappe puññasambhārassa katattā tesaṃ puññānaṃ vasena
tika-s0301t:1581_1: satapuññalakkhaṇaṃ anekapuññanibbattalakkhaṇaṃ. Abhinandiyatāya sabbehi aṅgehi samupetaṃ
tika-s0301t:1581_2: samannāgataṃ. Katapuññabhāvaṃ byañjentīti byañjanāni, aṅgapaccaṅgāni. Tesaṃ paripuṇṇattā
tika-s0301t:1581_3: paripuṇṇabyañjanaṃ. Taṃ yakkho…pe… pūresīti gāthāpūraṇatthameva hi bhagavā tathārūpāni
tika-s0301t:1581_4: akāsi. Abyādhitāti arogā. “Abyathitā”ti keci paṭhanti, sayasantāsarahitāti attho.
tika-s0301t:1582_1: Bhavati hi tatraṭṭhatāya taṃ-saddo yathā “gāmo āgato, mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1583_0: Sampiṇḍitvāti sannipatitvā. Kāmaṃ sambhāro tena katoti natthi, yuddhatthaṃ pana bahuso
tika-s0301t:1583_1: ussāhassa katattā “yuddhamādiṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ. Tameva āḷavakasuttaṃ kathesi tassā
tika-s0301t:1583_2: eva desanāya sannipatitaparisāya sappāyattā. Tenāha “kathāpari…pe… ahosī”ti. Catūhi
tika-s0301t:1583_3: vatthūhīti catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi. Parisanti attano parisaṃ. “Itarañcā”tipi vadanti.
tika-s0301t:1589_0: 247. Abhiyaṃsūti yuddhasajjābhimukhā hutvā gacchiṃsu. Tatrāti tasmiṃ asurānaṃ abhiyāne
tika-s0301t:1589_1: ayaṃ dāni vuccamānā anupubbato kathā. Tettiṃsa purise gahetvāti tettiṃsa purise puññakiriyāya
tika-s0301t:1589_2: sahāyabhūte gahetvā. “Yāvajīvaṃ mātāpitubharo assa”ntiādinā samādinnāni satta vatapadāni
tika-s0301t:1589_3: pūretvā. Adhigaṇhantaṃ abhibhavantaṃ. Puttahatāyāti hataputtāya. Sā surā na hoti,
tika-s0301t:1589_4: na suraṃ pivimhāti adhippāyo. Tato paṭṭhāyāti “na surā”ti vuttakālato paṭṭhāya. “Na
tika-s0301t:1589_5: suranti na dibbantīti asurā”ti keci. Heṭṭhimatale antobhūmiyaṃ āyāmato dasayojanasahassaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1590_0: Uragādisahacaritāni ṭhānāni uragādīnīti āha “uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesū”ti. Paṭhamālindeti
tika-s0301t:1590_1: paṭhame paribhaṇḍe. Pañcayojanasahassavitthāraputhubahalāhi sinerussa catūsupi passesu
tika-s0301t:1590_2: cattāro paribhaṇḍā. Sinerussa hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ passe yugandharādīsu pañcasataparittadīpaparivāre
tika-s0301t:1590_3: mahādīpe ca labhitabbassa mahato atthassa vasena mahatthā. Kupitāvilacittāti kupitena
tika-s0301t:1590_4: kopena ākulacittā. Yuddhesīti yuddhesino. Sesesūti sesesu paribhaṇḍesu. Sesāti supaṇṇādayo.
tika-s0301t:1592: Pamādaṃ āpādesīti sakkassa āṇāya pamādaṃ āpajji. Saṭṭhiyojanaṃ vitthārena. Suvaṇṇamahāvīthinti suvaṇṇamayabhūmijagativīthiṃ.
tika-s0301t:1593_0: Anuṭṭhahantoti uṭṭhānaṃ kāyikavīriyaṃ akaronto. Avāyamantoti vāyāmaṃ cetasikavīriyaṃ
tika-s0301t:1593_1: akaronto. Kiñci kiccanti kasivāṇijjādibhedaṃ aññataraṃ kiccaṃ kattabbakammaṃ. Varanti
tika-s0301t:1593_2: pavaraṃ. Tenāha “uttama”nti. Tañca kho kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetanti āha “okāsa”nti.
tika-s0301t:1593_3: Kammaṃ akatvāti kiñcipi jīvitahetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ akatvā. Jīvitaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti tassa
tika-s0301t:1593_4: jīvitassa hetu nāma. Nibbānassa maggoti nibbānassa adhigamupāyabhūto maggo.
tika-s0301t:1596: 248. Antareti abbhantare. Evaṃnāmakanti “susīmo”ti evaṃnāmakaṃ. Ekaṃ puttameva aññataraṃ attano puttameva.
tika-s0301t:1599_0: 249. Samupabyūḷhoti ubhinnaṃ saha eva samāgamo, bhusaṃ vā byūḷhoti attho. Bhusā panassa
tika-s0301t:1599_1: byūḷhatā dvinnaṃ senānaṃ samāgantvā sampiṇḍitabhāvenāti āha “sampiṇḍito rāsibhūto”ti.
tika-s0301t:1599_2: Pacchimantoti rathapañjarassa paranto pacchimanto pacchimakoṭṭhāso. Rathasandhitoti
tika-s0301t:1599_3: rathapañjarassa kubbarena saddhiṃ sambandhanaṭṭhānato. Tadeva pamāṇanti tadeva “diyaḍḍhayojanasatāyāmo”ti
tika-s0301t:1599_4: vuttappamāṇameva. Diguṇaṃ katvāti “pacchimanto satayojano”tiādinā diguṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0301t:1599_6: Rājā noti amhākaṃ rājā devaseṭṭho. Dutiyaṃ āsanaṃ labhatīti sakke nisinne tassa anantaraṃ
tika-s0301t:1599_7: dutiyaṃ āsanaṃ labhati. Tasmā devaseṭṭhatāya sakko viya gāravaṭṭhāniyo, yato sakko
tika-s0301t:1599_8: “tassa dhajaggaṃ ullokeyyāthā”ti āha. Esa nayo sesesupi. Asurehi parājitoti asurehi
tika-s0301t:1599_9: parājayaṃ āpādito. Rajadhajaṃ disvāti parasenāya upagacchantiyā uṭṭhitarajamattampi
tika-s0301t:1599_10: disvā ṭhitopi taṃ rajadhajaṃ disvā bhīrubhāvena palāyanadhammo.
tika-s0301t:1600_0: Yassa dhajaggaparittassa. Ānubhāvo vattati asammukhībhūtāhipi devatāhi sirasā sampaṭicchitabbato.
tika-s0301t:1600_1: Corabhayādīhīti ādi-saddena rogabhayādīnañceva vaṭṭadukkhassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo
tika-s0301t:1600_2: vidhinā bhāvite parittassa atthe upacārajjhānādīnampi ijjhanato.
tika-s0301t:1601_0: Dīghavāpīnāmake gāme cetiyaṃ dīghavāpicetiyaṃ. Muddhavedikā nāma hammiyaṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-s0301t:1601_1: katavedikā. Buddhagataṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā parittarakkhaguttiṃ āha. Parittassa ānubhāvena
tika-s0301t:1601_2: dve iṭṭhakā…pe… aṭṭhaṃsu. Tathā hi tasmiṃ nisseṇiyaṃ ṭhite…pe… aṭṭhaṃsūti.
tika-s0301t:1604_0: 250. “Mahānubhāvatāya asurānaṃ cittavepanena vepacittī”ti vadanti. Isīhi pana abhayaṃ
tika-s0301t:1604_1: yācite “bhayameva dadāmī”ti vatvā tehi “akkhayaṃ hotu te bhaya”nti abhisapavasena
tika-s0301t:1604_2: vuttakālato paṭṭhāya vepanacittatāya “vepacittī”ti vuccati, yaṃ lokiyā “pulomo”ti
tika-s0301t:1604_3: ca vadanti. Nipātapadānipi kānici atthavisesajotakāni hontīti āha “nipātamatta”nti
tika-s0301t:1604_4: hetuatthādīnamettha asambhavato. Tanti sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ. Kaṇṭhe pañcamehīti kaṇṭhabandhanapañcamehi,
tika-s0301t:1604_5: vibhattialopena niddeso. Cittenevāti “imaṃ bandhāmi, ayaṃ bajjhatū”ti uppannacitteneva.
tika-s0301t:1604_6: Bajjhati baddho hoti, ayaṃ devānubhāvo. Muccatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Dasahīti “corosī”tiādinā
tika-s0301t:1604_7: idha vuttehi dasahi. Tenāha “imehī”ti. Nibbattitvā cirakālataṃ upādāya khuṃsanavasena
tika-s0301t:1604_8: vadati “jarasakkā”ti. Na taṃ akkosaṃ manasi karoti dīgharattaṃ khantisoraccesu niruḷhaajjhāsayattā.
tika-s0301t:1605_0: Paṭisaṃyujeti paṭisattu hutvā saṃyuddhaṃ kareyya. Tenāha “paṭipphareyyā”ti. Upasamaṃ…pe…
tika-s0301t:1605_1: maññe upasameneva paccatthikassa nāyakabhūtassa kodhassa paṭisedhanato. Tādise hi
tika-s0301t:1605_2: kodho paṭikiriyaṃ alabhanto anupādāno viya jātavedo vūpasammati. Yadā-saddo hetuattho,
tika-s0301t:1605_3: na kālatthoti āha “yasmā taṃ maññatī”ti. Tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhanteti tasmiṃyeva
tika-s0301t:1606_0: Khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati anantareva assa virodhaṃ anatthaṃ paṭibāhitvā
tika-s0301t:1606_1: diṭṭhadhammikassa ceva samparāyikassa ca saṃvidhānato. Taṃ khantiṃ paramaṃ āhu seṭṭhabalaṃ
tika-s0301t:1606_2: virodhapaccayaṃ abhibhuyya pavattanato. Bālayogato bālo, tassa balaṃ bālabalaṃ, aññāṇanti
tika-s0301t:1606_3: āha “bālabalaṃ nāma aññāṇabala”nti. Taṃ yassa balanti taṃ aññāṇabalaṃ yassa puggalassa
tika-s0301t:1606_4: balaṃ, abalameva taṃ paññābalena viddhaṃsetabbato. Paṭivattā na vijjatīti dhammaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0301t:1606_5: paṭippharitvā abhibhavitvā pavattā natthi. Paṭivacanamattaṃ pana koci vadeyyāpi,
tika-s0301t:1606_7: vacanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tasseva puggalassa paṭikujjhanakassa. Nānattāvitakkanato
tika-s0301t:1606_8: ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ. Tikicchantanti anatthapaṭibāhanamukhena paṇḍitakiccakaraṇena paṭisedhentaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1606_9: “Bālo aya”nti evaṃ paññapetuṃ hetuphalānaṃ anavabodhato catusaccadhamme achekāti.
tika-s0301t:1609_0: 251. “Chekatāyā”ti vatvā tassa vattuṃ chekabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ kirassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1609_1: Gāhanti laddhiṃ. Mocetvāti yassa puna “coro”ti uttari vattuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ vimocetvāti
tika-s0301t:1609_2: paṭhamaṃ vattuṃ na sakkā. Garūti bhāriyaṃ, dukkaranti attho. Pacchāti “parassā”ti
tika-s0301t:1609_3: vutto so kiñci paṭhamaṃ vadanto attano adhippāyaṃ pavedeti nāma, taṃ yathāsatti viditamano
tika-s0301t:1609_4: tassa uttari vattuṃ sakkoti. Tenāha “parassa vacanaṃ anugantvā pana pacchā sukhaṃ
tika-s0301t:1609_5: vattu”nti. Api ca asurindena “hotu, devānaminda, subhāsitena jayo”ti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1609_6: viseso ca pubbaṃ upanentaṃ anuvattati. Vacasi kusalo sakko devarājā taṃ visesaṃ teneva
tika-s0301t:1609_7: pubbaṃ upanayāpento upalāpanavasena “tumhe khvetthā”tiādimāha. Pubbadevāti sakkapamukhāya
tika-s0301t:1609_8: devaparisāya loke pubbeva uppannattā “pubbadevā”ti pasaṃsavacanaṃ. Vepacittiṃ sandhāya
tika-s0301t:1609_9: “tumhe”ti “pubbadevā”ti ca vuttattā “tumhākaṃ tāva paveṇiāgataṃ bhaṇathā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1609_10: Gāravaṭṭhāniyattā vepacittino bahuvacanapayogo. Daṇḍena avacāro avacaraṇaṃ daṇḍāvacaro,
tika-s0301t:1609_11: natthi ettha vutto daṇḍāvacaroti adaṇḍāvacarā, sakkena vuttā gāthāyo.
tika-s0301t:1612_0: 252. Rathasaddoti rathālaṅkārabhūtānaṃ kiṅkiṇikajālādīnaṃ saddo. Tathā dhajasaddo.
tika-s0301t:1612_1: Ājānīyasaddoti ājānīyānaṃ hasitasaddo ca. Karuṇāsamāvajjitahadayoti pāṇānaṃ anuparodhena
tika-s0301t:1612_2: paṇāmitacitto. Īsāmukhenāti rathakapparamukhena. Puññapaccayanibbattoti uḷāraṃ suvipulaṃ
tika-s0301t:1612_3: puññaṃ paccayaṃ katvā nibbatto. Na sajjati katthaci appaṭighaṭṭanena gacchanto. Simbalivanenāti
tika-s0301t:1612_4: simbalivanamajjhena. Vibhaggaṃ nimmathitanti ito cito vibhaggañceva niravasesato mathitañca hoti.
tika-s0301t:1615_0: 253. Supaccatthikoti suṭṭhu ativiya paccatthiko paṭisattu. Gahitosīti devapāsena
tika-s0301t:1615_1: bandhitvā gahito asi. Baddhova ahosi sakkassa puññānubhāvena. Cetiyarājā kira imasmiṃ
tika-s0301t:1615_2: kappe tato pubbe kenaci avuttapubbaṃ kharamusāvādaṃ abhāsi, tāvadeva virajjhitvā
tika-s0301t:1615_3: mahāpathaviyā vivare dine nipatitvā avīciaggijālānamindanamahosi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:1615_4: “cetiyarañño pāpaṃ sandhāyā”ti. Mahāpāpānīti mahantāni garutarāni pāpāni. Tathā hi
tika-s0301t:1615_5: vepacittino sapathakaraṇe nidassanabhāvena etāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatānīti.
tika-s0301t:1618_0: 254. Dvārapālarūpakāni viyāti dvārapālākārena katapaṭimāyo viya. Vāyametheva, na
tika-s0301t:1618_1: antarā saṃkocaṃ āpajjeyyāti adhippāyo. Nipphannasobhanesūti nipphannabhāvena sundaresu.
tika-s0301t:1618_2: Sabbe hi anipphannā atthā na sobhanti. Kiccajātāti vippakatabhāvena sañjātakiccā.
tika-s0301t:1618_3: Akiccajātoti asañjātakicco kiccarahito nāma natthi gamanaṭṭhitasayananisajjādivasena
tika-s0301t:1618_4: uppajjanakadukkhavinodanabhāvato. Saṃyogaparamātveva sambhogāti imesaṃ sattānaṃ saṃbhuñjitabbavatthūni
tika-s0301t:1618_5: nāma pakatiyā virodhasīlānipi asaṃyogena vā asundarānipi, tāni abhisaṅkharaṇapacanasaṃyojanaparamāni
tika-s0301t:1621_0: 255. Jāmātikā vuccati dhītupati, sasuro bhariyāya pitā, tasmā ime antaravattino dve
tika-s0301t:1621_1: janā sakkavepacittino sujāya vasena jāmātikasasurā. “Ciradikkhitāna”nti dikkhitvā
tika-s0301t:1621_2: pabbajitvā cirakālānaṃ vatasamādānavasena ito bāhirakānaṃ pabbajitānanti āha “cirasamādinnavatāna”nti.
tika-s0301t:1621_3: Ito paṭikkamāti ito yathāṭhitaṭṭhānato apehi apakkama. Na paṭikkūlasaññino guṇe gāravayogato.
tika-s0301t:1621_4: Devā hi yebhuyyena “mayaṃ pubbe guṇavante payirupāsitvā tesaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā puññāni
tika-s0301t:1624_1: Yatheva sinerusamīpe mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, evaṃ
tika-s0301t:1624_3: anantarasutte vuttappakārāsu. Assamapadenāti assamapadavemajjhena. Evaṃ cintayiṃsūti
tika-s0301t:1624_4: “yaṃ nūna maya”ntiādinā yathā pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ, evaṃ mantayiṃsu.
tika-s0301t:1625_0: Icchitakaroti yadicchitakaraṇaṃ. Duṭṭhānanti durāsayānaṃ. Te pana duṭṭhajjhāsayā
tika-s0301t:1625_1: viruddhā hontīti āha “duṭṭhānaṃ viruddhāna”nti. Pavuttanti bījaṃ sandhāya vapitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1626_0: Sāyamāsabhattanti sāyaṃ asitabbabhojanaṃ. Yathāvāraṃ bhakkhitametaṃ devānaṃ viya
tika-s0301t:1626_1: sukhumaṃ guruvāsañca na hotīti “bhatta”nti vuttaṃ. Gelaññajātanti sañjātagelaññaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1631_0: 257. Samādātabbato vatāni, aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarasabhāvena pabbajitabbato padāni, tato
tika-s0301t:1631_1: eva asaṃkiṇṇabhāgāti katvā “vatakoṭṭhāsānī”ti vuttaṃ. Samattānīti puññavisesatāya
tika-s0301t:1631_2: pujjabhavaphalanibbattanena kittisaññānena ca samaṃ attāni samattāni. Paripuṇṇānīti
tika-s0301t:1631_3: akhaṇḍādibhāvena sabbaso puṇṇāni. Samādinnānīti tattha sakkaccakāritāya sammā ādinnāni.
tika-s0301t:1631_4: Mātulānīti pitubhaginī, na yā kāci mātulassa bhariyā kulajeṭṭhakānaṃ adhippetattā,
tika-s0301t:1631_5: bhariyāpi vā mātulasambandhato gahetabbā, tathā sati mahāpitubhariyādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t:1632_0: Ādi-saddena jeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ saṅgaho. Apacitikārakoti tesaṃ paccuṭṭhānakaro. Yo koci
tika-s0301t:1632_1: dadantopi sāpekkho deti, so muttacāgo na hoti, ayaṃ pana na evanti “muttacāgo hotī”ti
tika-s0301t:1632_2: vuttaṃ. Vissaṭṭhacāgoti nirapekkhapariccāgoti attho. Yathā pāṇātipātabahulo “lohitapāṇī”ti
tika-s0301t:1632_3: vuccati, tathā dānabahulo “payatapāṇī”ti vuttoti āha “deyyadhammadānatthāya sadā
tika-s0301t:1632_4: dhotahattho”ti. Vossaggaratoti deyyadhammassa pariccajane abhirato. Parehi yācitabbārahoti
tika-s0301t:1632_5: parehi yācituṃ yutto icchitassa atthassa tāvadeva vissajjanato. Dāneneva yuttoti
tika-s0301t:1632_6: sabbakālaṃ dāneneva yutto abhiṇhaṃ pavattamahādānattā. Dāne ca saṃvibhāge cāti parassa
tika-s0301t:1632_7: sampuṇṇaṃ katvā pariccajanasaṅkhāte dāne ca attanā paribhuñjitabbato saṃvibhajanasaṅkhāte
tika-s0301t:1635_0: 258. Manussabhūtoti manussesu bhūto, manussattaṃ vā patto. Āvasathanti nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:1635_1: kāretvā adāsi, tasmā vāsaṃ adāsīti vāsavo. Attha-saddo idha kāraṇapariyāyoti āha
tika-s0301t:1635_2: “sahassampi kāraṇāna”nti. Svāyamattho heṭṭhā vibhāvitova. Vinicchinati, tasmā sahassaṃ
tika-s0301t:1635_3: paññāakkhīni etassāti sahassakkho. Maghaṃ vuccati dhanaṃ, taṃ pana saddhāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0301t:1635_4: maghaṃ assa atthīti maghavā. Pure dānaṃ dadātīti purindado anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0301t:1638_0: 259. Soti sakko devarājā. Bahuvacane vattabbe ekavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Vuccatīti vacanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1638_1: attho. Tasmā bahuvacaneti bahumhi attheti attho. Yathā paṭipajjanto anukkamena te
tika-s0301t:1638_2: dhamme samādiyitvā sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagā, taṃ paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ “sakko kirā”tiādi
tika-s0301t:1638_3: vuttaṃ. Anantareti sakkabhāvassa atītānantare attabhāve. Taṃ sabbanti sakkassa maghamāṇavakāle
tika-s0301t:1638_4: sammāpaṭipattiṃ, tāya sakkabhāvūpagamanañcāti taṃ sabbaṃ. Vutto, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva
tika-s0301t:1641_0: 260. Manussadaliddoti manussesu duggato. Manussakāruññatanti manussesu paramanihīnataṃ.
tika-s0301t:1641_1: Manussakapaṇoti manussesu vā paramanihīno. Tasmiṃ ṭhāneti tassa devaputtassa tasmiṃ
tika-s0301t:1641_2: uppajjanaṭṭhāne. Lāmakato cintentīti tassa purimavatthuṃ nissāya hīnato cintenti.
tika-s0301t:1641_3: Kathentīti tameva paresaṃ kathenti. Vitthārentīti vuttamatthaṃ vitthārikaṃ karonti.
tika-s0301t:1641_4: Sabbadā paricchijja parivārasampanno hutvā aḍḍhaṭṭharatane hatthikkhandhe mahaccarājānubhāvena
tika-s0301t:1641_5: nisinnattā janakāyena samullokiyamāno. Avalambantīti olambanti. Vandanamattaṃ vā
tika-s0301t:1641_6: nāhosi, aññadatthu paccekabuddhato attano samānādarakiriyaṃ paccāsīsati. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:1641_7: “so”tiādi. Kvāyanti ko ayanti byāpannavasena vadati. Kāḷarattehi suttehi sibbitattā
tika-s0301t:1641_8: vaṇṇavikāraṃ disvā “kuṭṭhicīvarāni pāruto”ti āha. Mahāniraye nibbattitvā mahādukkhaṃ
tika-s0301t:1641_9: paccanubhoti. Tadanurūpapāpakammassa vipākāvasesena laddhokāsena rājagahe…pe… paṭisandhiṃ
tika-s0301t:1641_10: gaṇhi. Kāmañca ettha paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ kusalakammeneva, tassa pana akusalakammassa
tika-s0301t:1641_12: Bhikkhāya carituṃ samatthakālato paṭṭhāya rogassa balavatāya maṃsāni…pe… patanti.
tika-s0301t:1641_13: Ñāṇaṃ pesetvāti vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā bhāvanāñāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭipesetvā pavattetvā.
tika-s0301t:1641_14: Indriyānaṃ paripakkattā satthu desanāvilāsena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito. Cumbaṭanti
tika-s0301t:1641_15: pādacumbaṭaṃ. Kuṭṭhino hi sakalapādatalaṃ mā rujīti cumbaṭaṃ katvā taṃ pādatale bandhitvā
tika-s0301t:1641_16: gacchanti, mattikapātiṃ bhinditvā viya tathā nihīnamanussattabhāvato cavitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ
tika-s0301t:1641_17: paṭilabhanto viya devattabhāvaṃ gaṇhanto cuticittato dutiyacittavāre ādānacittakkhaṇe devaloke nibbatto.
tika-s0301t:1642_0: Maggenāgatāti maggādhigamanena āgatā uppannā. Ariyakantasīlanti ariyānaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ
tika-s0301t:1642_1: manoramaṃ sīladhammaṃ. Ariyānaṃ adhicittaadhipaññāsikkhā viya adhisīlasikkhāpi sabbā
tika-s0301t:1642_2: ativiya kantā evāti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Imasmiṃ panattheti imasmiṃ sotāpannassa bhavasaṅkhāte
tika-s0301t:1642_3: atthe niddhāretvā vuccamāne. Pañcasīlampi yasmā diṭṭhi viya bhavantarepi appahīnaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1645_0: 261. Āramanti ettha sattāti ārāmā, manoramā upavanādayo. Te eva cetenti ettha saddhāya
tika-s0301t:1645_1: attano pītisomanassaṃ sandhahantīti cetiyāti ca vuccanti. Manussaramaṇīyabhāvassāti
tika-s0301t:1645_2: manussānaṃ āramaṇīyabhāvassa. Tassa pana sīlādiguṇavasena acinteyyāparimeyyānubhāvatāpi
tika-s0301t:1645_3: hotīti bhagavā “nāgghanti soḷasi”nti avoca. Acetanāya bhūmiyā ramaṇīyatā nāma guṇavisiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0301t:1645_4: ariyānaṃ sevanavasena veditabbāti vuttaṃ “idāni…pe… gāme vātiādimāhā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1648_0: 262. Yajantānanti dakkhiṇeyyaṃ uddissa dentānaṃ. Aṭṭhuppattiko suttanikkhepoti dassetvā
tika-s0301t:1648_1: atthavaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Agganti seṭṭhaṃ. Tehi tehi vā yathāladdhasappiādayo
tika-s0301t:1648_2: mā nassantu, aggabhāvena gahitāni sappiādīni kevalaṃ aggimhi jhāpanena, devā manussā
tika-s0301t:1648_3: micchāgāhena mā nassantu. Takkenāti takkamattena. “Kathemā”ti amhe maññatha, idāni
tika-s0301t:1648_4: passatha, paccakkhato ayaṃ vo…pe… āgacchatīti āhaṃsūti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1649_0: Upadhivipākanti upadhīsu vā vipaccati, upadhayo vā vipākā etassāti upadhivipākaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1649_1: Vipphāravantaṃ hoti vipulapakkhatāya. Bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu “sammāsambuddhena mahābrahmunā
tika-s0301t:1652_0: 263. Uṭṭhahāti uṭṭhānaṃ kāyikavīriyaṃ karohi. Tenāha “vicara, loke”ti. Cetasikavīriyaṃ
tika-s0301t:1652_1: pana bhagavatā matthakaṃ pāpitameva. Tenāha “vijitasaṅgāmā”ti. Dvādasayojanikassa
tika-s0301t:1652_2: uccabhāvena. Vitthārato pana āyāmato ca anekayojanasatasahassaparimāṇacakkavāḷaṃ
tika-s0301t:1652_3: atibyāpetvā ṭhitassa. Pannabhārāti pātitabhāra. Nikkhepitabbato bhārāti āha “oropitakhandhā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:1652_4: Te hi taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa sampātanaṭṭhena bhārā nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ “bhārā have
tika-s0301t:1652_5: pañcakkhandhā”ti. Tadekadesā ca kilesābhisaṅkhārā. Pannarasāya puṇṇamāya rattinti
tika-s0301t:1652_6: yathā pannarasapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃ paripuṇṇakāle upakkilesavimutto cando sobhati,
tika-s0301t:1652_7: evaṃ tava cittaṃ sabbaso upakkilesavimuttaṃ sobhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1655_0: 264. Puthuddisāti bahudisā. Kā pana tāti āha “catasso disā catasso anudisā cā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1655_1: Anudisāgahaṇena cettha uddhaṃ adhopi gayhatīti ca dasseti. Bhūmivāsinoti bhūmipaṭibaddhavuttino.
tika-s0301t:1655_2: Etena rukkhapabbatanivāsinopi gahitā honti. Cirarattasamāhitacitteti upacārappanājhānāni
tika-s0301t:1655_3: uppādetvā aparihīnajjhānatāya cirakālaṃ samāhitacitte. Āpāṇakoṭikanti jīvitapariyantaṃ
tika-s0301t:1655_4: yāvajīvaṃ. Evamādīti ādi-saddena avasesapuññakiriyavatthūni saṅgaṇhāti. Niccasīlavasena
tika-s0301t:1655_5: pañcahi, niyamasīlavasena dasahi. Pi-saddena tato katipayehi uposathasīlavasena aṭṭhahipīti
tika-s0301t:1655_6: dasseti. Dhammikehīti dhammato anapetehi. Pamukhoti pamokkho.
tika-s0301t:1658_0: 265. Brahmajāṇukoti dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapetvā vandamāno brahmajāṇuko
tika-s0301t:1658_1: nāma tathābhūto hutvā. Yajitabbato yakkho, pūjanīyo. Evaṃ pūjāvisesayogato sakkoti
tika-s0301t:1658_2: āha “so yakkhoti so sakko”ti. Sakkassa namakkārabhājanabhūtañhi pucchanto mātali
tika-s0301t:1658_3: “ko nāma so yakkho”ti āha. Guṇanemittakehīti guṇahetukehi anantāni hi buddhānaṃ nāmāni,
tika-s0301t:1658_4: tāni ca kho sabbānipi guṇanemittakāneva. Anantaguṇattā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0301t:1661_0: Tasmā anomanāmanti paripuṇṇaguṇanāmanti attho. Samatikkamenāti sammā samucchindanavasena
tika-s0301t:1661_1: atikkamanena. Kilesārīnaṃ apetacayoti apacayo, so āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etesanti
tika-s0301t:1664_0: 266. Pūtimhi dehe mātu sarīre sayanato, attano eva vā pūtidehaṃ sarīraṃ tasmiṃ ṭhitatāya
tika-s0301t:1664_1: avattharitvā sayanato pūtidehasayāti yojanā. Kuṇapamheteti ete manussā asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūle
tika-s0301t:1664_2: mātukucchisaṅkhāte kuṇapasmiṃ dasa māse nimuggā. Tesaṃ kinnāma tvaṃ pihayasīti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1664_3: Etesaṃ etaṃ vihayāmīti etesaṃ isīnaṃ etaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ vihayāmi. Idāni taṃ paṭipattiṃ
tika-s0301t:1664_4: dassetuṃ “na te saṃ koṭṭhe opentī”ti vuttaṃ. Dhaññaṃ koṭṭhe na pakkhipanti pakkhipitabbassa
tika-s0301t:1664_5: ca abhāvato. Tenāha “na hi etesaṃ dhañña”nti. Paresaṃ niṭṭhitanti paresaṃ gahitaṃ
tika-s0301t:1664_6: santakaṃ tesaṃ pākāya niṭṭhitaṃ. Bhikkhācāravattenāti piṇḍācariyāya. Esamānā pariyesantā.
tika-s0301t:1664_7: Evaṃ pariyiṭṭhena. Yāpenti, na esanti anesanaṃ. Susamādinnasundaravatāti suṭṭhu samādinnasobhanavatā.
tika-s0301t:1665_1: bhāsanasīlā. Ariyena tuṇhībhūtena tuṇhībhūtā. Tato eva manassa sātisayaṃ samañcarā.
tika-s0301t:1665_3: nibbutā. Tenāha “vissaṭṭhadaṇḍā”ti. Sādānesūti sabhavādānesu. Anādānāti tabbirahitā.
tika-s0301t:1673_0: 268. Dubbaṇṇo duddasiko virūpavaṇṇo. Okoṭimakoti rassabhāvena avarakoṭimako. Sakkena
tika-s0301t:1673_1: gahitanāmamevetaṃ, na pana so tathārūpo koci yakkho. Tenāha “eko rūpāvacarabrahmā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1673_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā so tathārūpo hutvā āgatoti āha “sakko kirā”ti. Kathaṃ panettha ñāyati
tika-s0301t:1673_3: “so eko rūpāvacarabrahmā, na paneso avaruddhakayakkho”ti yuttiṃ dassento “avaruddhakayakkhā
tika-s0301t:1673_4: panā”tiādimāha. Devānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā. Pharusenāti pharusasamācārena. “Ko nāma mayhaṃ
tika-s0301t:1673_5: āsane sannisinno”ti akkhantiṃ anuppādento khantiyaṃ ṭhatvā. Balavacittīkāranti garutaraṃ
tika-s0301t:1673_6: sakkārabahumānaṃ. Nīcavuttiyāti paramanipaccakāre suvūpasamane ca dassiyamāne. Sakkassa
tika-s0301t:1673_7: tāya eva ācārasampattiyā sakkāsane ṭhātuṃ, attano ca āvikātuṃ asakkonto antaradhāyi.
tika-s0301t:1673_8: Upahatacittomhīti khantimettānuddayāsabbhāvato parasmiṃ upahatacittomhīti sakko attano
tika-s0301t:1673_9: sabhāvaṃ vadati. Kodhavase vattetunti kodhena attano vase nibbattetuṃ na sukaromhi,
tika-s0301t:1673_10: atha kho kodhaṃ mayhaṃ vase na vattemīti adhippāyo. Ciraṃ na kujjhāmīti yadi me kadāci
tika-s0301t:1673_11: kodho uppajjeyya, taṃ kodhaṃ anuvattento cirakālaṃ na kujjhāmi. Na upanayhāmīti anto
tika-s0301t:1673_12: sace me kodho uppajjeyya, khippameva ca naṃ paṭivineyyanti taṃ me pubbeva vataṃ paripūritaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1676_0: 269. Ābādhikoti ābādho assa atthīti ābādhiko. Vācesīti sikkhāpesi. Sambaro nāma asuramāyāya
tika-s0301t:1676_1: ādipuriso purātano asurindo. Taṃ sandhāyāha “yathā sambaro”tiādi. Evaṃ paccati aññopi
tika-s0301t:1676_2: māyāvī māyaṃ payojetvā. Upavādantarāyo nāma khamāpane sati vigacchati, pākatikameva
tika-s0301t:1676_3: hotīti āha “evamassa phāsu bhaveyyā”ti. Tenāti vepacittinā sambaravijjāya adānena
tika-s0301t:1676_4: vañcitattā. Tathā akatvāti isīnaṃ santikaṃ netvā khamāpanavasena kātabbaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0301t:1679_0: 270. Sampayojesunti aññamaññaṃ vācasikaṃ pharusaṃ payojesuṃ. Tenāha “kalahaṃ akaṃsū”ti,
tika-s0301t:1679_1: vivādaṃ akaṃsūti attho. Atikkammavacananti vacīsaṃvaraṃ atikkamitvā vacanaṃ. Yasmā
tika-s0301t:1679_2: accaye desiyamāne taṃ khīṇayati aññamaññassa khamamānassa khamanaṃ paṭiggaṇhato,
tika-s0301t:1679_3: tasmā vuttaṃ “nappaṭigaṇhātīti na khamatī”ti. Tumhākaṃ vase vattatu, visevitaṃ akatvā
tika-s0301t:1679_4: yathākāmakaraṇīyo hotu. Mittadhammo idha uttarapadalopena “mitto”ti vuttoti āha “mittadhamme”ti.
tika-s0301t:1679_5: Karaṇavacananti “mittehī”ti karaṇavacanaṃ bhummatthe. Tenāha “mittesū”ti. Yathā nibbattasabhāvassa
tika-s0301t:1679_6: bhāvato aññathattaṃ jarā, evaṃ mittabhāvato vuttavipariyāyo amittadhammo jarāpariyāyena
tika-s0301t:1679_7: vutto. Agārayhaṃ anavajjaṃ sabbaso pahīnakilesaṃ. Tenāha “khīṇāsavapuggala”nti.
tika-s0301t:1682_0: 271. Kodho tumhe mā abhibhavīti ettha kodhena anabhibhavanīyattaṃ khantimettākaruṇāditappaṭipakkhadhammaparibrūhanena.
tika-s0301t:1682_1: Tathā hi taṃsamaṅgino kodho abhibhuyyatīti āha “tumheva kodhaṃ abhibhavatha. Kujjhantānaṃ
tika-s0301t:1682_2: mā paṭikujjhitthā”ti. Paṭipadāti esā paṭipatti. Mettāti appanāppattā mettā. Tadupacāro
tika-s0301t:1682_3: mettāpubbabhāgo. Na vihiṃsati kiñci etāyāti avihiṃsā. Karuṇāti appanāppattakaruṇā
tika-s0301t:1682_4: veditabbā. Tadupacāro karuṇāpubbabhāgo. Lāmakajananti khantiādīsu yonisomanasikārābhāvena
tika-s0301t:1682_5: gārayhasamācārasamāyogena ca nihīnaṃ janaṃ. Paccayaparisuddhiyā kodho abhimaddamāno
tika-s0301t:1682_6: puggalaṃ abhimaddati, tassa so paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalehi sammadeva pahātabboti.
